On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: آبدوز اهڙا جهاز آهي جيڪي پاڻي جي اندر هلائڻ لاءِ تيار ڪيا ويا آهن ۽ گهڻو وقت اندر رهندا آهن. آبدوز پهرين عالمي لڙائي ۽ ٻي عالمي لڙائي ۾ استعمال ڪيون ويون هويون. ان وقت اهي گهٽ رفتار ۾ هويون ۽ گهڻي محدود شوٽنگ جي حد هئي. جنگ جي شروعات ۾ انهن گھڻو ڪري سمنڊ جي مٿان سفر ڪيو، پر جيئن ئي ريڊار ترقي ڪرڻ ۽ وڌيڪ درست ٿين شروع ٿيو ته آبدوز ڏسجڻ کان بچڻ لاءِ پاڻيءَ جي ھيٺ لھي وڃڻ تي مجبور ڪيو ويو. جرمن آبدوز کي يو-بوٽس چيو ويندو هو. جرمن پنهنجيون آبدوزون هلائڻ ۽ نيويگيٽ ڪرڻ ۾ تمام ڀَڙ هئا. آبدوز سان ڪاميابي جي ڪري، جنگ کان پوءِ جرمنن کي انهن مان گھڻا رکڻ لاءِ قابلِ اعتبار ناهن.
mt: A submarine is a watercraft capable of independent operation underwater. It differs from other watercraft in that it can stay submerged for prolonged periods and is not dependent on a surface vessel to provide its energy needs. The term most commonly applies to those vessels capable of independent underwater propulsion, and generally implies a complete submergence into an aquatic environment for other purposes than those of transport. Submarines are used around the world for many purposes, including commercial underwater mining, military, scientific research, and oceanography. The first submarine was built by Cornelius Drebbel in 1620, and the first modern submarine was the French submarine Nautilus, built in 1800. The first submarine to be successfully used in combat was the American CSS Hunley, during the American Civil War. The first submarine to successfully attack an enemy vessel was the Confederate submarine H. L. Hunley, which sank the USS Housatonic in 1864. The first submarine to successfully attack an enemy vessel was the Confederate submarine H. L. Hunley, which sank the USS H
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: سيپٽمبر 17، 1939 تائين، پولش دفاع پهريان ئي ٽٽي چڪو هو ۽ صرف اميد اها هئي ته رومانيا جي برج هيڊ سان گڏ واپسي ۽ ٻيهر منظم ڪجي. جيتوڻيڪ، اهي منصوبا تقريباً رات جو دير سان رائج ٿي ويا، ريگا امن معاهدي جي خلاف ورزي تي پولينڊ جي مشرقي علائقن تي حملو ڪرڻ بعد، سوويئيٽ-پولش نان-اگريشن پيڪٽ، ۽ ٻين ٻن طرفن ۽ گهڻ طرفي عالمي معاهدن تي چڙهائي ڪري جڏهن سووئيٽ جي يونين ريڊ آرمي کان 800000 سپاهي داخل ٿيا ۽ بيلاروسي ۽ يوڪرينيائي محاذ ٺاهي ٺاهيو.
mt: 17 September 1939, Polish defense was already in tatters and only hoped that the Romanian bridgehead could be reoccupied and reorganized. Although these plans were almost realized in the early hours of the morning, after the Soviet-Polish non-aggression pact, and other bilateral and multilateral treaties were violated, when the Soviet Union's Red Army of 800,000 troops invaded and established fronts in Belarus and Ukraine.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: اتر آفريڪا ۾ اٽلي جي ماڻهن لاءِ شروعات کان ئي شيون ٺيڪ نہ هويون. 10 جون 1940 تي اٽلي طرفان اعلان ٿيل جنگ جي هڪ هفتي اندر ئي، برطانيائي 11 هوزا ليبيا ۾ فورٽ ڪاپوزا تي قبضو ڪري ڇڏيو هو. بارڊيا جي اوڀر ۾ هڪ گهات ۾، انگريزن اٽلي جي ڏهين آرمي جي چيف انجنيئر، جنرل ليسٽڪسي کي حراست ۾ ورتو. 28 جون تي، مارشل اٽالو بالبو، لبيا جو گورنر جنرل ۽ مسوليني جو حقيقي وارث، توبرڪ ۾ لينڊگ جي دوران دوستاڻي فائير ۾ مري ويا هئا.
mt: Things were not going well for the Italians from the start. Within a week of the Italian declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had captured Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In the east, the British had captured General Listi, the chief engineer of the tenth Italian army, in Bardia. On June 28, Marshal Balbo, Governor General of Libya and Mussolini's heir apparent, was killed in a friendly fire incident during a landing at Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: تبتي ٻُڌ ڌرم ٻُڌ جي تعليم تي مبني آهي، پر محبت جي مهايانہ رستي ۽ ڀارتي يوگا جي گهڻي فن جي ذريعي وڌايو ويو. اصول طور تي، تبتان وارو ٻڌمت بلڪل سادو آهي. اهو ڪنڊاليني يوگا، مراقبت ۽ گهن-آغوشي واري محبت جي رستي تي مشتمل آهي. ڪنڊالني يوگا سان ڪنڊالني اينرجي (افسانوي توانائي) يوگا پوسچر، ساهه جي مشقن، منتر ۽ تصويري شڪلن ذريعي اجاگر ٿيندي آهي. تبيتن ڌيان جو مرڪز ديتي يوگا آهي. مختلف ديوتائن جي تصور جي ذريعي توانائي جا ذريعا صاف ٿيندا آهن، چڪرن کي چالو ڪيو ويندو آهي ۽ روشن خيالي نفس جو شعور پيدا ٿيندو آهي.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but is enriched by the great art of Indian yoga, meditation and loving-kindness. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is simple. It consists of the yoga of the Kundalini, the practice of breath and loving-kindness. Kundalini yoga is manifested through the Kundalini energy (mythical energy) yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visual images. The center of attention in Tibet is Dhyana Yoga. The energy of different deities is purified through the visualization of the deities, the circuits are activated and the awareness of the enlightened soul is awakened.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: پروگرام رات 8:30 مقامي وقت (15.00 UTC) تي شروع ٿيو. سڄي ملڪ جي مشهور فنڪارن شري شيام جي چرڻن ۾ ڀجن، يا پوجا پاٽ وارا راڳ ارپن ڪيا. ڳائڻي سنجو شرما شام جي شروعات ڪئي، هن کانپوءِ جئہ شنڪر چوڌري آيو، ڇپن ڀوگ ڀڄن بہ ڳايو. ڳائڻو کنڊيلوال ساڻس گڏ هو. پوءِ لکا سنگهه ڀڄن ڳائڻ ۾ اڳرائي ڪئي. ڇاپن ڀوج جون 108 پليٽون (هندو ڌرم ۾، 56 مخلتف کاڌي واريون شيون جيئن مٺائي، فروٽ، سڪو فروٽ، ڊشون وغيرو جيڪي کاڌي طور پيش ڪيون وينديون آهن) بابا شام لاءِ پيش ڪيون ويون. لاکا سنگهہ بہ ڇپن ڀوگ ڀڄن ڳايو. ڳائڻي، راجو کنڊيلوال هن سان گڏ ڳائي رهيو هو.
mt: The program began at 8:30 pm local time (15.00 UTC). The country's famous singers, Shri Shyam Charan, Bhajan, or Pooja Patwar, Rag Arpan. Singer Sangeet Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary, who also sang Chhapn Bhog Bhajan. Singer Kundalwal was also present. Then Laxmi Shankar sang Bhajan. 108 plates (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items such as sweets, fruits, dried fruits, dishes, etc., which are presented as food for the gods) were presented to Baba Shyam. Laxmi Shankar also sang Chhapn Bhog Bhajan. Singer, Raju Kundalwal was also singing with him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "تقریب جي شروعات جڳ مشهور سرڪ دو سوليل گروپ جي خاص شو سان ٿي. ان کانپوءِ استنبول اسٽيٽ سمفني آرڪيسٽرا، هڪ جنيسري بينڊ، ۽ ڳائڻا فتح ايرڪوڪ ۽ مسلم گُرسيس آيا. پوءِ درويش اسٽيج تي آهيا. ترڪي جي ڳائڻي سيزين اڪسو، اطالوي ٽينر ايليسنڊرو سفينا ۽ يوناني ڳائڻي هيرس اليگزيو سان گڏ فن جو مظاهرو ڪيو. پورو ڪرڻ لاءِ، ترڪي جي رقص گروه فائر آف اناطوليہ ""ٽرائي"" شو پيش ڪيو."
mt: "The opening act was a duet by the popular Turkish folk group Saz Semaisi. Then came the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and singers Fethi Arikok and Muslim Gurses. Next were the dervishes. Turkish singer Sezen Aksu, Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou performed a show of arts. To finish, the Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia "Tri" performed a show."
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "مسافرن کي پاڻي ڏنو ويو جڏهن اهي 90(F)-ڊگري جي گرمي ۾ انتظار ڪري رهيا هئا. باهه جي ڪپتان سڪاٽ ڪونس چيو ته، ""هي 90 جي ڏهاڪي ۾ سنتا ڪلارا ۾ هڪ گرم ڏينهن هو. رولر ڪوسٽر تي ٽيپ ٿيل وقت جون ڪي به گهڙيون ناخوشگوار هونديون، گهٽ ۾ گهٽ چئون ته، ۽ پهرين کي سواري مان لاهڻ لاءِ هڪ ڪلاڪ لڳي ويو."""
mt: "Passengers were given water when they were waiting in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Cones said, "It was a hot day in Santa Clara, Calif., in the 90s. When the roller coaster stopped, the heat was uncomfortable, and we were just saying, 'Oh, my gosh,' and then we were given a minute to get off the ride."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: تازه ترين بُليٽن موجب، سمنڊ جي سطح جي ريڊنگز سان ظاهر ٿيو هو ته سونامي پيدا ٿي ويو هو. پاگو پاگو ۽ نيوو جي ويجهو ڪجهه قطعي سونامي سرگرمي رڪارڊ ڪئي وئي هئي. ٽونگا ۾ ڪنهن بہ وڏي نقصان يا حادثن جي ڪا بہ رپورٽ نہ ملي آهي، پر بجلي عارضي طور تي بند ٿي ويئي هئي، تنهن ڪري ٽونگن جي اختيارن کي PTWC کان جاري ٿيل سونامي آگاهي حاصل نہ ٿي. هوائي ۾ سامونڊي پٽي يا ان جي ويجهو علائقن ۾ واقع چوڏهن اسڪول وارننگ ختم ڪرڻ جي باوجود اربع ڏينهن بند هئا.
mt: The latest bulletins showed that the tsunami was generated by a reading of the sea level. There was some confirmed tsunami activity in Pago Pago and Niuatoputapu. There was no major damage or incidents reported in Tonga, but power was disrupted, so the Tongan authorities did not receive the tsunami warning issued by PTWC. Schools in the coastal areas or near the coast were closed for four days despite the warning.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: A1GP نيوزي لينڊ ٽيم جي ساٿي ڊرائيورجوني ريڊ اڄ قانوني طور تي نيوزي لينڊ جي 48 سال پراڻي آڪلينڊ پل تي تيزي رفتار سان هلائي تاريخ ٺاهي. مسٽر ريڊل پل تي 160 ڪلوميٽر في ڪلاڪ جي رفتار سان نيوزيلينڊ جي A1GP ڪار، بليڪ بيوٽي کي هلائڻ ۾ ڪامياب ويو. نيوزي لينڊ پوليس کي پنهنجا اسپيڊ ريڊار گن استعمال ڪرڻ ۾ ڏکيائي ٿي اهو ڏسڻ ۾ تہ مسٽر ريڊ ڪيتري تيزي سان هلي رهيو هو ڇو تہ بليڪ بيوٽي ڪيتري گهٽ آهي، صرف ان وقت پوليس مسٽر ريڊ کي قابو ڪرڻ ۾ ڪامياب ويئي جڏهن هن 160 ڪلوميٽر في ڪلاڪ جي رفتار تائين گهٽ ڪيو.
mt: 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge was legally driven by Johnny Reid today. Mr. Reid successfully drove New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty, at 160 kilometers per hour on the bridge. New Zealand police were dismayed to see Mr. Reid drive so fast because Black Beauty was so slow, only when he slowed down to 160 kilometers per hour did the police manage to catch him.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: سومر تي شام 10:08 وڳي اولهه مونٽانا کي هڪ وچولي زلزلي جهنجهوڙي ڇڏيو. آمريڪا جيولاجيڪل سروي (USGS) ۽ ان جي قومي زلزلي جي معلوماتي مرڪز کي نقصان جي ڪا بہ ترت رپورٽ نہ ملي آهي. زلزلو دلن اتر-اتر اوڀر ۾ لڳ ڀڳ 20 ڪوميٽر (15 ميل) تي، ۽ بيوٽ جي ڏکڻ ۾ لڳ ڀڳ 65 ڪلوميٽر (40 ميل) تي مرڪز ۾ هو.
mt: 10:08 p.m. on Sunday, a moderate earthquake shook western Montana. The United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center have not reported any damage. The quake was centered about 20 kilometers (15 miles) east-northeast of Butte and about 65 kilometers (40 miles) south of Helena.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: هڪ فساد دوران عراق جي ابو غریب جيل کي باهه ڏئي ساڙيو ويو آهي. US فوجين جي قبضي بعد اتي قيدين سان بدسلوڪي معلوم ٿيڻ کانپوءِ جيل بدنام ٿي.
mt: A riot at the Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq has been set on fire. After US troops took control, mistreatment of prisoners was discovered.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: بينڊ مائوي وار ميموريل اسٽيڊيم ۾ شو کي رد ڪيو, جنهن ۾ 9000 ماڻهو آيا هئا، ۽ مداحن کان معذرت ڪئي. بينڊ جي انتظام ڪندڙ ڪمپني، HK مئينجمينٽ ڪارپوريشن 20 سيپٽمبر تي رد ٿيل تي ڪو بہ پهريون سبب نہ ڏنو، پر ٻي ڏينهن تي لاجسٽڪ سبب ڏنا.
mt: 9,000 fans attended the match, which was played at the Bandung Moch. Toha Stadium, and the team apologized to its fans. The company that runs the stadium, PT. HK Mainjemen Corporation, did not give a reason for the cancellation on September 20, but gave a logistical reason the next day.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "وڏي پئماني تي لوٽ مار جاري سڄي رات تائين جاري رهي، جيئن بشڪيڪ جي گهٽين تي قانون لاڳو ڪندڙ آفيسر موجود نه هئا. بشڪيڪ هڪ ناظر طرفان ""غدر"" جي حالت ۾ غرق ٿيڻ طور بيان ڪيو ويو، جئين ماڻهن جو گروهه روڊن تي گھمي رهيو هو ۽ واهپي جي شين جي دڪانن کي لٽي رهيو هو. بشيڪ جي ڪيترن ئي رهواسين ڏکڻ کان احتجاجين تي لاقانونيت جو الزام هنيو."
mt: "The looting went on all night, as police were not present to enforce the curfew. Bishkek was described as being in a state of "anarchy", as groups of people were roaming the streets and looting shops. Several residents of Bishkek accused the police of lawlessness."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: ان کان اڳ، رنگ جي CEO جيمي سمن آف چيو تہ ڪمپني ان وقت کولي جڏهن ان جي دروازي جي گهنٽي ان جي گيراج ۾ دڪان کان ٻڌڻ ۾ نہ ايندي هئي. هن چيو ته، هن هڪ وائي فائي ڊور بيل ٺاهي. سمن آف چيو تہ 2013 ۾ هن جي شارڪ ٽينڪ جي قسط ۾ موجودگي کانپوءِ وڪري ۾ واڌ آئي جتي شو پينل شروعات ۾ مالي مدد نہ ڪئي. 2017 جي آخر ۾، سمن آف شاپنگ ٽيليويزن چينل QVC تي ظاهر ٿيو. رنگ مقابلو ڪندڙ سيڪيورٽي ڪمپني ADT ڪارپوريشن سان هڪ مقدمو حل ڪيو.
mt: Previously, CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company was able to grow when its front door could hear its garage door from the store's door. Siminoff said he had a Wi-Fi doorbell. Siminoff said that after his share tank in 2013, when he was not featured in the show's opening financial support. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping television channel QVC. Ring competed with security company ADT Corporation in a lawsuit.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "PBS شو وٽ ٻہ درجن کان مٿي ايمي ايوارڊز آهن. ۽ هن جو رن سيسيم اسٽريٽ ۽ مسٽر راجرز جي پاڙي کان گهٽ آهي. شو جي هر قسط هڪ مخصوص ڪتاب جي هڪ ٿيم تي زور وجهندي ۽ پوءِ هڪ کان وڌيڪ ڪهاڻين ذريعي ٿيم کي ايڪسپلور ڪندي. هر شو ڪتابن جون تجويزون پڻ پيش ڪندو، جيڪي ٻارن کي ڏسڻ گهرجن جڏهن اهي لائبريري وڃن. WNED بفيلو (ريڊنگ رينبو جي هوم اسٽيشن) مان جان گرانٽ چيو ""ريڊنگ رينبو ٻارن کي سکائي ٿو تہ ڇو پڙهجي،... لو آف ريڊنگ — (شو) ٻارن کي ڪتاب کڻڻ ۽ پڙهڻ لاءِ همٿائي ٿو."" جان گرانٽ سميت ڪجهه ماڻهن پاران سمجهيو وڃي ٿو ته، فنڊنگ ڪرنچ ٽيليويزن پروگرامنگ جي فلسفي جي هڪ تبديلي ٻنهي سيريز کي ختم ڪرڻ ۾ مدد ڪئي."
mt: "PBS show has won over 70 Emmys. And its run is shorter than that of Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode focuses on a specific book and then explores the theme through one or more stories. It also suggests books to children when they visit the library. WNED Buffalo (home of Reading Rainbow) John Grant said, "Reading Rainbow teaches children to read,... The Love of Reading — (the show) encourages children to read and read." John Grant and others believe that funding cuts to the program's philosophy of public television programming has helped to end both series.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: ايمسٽرڊيم شهر ۽ ايني فرينڪ عجائب گهر جي عملدارن بيان ڏنو تہ اهو وڻ فنگس سان متاثر آهي ۽ ان ۾ عوام لاءِ خطرو موجود آهي جيئن تہ اهي دليل ڏين ٿا تہ اهو جلدي ڪنهن مٿي ڪرڻ جو خطرو هو. ان کي اڱاري جي ڏينهن تي گهٽ ڪرڻ جو منصوبو ٺاهيو ويو هو ، پر هڪ هنگامي عدالت جي فيصلي بعد محفوظ ڪيو ويو.
mt: The staff of the Amsterdam and Anne Frank House museums said the tree was infected with fungus and posed a risk to the public, as they cited evidence that it was likely to fall soon. A plan to cut it down on the anniversary of Anne Frank's death was thwarted by a last-minute court ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "جانورن جي آزادي ۽ جانورن تي ظلم جي روڪ ٿام لاءِ رائل سوسائٽي (RSPCA) ٻيهر آسٽريليا جي سڀني ڪوس گھرن ۾ CCTV ڪئميرا لازمي تنصيب ڪرڻ جو مطالبو ڪري رهي آهي. RSPCA نيو سائوٿ ويلز جي چيف انسپيڪٽر ڊيوڊ او شانيسي ABC کي ٻڌايو تہ آسٽريليا ۾ ڪوس گهرن جي نگراني ۽ معائنو ڪرڻ عام هجڻ گهرجي. ""CCTV پڪ سان جانورن سان گڏ ڪم ڪندڙ ماڻهن کي هڪ مضبوط سگنل موڪليندي تہ انهن جي بهبود پهرين ترجيح آهي."""
mt: "For the freedom and protection of animals and against animal cruelty, the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) is again demanding that CCTV cameras be made mandatory in all Australian cattery homes. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that it is important to monitor and inspect cattery homes in Australia. ""CCTV sends a strong signal to people working with animals that their improvement is the first priority."""
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: ريڊ ليڪ ڪميونٽي ۾ اڄ اهڙي هڪ خبر پکڙجي تہ جيف ويسي ۽ نون متاثرن مان ٽن جون آخري رسمون ٿيون تہ هڪ ٻيو شاگرد 21 مارچ تي اسڪول ۾ فائرنگ جي ڏوه ۾ گرفتار ڪيو ويو هو. اڄ جي گرفتاري جي تصديق کان سواءِ اختيارين تمام گهٽ چيو. جيتوڻيڪ، تحقيق جي ڄاڻ سان هڪ ذريعي منيئيپولس اسٽار-ٽربيون کي ٻڌايو ته، اهو ريڊ ليڪ قبائلي چيئرمين فلوئڊ جورڊين جو 16 سالن جو پٽ لوئس جورڊين هو. هن وقت تائين اهو خبر ناهي ته ڪهڙا الزام لاڳايا ويندا جيڪو اختيارين ڇوڪري تي لڳايون، پر وفاقي عدالت ۾ نوجوانن جي ڪارروائي شروع ٿي وئي آهي.
mt: A report in the Red Lake Community News on Monday said that Jeff Weise and two other students had their funerals on March 21, the day another student was arrested for firing a gun in school. The arrest was confirmed by the Star-Tribune of Minneapolis, which reported that the suspect was Floyd Jourdain Jr.'s 16-year-old son, Louis Jourdain. It is not known what charges were filed against the students, but a federal judge has ordered the students to stop their disruptive behavior.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: احتجاج جي منتظمن چيو تہ جرمني جي شهرن جهڙوڪ برلن، ڪولون، هيمبرگ ۽ هين اوور ۾ لڳ ڀڳ 100،000 ماڻهن حصو ورتو. برلن ۾، پوليس لڳ ڀڳ 6،500 احتجاج ڪندڙن جو اندازو لڳايو. پئرس، بلغاريہ جي سوفيا، لٿوانيا جي ولنيوس، مالٽا جي وليٽا، ايسٽونيا جي تلن، ۽ اسڪاٽلينڊ جي ايڊنبرگ ۽ گلاسگو ۾ بہ احتجاج ٿيا. لنڊن ۾، اٽڪل 200 ماڻهن اهم ڪاپي رائيٽ هولڊرن جي آفيسن جي ٻاهر احتجاج ڪيو. گذريل مهيني پولينڊ ۾ گهڻا احتجاج ٿيا جڏهن ان ملڪ ACTA تي صحي ڪئي، جنهن جي ڪري پولش حڪومت هاڻي جي لاءِ معاهدي تي صحي نہ ڪرڻ جو فيصلو ڪيو آهي. ليٽويا ۽ سلوواڪيا ٻنين ACTA ۾ شامل ٿيڻ جي عمل ۾ دير ڪئي.
mt: 100,000 protesters were estimated to have taken part in demonstrations in cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated around 6,500 protesters. Protests also took place in Paris, Bulgaria's Sofia, Lithuania's Vilnius, Malta's Valletta, Estonia's Tallinn, and Scotland's Edinburgh and Glasgow. In London, around 200 protesters demonstrated outside the offices of major copyright holders. Last month, Poland saw many protests when the country signed ACTA, which the Polish government has now decided not to ratify. Latvia and Slovakia have delayed joining ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "تقريبن 60 خراب ٿيل iPods اور هيٽنگ جا ڪيس رپورٽ ڪيا ويا آهن، جنهن جي نتيجي ۾ ٽوٽل ڇهه جڳهين تي ٻاهه لڳي چار ماڻهو باهه سان هلڪا زخمي ٿيا. جاپان جي ناڻي، واپار ۽ صنحت (METI) واري وزارت چيو تہ ڊوائيسن سان لاڳاپيل 27 حادثن جي انهن کي آگاهي هئي. گذريل هفتي، METI اعلان ڪيو تہ ايپل ڪمپني ان کي 34 وڌيڪ اوور هيٽنگ واقعن بابت آگاه ڪيو هو، جنهن کي ڪمپني ""غير سنجيده قرار ڏنو."" وزارت جواب ۾ ايپل پاران رپورٽ ۾ دير کي ”انتهائي افسوسناڪ“ قرار ڏنو."
mt: "Nearly 60 overheated iPods and cases have been reported, resulting in six locations being evacuated and four people lightly injured by smoke. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it was aware of 27 incidents involving Apple products. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which Apple had deemed "not significant." METI responded that Apple's report was "extremely regrettable."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "Apple جي CEO اسٽيو جابس اسٽيج تي ايندي پنهنجي جينس جي کيسي مان iPhone ڪڍي ڊوائيس کي نمائش ڪئي. 2 ڪلاڪن جي تقرير دوران هن ٻڌايو ته ""اڄ Apple فون کي ٻيهر ايجاد ڪرڻ وڃي رهي آهي، اسان اڄ تاريخ رقم ڪرڻ وڃي رهيا آهيون."""
mt: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs took the stage from his company's Genesys Theater to unveil the iPhone, a device that combines a mobile phone, iPod and Internet browser. In a two-hour presentation, he said, "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone. We're going to reinvent the music player. We're going to reinvent the Internet browser. We're going to reinvent the camera. We're going to reinvent the calendar. We're going to reinvent the mail system. We're going to reinvent the maps. We're going to reinvent the text messaging. We're going to reinvent the video camera. We're going to reinvent the video phone. We're going to reinvent the way you interact with your computer. We're going to reinvent the way you interact with your music. We're going to reinvent the way you interact with your photos. We're going to reinvent the way you interact with your calendar. src: موجوده سينيٽر ۽ ارجنٽائن جي خاتونِ اول ڪرسٽينا فرنينڊس ڊي ڪرچنر ڪلهه شام بيونوس ايئريز کان 50 ڪلوميٽر پري (31 ميل) هڪ شهر، لا پلاٽا ۾ پنهنجي صدارتي اميدوار هجڻ جو اعلان ڪيو. مسز ڪرچنر ارجنٽينا ٿيٽر ۾ صدر جي عهدي جي چونڊ وڙهڻ جو ارادو ڪيو، ساڳئي هنڌ جتي هن سينيٽ جي لاءِ بيونس آئرس صوبي جي وفد جي ميمبر جي حيثيت سان پنهنجي 2005 جي مهم جو شروعات ڪئي هئي.
mt: Current Senator and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernández de Kirchner announced her presidential bid in the evening at a 50-kilometre (31-mile) distance from a city, La Plata, by plane from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner decided to run for president of the Senate in the same place where she started her 2005 campaign as a member of the Buenos Aires Province delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA اهو بہ معلوم ڪيو تہ وڊيو انٽرنيٽ تي هلي رهيو آهي، تنهن هوندي بہ بگ برادر آن لائن مواد سينسرشپ قانون جي ڀڃڪڙي نہ ڪئي هئي جيئن تہ ميڊيا بگ بردار جي ويب سائيٽ تي ذخيرو ٿيل نہ هئي. براڊڪاسٽنگ سروسز ايڪٽ انٽرنيٽ مواد جي قاعدن لاءِ مهيا ڪري ٿو، ان ڪري انٽرنيٽ مواد سمجهيو وڃي، هن کي ظاهري طور تي سرور تي رهڻ کپي.
mt: ACMA also found that the video internet was running, but the Big Brother online content censorship law was not applied, as the media Big Brother's website was not stored. Broadcasting Services Act provides for Internet content standards, so Internet content is considered to be able to be on the server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "پيٽر ڪاسٽيلو، آسٽريليائي خزانچي ۽ وزير اعظم جان هاورڊ جي ڪاميابي جو سڀ کان وڌيڪ امڪان اهو ماڻهو آهي جنهن لبر پارٽي جي سربراه جي حيثيت سان آسٽريليا ۾ جوهري بجلي گهر جي پويان پنهنجي حمايت وجهي ڇڏي. مسٽر ڪوسٽيلو چيو تہ جڏهن جوهري بجلي گهر معاشي طور تي لاڀائتو ٿي ٿو تہ، آسٽريليا کي ان جو استعمال جاري رکڻ گهرجي. جيڪڏهن اهو ڪاروباري ٿي وڃي ٿو ته، اسان کي اهو ڪرڻ گهرجي. اهو ته، ايٽمي توانائي جو ڪو به بنيادي اعتراض ناهي"" مسٽر ڪوسٽيلو چيو."
mt: "Peter Costello, Australian Treasurer and Deputy Prime Minister John Howard's most likely successor, is the man who first supported the nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said when nuclear power is economically viable, Australia should use it. If it is commercially viable, we should do it. There is no fundamental objection to nuclear power," Mr Costello said."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: هڪ ڏينهن ۾ صرف اٺ تمغن جي دستياب هجڻ سان، ڪيترائي ملڪ ميڊل پوڊيم ٺاهڻ ۾ ناڪام ٿي ويا آهن. انهن نيدرلينڊ جي انا جوڪيمسن کي ڪلهہ Super-G ۾ وومين اسٽيندگ ڪلاس ۾ نائين پوزيشن ۾ شامل ڪن ٿا، ۽ انهيءِ تقريب ۾ فن لينڊ جي ڪاتجا سارينن کي ڏهين پوزيشن ۾ شامل ڪن ٿا. آسٽريليا جي مشیل گورلي مردن جي اسٽينڊنگ سپر-جي مقابلي ۾ 11 هين نمبر تي آيو، چيڪ جو مد مقابل اولڊرچ جيلنيڪ مردن جي سپر-جي ۾ سورهين نمبر تي مڪمل ڪيو. ميڪسيڪو جي آرلي ويلاسڪيز مردن جي سٽنگ سپر-جي ۾ پنجويهين نمبر تي ختم ڪيو. نيوزيلينڊ جو ايڊم هال مردن جي اسٽينڊنگ سپر-جي نائين نمبر تي ختم ڪيو. پولينڊ جا گهٽ نظر وارو اسڪائير ماچائي ڪريزيل ۽ رهنما اينا اوگرزينسڪا Super-G ۾ تيرنهن نمبر تي هئا. ڏکڻ ڪوريا جي جونگ سيورڪ پارڪ مردن جي سٽنگ Super-G ۾ چويهہ نمبر تي هو.
mt: Only eight medals were available in one day, and many countries failed to win any. The Netherlands' Anouk van der Vliet finished ninth in the women's Super-G, and Finland's Katri Koivuniemi finished tenth. Australia's Michael Gough finished 11th in the men's Super-G, Czech Republic's Oldrich Jirasek finished 16th in the men's Super-G, Mexico's Ariel Weidert finished 15th in the men's Super-G, New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's Super-G, Poland's Marek Myśkiewicz and Anna Ogrodzka finished 13th in the Super-G, and South Korea's Jung Seok Park finished 14th in the men's Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "برمنگهم ڪرائون ڪورٽ ۾ مقدمو هليو ۽ 3 آگسٽ تي ختم ٿيو. پيش ٿيندڙ، جيڪو واقعي واري حد تي گرفتار ٿيو، جنهن حملي جي ذميواري قبول نہ ڪئي ۽ دعويٰ ڪيو تہ هن ڪاٺ جو ڏنڊو ٽيهہ ماڻهن پاران بوتلن سان حملي کي روڪڻ لاءِ استعمال ڪيو هو. بليڪ تي انصاف کي تبديل ڪرڻ جي ڪوشش جو الزام پڻ هو. جج بليڪ کي ٻڌايو اهو ""بلڪل اڻ ٽر"" هو هن کي جيل موڪلي رهيا هئا."
mt: "The case was heard at Birmingham Crown Court and ended on 3 August. The defendant, who was arrested at the scene, did not accept responsibility for the attack and claimed he had used a water cannon to stop a bottle attack. There was also an allegation of an attempt to change justice in black. Judge Black said the "completely untried" was being held in prison."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: بالي واري پيش نامي تي ٻين موضوعن ۾ دنيا جا ٻيا بچيل جهنگ بچائڻ ۽ ترقي ڪندڙ قومن کي گهٽ آلودگي ڦهلائڻ وارن طريقن سان ترقي ڪرڻ ۾ ٽيڪنالاجي جي حصيداري ڪرڻ شامل آهن. گڏيل قومن جو ادارو گلوبل وارمنگ مان متاثر ٿيل ملڪن کي ان جي اثرن کي منهن ڏيڻ لاءِ فنڊ کي حتمي شڪل ڏيڻ جي اميد ڪري ٿو. رقم ٻوڏ کان بچڻ وارا گهر، بهترين پاڻي جو انتظام ۽ فصلن جا مختلف قسم پوکڻ ڏانهن وڃي سگهي ٿي.
mt: Other issues on the agenda include helping the world's remaining wild tigers and helping developing nations to progress with low-carbon technologies. The United Nations hopes to finalize funding to help affected countries cope with the effects of climate change. The money could go toward things like building flood-resistant homes, better water management and growing different types of crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "نائيجيريا پهريان هن اجلاس جي ختم ٿيڻ تي AfCFTA ۾ شامل ٿيڻ جي ارادي جو اعلان ڪيو. AU ٽريڊ ۽ انڊسٽري جي ڪمشنر البرٽ مُچانگا اعلان ڪيو ته بينن شامل ٿيڻ وارو هو. ڪمشنر چيو تہ، ""اسان اڃا تائين بنياد جي اصولن ۽ ٽيرف جي ڇوٽ تي اتفاق نہ ڪيو آهي، پر اسان وٽ جيڪو فريم ورڪ آهي اهو 1 جولائي 2020 تي واپار شروع ڪرڻ جي لاءِ ٺيڪ آهي""."
mt: "Nigeria was the first to announce its intention to join the AfCFTA at the end of this meeting. AU Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Muchanga announced that it was already included. The Commissioner said, "We have not yet agreed on the principles and terms of the foundation, but what we have is a framework that is ready to start trade on July 1, 2020." "
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: هن اٽلانٽا ۾ رهندي عزت ڪمائي ۽ جديد شهري تعليم جي لاءِ سڃاتي ويئي هئي. 2009 ۾ هن کي نيشنل سپرنٽينڊنٽ آف دي ايئر جو لقب ڏنو ويو. انعام ورهائڻ جي وقت، ايٽلانٽا اسڪولن کي ٽيسٽ جي اسڪورن تي هڪ وڏي تبديلي ڏسڻ ۾ آئي. انهيءِ وقت ٿوري دير کانپوءِ، اٽلانٽا جرنل ڪانسٽي ٽيوشن هڪ رپورٽ ڇاپي جنهن ۾ ٽيسٽ جي نتيجن جا مسئلا بيان ڪيا ويا. رپورٽ ظاهر ڪيو تہ ٽيسٽ جا اسڪور غير ظاهر طور تي تيزي سان وڌي ويا آهن. ۽ الزام لڳايو تہ اسڪول کي اندروني طور تي مسئلا لڌا پر ان نتيجن تي عمل نہ ڪيو. پوءِ ثبوت مان ظاهر ٿيو ته ٽيسٽ پيپرن جي هال سان ڇيڙ ڇاڙ ڪئي وئي هئي، تعليم جي 34 ٻين آفيسرن سان گڏ، 2013 ۾ فرد جرم لاڳو ڪيو ويو هو.
mt: She was known for her commitment to education and urban renewal in Atlanta. In 2009, she was awarded the National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools were seeing a large increase in test scores on the state's standardized tests. Shortly after, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that detailed problems with the test scores. The report alleged that the schools had been alerted to problems with the scores, but did not act on them. Evidence later emerged that the test papers had been altered, along with 34 other administrators, a criminal complaint was filed in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: هڪ بم دهماڪو گورنر جنرل جي آفيس جي ٻاهران ٿيو. ٻن ڪلاڪن جي عرصي ۾ سرڪاري عمارتن جي ويجهو وڌيڪ ٽي بم ڌماڪا ٿيا. ڪجهہ سرڪاري رپورٽن موجب مرڻ وارن جو انگ اٺ ٿي ويو، ۽ سرڪاري رپورٽون ان ڳالهہ جي پڪ ڪن ٿيون تہ 30 ماڻهو زخمي ٿيا هئا، پر اڃا تائين مڪمل انگن جي خبر نہ پئي آهي.
mt: A bomb blast occurred outside the Governor General's office. In the next two hours, more than three bombs exploded near government buildings. Official reports say eight people were killed, and official reports say that 30 people were injured, but the full numbers are not yet known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21 ساله عيسي گذريل سال جنوري 2017 ۾ رپورٽ ٿيل 27 ملين پائونڊ جي فيس لاءِ برازيل ڪلب پالميراس کان مانچسٽر سٽي ۾ شامل ٿيو. ان کان وٺي، برازيلي ڪلب جي لاءِ سڀني مقابلن ۾ 53 ميچن ۾ نمائندگي ڪئي ۽ 25 گول اسڪور ڪيا آهن.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus was reported to have signed a £27 million fee with Brazilian club Palmeiras to Manchester City in January 2017. Since then, the Brazilian club has represented all competitions with 53 matches and 25 goals scored.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: مڪاني وقت صبح 10 وڳي اسلام جي مقدس شهر مڪي ۾ هڪ هاسٽل ڊهي پئي. هن جڳهہ ۾ ڪيترن ئي هاجين کي رهائش ڏني وئي جيڪي حج جي رات تي پاڪ شهر جو دورو ڪرڻ آيا. هاسٽل جي مهمانن جي گهڻائي گڏيل عرب امارات جي شهرين جي هئي. مرڻ وارن جو انگ گهٽ ۾ گهٽ 15 آهي، انگ وڌڻ جو امڪان آهي.
mt: 10 a.m. local time, a hotel collapsed in the holy city of Mecca, Saudi Arabia. The hotel was housing many pilgrims who came to visit the city during the night of Hajj. Most of the guests were from the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is currently at 15, but is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: سيٽلائيٽ انهن ٻنهي جو وزن 1،000 پائونڊ کا مٿي هو، ۽ تقريباً 17،500 ميل في ڪلاڪ جي رفتار سان سفر ڪري رهيو هو، زمين کان 491 ميل مٿي ٽڪرايو. سائنسدانن جو چوڻ آهي تہ ٽڪراءَ جي ڪري ڌماڪو وڏو هو. اهي اڃا تائين اهو ڳولڻ جي ڪوشش ڪري رهيا آهن تہ حادثو ڪيڏو وڏو هو ۽ زمين تي ڪيئن اثر پوندو. U.S. جي بچاءُ وري آفيس جي آمريڪي اسٽريٽجڪ ڪمانڊ ڍير جو پتو لڳائي رهي آهي. تجزيو رٿڻ جو نتيجو هڪ عوامي ويب سائيٽ تي پوسٽ ڪيو ويندو.
mt: The two satellites weighed 1,000 pounds each, and were traveling at about 17,500 miles per hour, 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the collision created a large explosion. They are still trying to figure out how big the accident was and what effect it had on the ground. The U.S. Strategic Command is tracking the debris. The results of the investigation will be posted on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: بيٽن کي 2008ع جي 400 امير ترين آمريڪين جي فهرست ۾ 2.3 بلين ڊالر جي ملڪيت سان 190 هين نمبر تي رکيو يو هو. هِن 1950 ۾ يونيورسٽي آف ورجينيا جي ڪاليج آف آرٽس ۽ سائنسز مان گريجويشن ڪئي ۽ انهي اداري لاءِ هڪ اهم ڊونر هو.
mt: 2008 Forbes list of the 400 richest Americans ranked him at number 190 with a net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's College of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and was a major donor to the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: "ڪيليفورنيا جي گورنر آرنلڊ شوارزنيگر قانون ۾ هڪ بل پاس ڪيو جيڪو ننڍڙن ٻارڙن تي تشدد واري ويڊيو گيمن جي وڪري يا ڪرائي تي پابندي هڻي ٿو. بل جي حساب سان ڪيليفورنيا رياست ۾ وڪامجندڙ تشدد واريون وڊيو گيمز کي ڊيڪل ريڊنگ جو ليبل ""18"" لڳايو ويندو ۽ ٻارن کي وڪڻڻ سزا جوڳو هوندو جنهن جو ڏنڊ 1000 آمريڪي ڊالر في ڏوه تي هوندو."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill into law that exempts sales or rentals of violent video games to minors. The bill requires California retailers to label violent video games with a "18" rating and prohibits the sale of violent video games to minors, with a fine of up to $1000 per violation."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "ڊيوول، جيڪو شادي شده ۽ ٻن ٻارن جو پي آهي، ملر کي مطمعين نه ڪري سگهيو، جنهن سان ڪهاڻي لاڳاپيل هئي. جڏهن ملر کان تبصري لاءِ پڇيو ويو تہ چيائين ""مائيڪ ٻڌڻ جي دوران گهڻو ڳالهائي ٿو...آئون تيار ٿي رهيو هئس ان ڪري آئون واقعي نہ ٻڌي رهيو هئس تہ هي ڇا چئي رهيو هو."""
mt: "Devul, who is married and has two children, was unable to identify the man, with whom he had a relationship. When asked to describe the man, he said, "I talk a lot while listening to music...I was ready to go, so I didn't really hear what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "وزير ايظم اسٽيفن هارپر PMO ۾ NDP اڳواڻ جيڪ ليٽن سان اڱاري جي ڏينهن 25 منٽن جي ميٽنگ کانپوءِ، ٻيو بل پيش ڪرڻ کان پهرين، حڪومت جو ""ڪلين ايئر ايڪٽ"" کي جائزي لاءِ ٻين آل پارٽي ڪميٽي ڏانهن موڪلڻ تي متفق ٿيو آهي. ليٽن وزير اعظم سان ميٽنگ جي دوران ڪنزرويٽو جي ماحول واري بل ۾ تبديلين جو عرض ڪندي ڪنزرويٽو پارٽي جي ماحول واري بل کي ""سراسر ۽ مڪمل ٻيهر بهتر بڻائڻ"" جو عرض ڪيو. جڏهن کان وفاقي حڪومت ڊيونپورٽ، تسمانيا ۾ ميرسي اسپتال جي فنڊنگ کي سنڀالڻ شروع ڪيو، ته رياست حڪومت ۽ ڪجهه وفاقي پارليامينٽ جي ميمبرن هن عمل تي نومبر ۾ وفاقي چونڊ ڪرائڻ لاءِ هڪ چال طور تنقيد ڪئي. پر وزير اعظم جان هاوررڊ چيو آهي ته اهو عمل فقط اضافي 45 ملين ڊالر جي ڏيڻ ۾، اسپتال جي سهولتن کي تسمانيا جي حڪومت پاران ڊائونگريڊ ٿيڻ کان تحفظ مهيا ڪرڻ لاءِ هو."

ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: "وزير ايظم اسٽيفن هارپر PMO ۾ NDP اڳواڻ جيڪ ليٽن سان اڱاري جي ڏينهن 25 منٽن جي ميٽنگ کانپوءِ، ٻيو بل پيش ڪرڻ کان پهرين، حڪومت جو ""ڪلين ايئر ايڪٽ"" کي جائزي لاءِ ٻين آل پارٽي ڪميٽي ڏانهن موڪلڻ تي متفق ٿيو آهي. ليٽن وزير اعظم سان ميٽنگ جي دوران ڪنزرويٽو جي ماحول واري بل ۾ تبديلين جو عرض ڪندي ڪنزرويٽو پارٽي جي ماحول واري بل کي ""سراسر ۽ مڪمل ٻيهر بهتر بڻائڻ"" جو عرض ڪيو. جڏهن کان وفاقي حڪومت ڊيونپورٽ، تسمانيا ۾ ميرسي اسپتال جي فنڊنگ کي سنڀالڻ شروع ڪيو، ته رياست حڪومت ۽ ڪجهه وفاقي پارليامينٽ جي ميمبرن هن عمل تي نومبر ۾ وفاقي چونڊ ڪرائڻ لاءِ هڪ چال طور تنقيد ڪئي. پر وزير اعظم جان هاوررڊ چيو آهي ته اهو عمل فقط اضافي 45 ملين ڊالر جي ڏيڻ ۾، اسپتال جي سهولتن کي تسمانيا جي حڪومت پاران ڊائونگريڊ ٿيڻ کان تحفظ مهيا ڪرڻ لاءِ هو."

src: ٻئي سائنيورڪ ايسڊ ۽ ميلامائن پالتو جانورن جي پيشاب جي نمونن ۾ مليا جيڪي آلوده پالتو کاڌو کائڻ کان پوءِ مري ويا. يونيورسٽي جي تحقيقدانن ٻڌايو تہ، ٻہ مرڪب هڪ ٻي سان رد عمل ڪري ڪرسٽلز ٺاهين ٿا جيڪو بڪي جي ڪم ۾ رڪاوٽ وجهي سگهي ٿو. تحقيق ڪارن ٻلي جي پيشاب ۾ ٺهندڙ ڪرسٽرلز جو معائنو ڪيو جنهن ۾ ميلامائن ۽ سائنورڪ ايسڊ مليا. انهن ڪرسٽلز جي جوڙجڪ متاثر ٿيل پالتو جانورن جي پيشاب مان مليل سان ميچ ڪري ٿي جڏهن انفراريڊ اسپيڪٽرواسڪوپي (FTIR) جي ذريعي ڀيٽايو ويو.
mt: 2nd year students of the University of California, Berkeley, found that two compounds react with each other to form crystals that interfere with the function of the kidneys. The researchers analyzed the crystals formed in the urine of the two animals, which matched the compounds found in the urine of the affected animals when analyzed by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "زنهوا چيو ته سرڪاري جاچ ڪندڙن اربع تي ٻه ’بليڪ باڪس‘ رڪارڊر بازيافت ڪيا آهن. ساٿي پهلوان پڻ لونا کي خراج تحسين پيش ڪيو. ٽومي ڊريمر چيو ""لونا پڇاڙي جي پهرين راڻي هئي. منهنجي پهرين مئنيجر. لونا ٻہ چنڊ واري رات گذاري ويئي. ان وانگر سهڻي بي نظير."" ڊسٽن ""گولڊسٽ"" رنيلز تبصرو ڪيو ته ""لونا به اوترو ئي ڊڄڻي هئي جيترو آئون آهيان، شايد اِن کان به وڌيڪ... هُن سان پيار ڪريان ٿو ۽ هن کي ياد ڪندس... اميد آهي ته هُو بهتر جڳهه تي هوندي."""
mt: "It was said that the official investigators found two 'black boxes' on the fourth floor. The partner praised the luna. Tommy Drimer said, "Luna was the first queen of the Pehlavi. My first manager. Luna spent two nights like a two-moon night. Like Sunny, the incomparable." Dustin "Goldst" Renolds commented that "Luna was just as dogged as I was, maybe even more... I love her and remember her... I hope she is in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: جڏهن ڪار ان کي متاثر ڪيو جيتوڻيڪ ٽي ماڻهو گهر جي اندر هئا، انهن مان ڪنهن کي به ڪوبه نقصان نه رسيو. جيتوڻيڪ، ڊرائيور کي مٿي ۾ ڀاري زخم ٿيا. حادثي واري رستي کي عارضي طور تي بند ڪيو ويو هو جڏهن تہ هنگامي خدمتن ڊرائيور کي ڳاڙهي Audi TT کان ٻاهر ڪڍيو. شروع ۾ هن کي گريٽ يارموٿ جي جيمس پيجيٽ اسپتال داخل ڪيو ويو هو. هن کي بعد ۾ ڪيمبرج جي ايڊن بروڪ جي اسپتال ڏانهن منتقل ڪيو ويو هو.
mt: When the car hit him, although three people were inside the house, none of them were injured. However, the driver sustained head injuries. The road was closed temporarily while emergency services removed the driver from his Audi TT. He was initially taken to Great Yarmouth's James Paget Hospital. He was later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: رانديون سٺي موسم سان گڏ صبح 10:00 وڳي شروع ٿيون ۽ ان کان علاوه صبح سوير هلڪي ڦڙ ڦڙ هئي جيڪو بعد ۾ صاف ٿي ويئي، اهو 7 رگبي جي لاءِ بهترين ڏينهن هويو. ٽورنامينٽ جي ٽاپ سيڊز ڏکڻ آفريقا صحيح نوٽ تي ان وقت شروع ڪيو جڏهن انهن 5 سيڊيڊ زيمبيا جي خلاف 26 - 00 سان آساني سان ڪاميابي ماڻي. پنهنجين ڏکڻ واري ڀينرن جي خلاف راند ۾ ڪمزور نظر ايندي، جيئن ئي ٽورنامينٽ اڳتي هليو ڏکڻ آفريڪا ۾ مستقل طور تي بهتري آئي. انهن جو قاعدي وارو دفاع، بال جهلڻ جو هنر ۽ بهترين ٽيم ورڪ انهن کي نيارو رکي ٿو ۽ اها ڳالهہ صاف هئي تہ اهو هار ڏيڻ واري ٽيم هئي.
mt: The match started at 10:00 am in good weather and in addition there was a light drizzle which later cleared, making it a good day for rugby. The tournament's top seeds South Africa started off on the right foot when they easily beat Zimbabwe 26-0. In their southern hemisphere match, they looked weak, as the tournament progressed South Africa continued to improve. Their solid defense, ball handling skills and best team work keep them in the game and it was clear that they were the underdogs.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: گذريل ٽن ڏهاڪن دوران، باضابطه طور تي ڪميونسٽ رياست رهڻ باوجود، چين هڪ مارڪيٽ معيشت ڊولپ ڪئي. پهريان معاشي سُڌارا ڊينگ شائوپنگ جي سربراهي ۾ ڪيا ويا هئا. ان کان وٺي، چين جي معاشي سائيز 90 ڀيرا وڌي چڪي آهي. پهريون ڀيرو، گذريل سال چين جرمني جي ڀيٽ ۾ وڌيڪ ڪارون برآمد ڪيون ۽ اِنهي انڊسٽري لاءِ سڀ وڏي منڊي جي حيثيت ۾ آمريڪا کان اڳتي وڌي ويو. چين جي GDP ٻن ڏهاڪن اندر آمريڪا کان وڏي ٿي سگهي ٿي.
mt: In the last three decades, despite officially being a communist state, China has developed a market economy. First economic reforms were made under Deng Xiaoping's leadership. Since then, China's economy has grown 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States in the industry, becoming the world's largest car market.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: """اسان ڪاربان ڊائي آڪسائيڊ جي نيڪال کي GDP جي في يونٽ جي 2005 جي سطح کان 2020 تائين نمايان مارجن گهٽ ڪرڻ جي ڪوشش ڪنداسين،"" هو چيو. هن ڪٽس لاءِ ڪو انگ اکر اهو چئي سيٽ نه ڪيو ته، اهي چين جي اِقتصادي پيداوار جي بُنياد تي سيٽ ڪيا ويندا. ایڇ يو ترقي ڪندڙ ملڪن جي حوصلا افزائي ڪئي ته هو ""پهريان آلودگيءَ ڪري ۽ پوءِ سفائي ڪرڻ واري پراڻي طريقي کان پاسو ڪن."" هن اضافو ڪيو ته ""جيتوڻيڪ، انهن کي اهي فرض کڻڻ لاءِ چوڻ گهرجي جيڪي ترقياتي اسٽيج، ذميواري ۽ قابليت کان بالاتر وڃن ٿا."""
mt: "We will try to reduce the carbon dioxide emissions that are equivalent to 2005 GDP by 2020," he said. He did not give a specific figure, but said the targets would be based on China's economic output. The EU urged developing countries to "take the lead in cleaning up and catching up" with the old "pollute first, clean up later" approach. He added that "although they should be given the responsibility to take the lead in the transition, the capacity and ability of developing countries are far beyond that."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: """اسان ڪاربان ڊائي آڪسائيڊ جي نيڪال کي GDP جي في يونٽ جي 2005 جي سطح کان 2020 تائين نمايان مارجن گهٽ ڪرڻ جي ڪوشش ڪنداسين،"" هو چيو. هن ڪٽس لاءِ ڪو انگ اکر اهو چئي سيٽ نه ڪيو ته، اهي چين جي اِقتصادي پيداوار جي بُنياد تي سيٽ ڪيا ويندا. ایڇ يو ترقي ڪندڙ ملڪن جي حوصلا افزائي ڪئي ته هو ""پهريان آلودگيءَ ڪري ۽ پوءِ سفائي ڪرڻ واري پراڻي طريقي کان پاسو ڪن."" هن اضافو ڪيو ته ""جيتوڻيڪ، انهن کي اهي فرض کڻڻ لاءِ چوڻ گهرجي جيڪي ترقياتي اسٽيج، ذميواري ۽ قابليت کان بالاتر وڃن ٿا."""
mt: "We will try to reduce the carbon dioxide emissions that are equivalent to 2005 GDP by 2020," he said. He did not give a specific figure, but said the targets would be based on China's economic output. The EU urged developing countries to "take the lead in cleaning up and catching up" with the old "pollute first, clean up later" approach. He added that "although they should be given the responsibility to take the lead in the transition, the capacity and ability of developing countries are far beyond that."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "ميڊيڪل چيريٽي منگولا، ميڊيسنز سنس فرنٽيئرس ۽ صحت جي عالمي ادارو چئي ٿو تہ اهو ملڪ ۾ بدترين وبائي مرض رڪارڊ ڪيو ويو آهي. ميڊيسنس سانس فرنٽتيري جي ترجمان رچرڊ ويرمين چيو تہ، ""انگولا سڀ کان وڌيڪ بدترين وبا جي طرف وڃي رهيو آهي ۽ انگولا ۾ صورت تمام گهڻي خراب آهي""."
mt: "Medical Charity Medecins Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organization say the country has the worst record of any for infectious disease. Medecins Sans Frontieres spokesman Richard Werme said, ""Angola is the worst country in the world for infectious disease and the situation in Angola is very bad."""
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: سرڪاري مقدمن جي ڊائريڪٽر ڪيئر اسٽارمر QC اڄ صبح هڪ بيان ڏنو جنهن ۾ هيون ۽ پرائس ٻنهي جي خلاف مقدمي جو اعلان ڪيو. هيوهني استعيفيٰ ڏني آهي ۽ ڪابينا ۾ ان کي ايڊ ڊيوي MP سان تبديل ڪيو ويندو. نورمين ليمب MP ڊيوي جي خالي ٿيندڙ بزنس منسٽر ڊيوٽي سنڀالڻ جي متوقع آهي. هونهي ۽ پرائس جو 16 فيبروري تي ويسٽ منسٽر مئجسٽريٽس ڪورٽ ۾ پيش ٿيڻ جو شيڊيول آهي.
mt: The government's QC director, Keir Starmer QC, announced this morning that he had filed a complaint and a private prosecution against both Hewson and Price. Hewson has filed a defence and the cabinet is expected to replace him with Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take over as business minister from Davey. The hearing for Hewson and Price is scheduled for February 16 at the West Midlands Magistrates Court.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "ڪيملي سينٽ سينز فرانسيسي اوپيرا ۾ پيش ڪيل ڪهاڻي هڪ فنڪار جي آهي ""جنهن جي زندگي منشيات ۽ جاپان سان پيار تي بيان ڪيل آهي."" ان جي نتيجي ۾، اداڪار اسٽيج تي ڀنگ جي تماڪ ڇڪيندا هئا، ۽ ٿيٽر خود به خود سامعين کي شامل ٿيڻ لاءِ همٿائي رهيو آهي."
mt: "The story of a performer whose life is told through her love of the arts and Japan" was performed at the French opera house, Camille Saint-Saëns. This led to actors on stage being intoxicated, and the theater itself was self-promoting to include the audience.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "ليونوو جنهن کي ""ڪاسموناٽ نمبر 11"" جي نالي سان بہ سڃاتو وڃي ٿو، جيڪو سويت يونين جي ڪاسموناٽس جي اصل ٽيم جو حصو هو. 18 مارچ 1995 تي، هن پهريون ڀيرو انسانن جي خلائي جهاز جي ٻاهريان سرگرمي (EVA) يا ""خلا ۾ هلڻ"" بجاءِ آڻيو، جنهن ۾ هي اڪيلو خلائي جهاز کان ٻاهر 12 منٽن کان مٿي رهيو. هن پنهنجي ڪم لاءِ، ""هيرو آف سويئيٽ يونين"" جو اعليٰ ترين اعزاز حاصل ڪيو. ڏه سالن کانپوءِ، هن اپولو-سويوز مشن جي سويت حصي جي اڳواڻي ڪئي جنهن جو اشارو آهي تہ خلائي ريس ختم ٿي ويئي."
mt: "Leonov, who is also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11," was a member of the original Soviet Cosmonaut team. On March 18, 1995, he became the first human to perform an EVA, or "spacewalk," outside a spacecraft, remaining outside the craft for 12 minutes. He received the highest award for his work, "Hero of the Soviet Union." Five years later, he led the Soviet portion of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, which was a sign that the space race was over."
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "حادثو پيش اچڻ کان پوءِ، گبسن کي اسپتال منتقل ڪيو ويو پر ڪجهه دير بعد فوت ٿي ويو. ٽرڪ ڊرائيور جيڪو 64 سالن جي عمر جو آهي اهو زخمي نہ ٿيو. انهيءِ ڏينهن تقريبن 1200 GMT تي گاڏي پاڻ ئي حادثي جي هنڌ کان هٽي ويئي. جتي حادثو پيش آيو ان جي ويجهو هڪ گيراج ۾ ڪم ڪندڙ شخص چيو: ""هتي ٻار روڊ پار ڪرڻ جو انتظار ڪري رهيا هئا ۽ اهي سڀئي رڙيون ڪري رهيا هئا ۽ دانهون ڪري رهيا هئا."" جتي حادثو ٿيو هو اتان اهي سڀ واپس ڀڄي ويا."
mt: "After the accident, Gibson was taken to hospital but later died. The truck driver, who is 64 years old, was not injured. The truck itself drove away from the scene of the accident around 1200 GMT. A worker at a nearby garage said: "We were all waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" The truck was driven away from the scene of the accident.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: ڪيل ڪم گهڻو ڪري علمي هو، پر هي پروگرام برج جي ڪهڪشان کان ٺهيل مشاهدن کي تقليڊ جي لاءَ لکيو ويو هو. ٽيم جنهن اثر جي ڳولا ۾ هئي ان جو ڪارڻ ڪهڪشان جي اُونداهي واري مادي ۽ آڪاش ندي جو اُونداهي واري مادي جي وچ ۾ لهرن جون قوتون آهن. جيئن چنڊ زمين تي کي ڇڪڻ جو زور لڳائي ٿو تہ، ڇوليو پيدا ٿين ٿيون، اهڙي طرح آڪاس ندي سيگيٽيريئس ڪهڪشان تي زور ڏي ٿي. سائنسدان اهو نتيجو ڪڍڻ ۾ ڪامياب ٿيا تہ انڌيري وارو مادو ٻي انڌيري واري مادي کي ساڳئي طرح اثر انداز ڪري ٿو جيئن عام مادو ڪري ٿو. اهو نظريو ٻڌائي ٿو تہ ڪهڪشان جي چوڌاري ڪارو مادو ڪهڪشان جي چوڌاري هڪ قسم جي هالو ۾ قائم آهي، ۽ اهو تمام ننڍن زرڙن جا ٺهيل آهن.
mt: The program was mostly scientific in nature, but this paper was written to put the observations in the context of tradition. The team was studying the effect of the solar wind, which is a stream of charged particles emanating from the sun, and the solar wind's interaction with the Earth's magnetosphere. As the sun pulls on the Earth, it creates magnetic fields that push back, and this creates a region of space called the magnetosphere. The solar wind is made of charged particles, and when it hits the magnetosphere, it creates a magnetic field that is similar to the Earth's magnetic field, but much smaller. The solar wind is also made of charged particles, and when it hits the magnetosphere, it creates a magnetic field that is similar to the Earth's magnetic field, but much smaller. The solar wind is also made of charged particles, and when it hits the magnetosphere, it creates a magnetic field that is similar to the Earth's magnetic field, but much smaller.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: "سومانڊي طوفان قطرينا جي اٿڻ ۾ امدادي ۽ نئين سر تعمير تي خرچ ڪرڻ تي بحث کي تڪرار پاران وڌايو ويو؛ جنهن کي ڪجهہ مالي مخالفن ""بش نيو آرلينز ڊيلز""جو مزاقي ليبل لڳايو آهي. نئين سر اڏاوت جي ڪوشش جي آزاد تنقيد پروڙيل واشنگٽن جي ماڻهن کي نئين سر اڏاوت جي معاهدا ڏيڻ تي توجہ آهي."
mt: "Sunday's Hurricane Katrina relief and rebuilding spending was criticized by some as wasteful; some financial opponents have been labeled "Bash New Orleans Deals" by some. The new construction deal's free criticism has drawn attention to the new construction deal's contract."
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: جڏهن ڪئپسول صبح 5 وڳي (مشرقي وقت) زمين تي پهچي ٿو ۽ فضا ۾ داخل ٿي ٿو ته، اتر ڪيليفورنيا، اوريگون نيواڊا، ۽ يوٽها ۾ ماڻهن جي لاءِ لائٽ شو پيش ڪرڻ جي اميد ڪئي وڃي ٿي. ڪيپسول بلڪل ٽٽندڙ تاري وانگر گهڻو نظر ايندو جيڪو آسمان ۾ هلي ٿو. ڪيپسول اٽڪل 12.8 ڪلوميٽر يا 8 ميل في سيڪنڊ جو سفر ڪندو، هڪ منٽ ۾ سان فرانسسڪو کان لاس اينجلس وڃڻ لاءِ گهڻو تيز آهي. اپارلو X ڪمانڊر ماڊيول جي موٽڻ جي دوران مئي 1969 ۾ پوئين رڪارڊ کي ٽوڙيندي اسٽار ڊسٽ زمين تي واپس موٽڻ وارو سڀني کان تيز خلائي جهاز هجڻ جو رڪارڊ قائم ڪندو. اسٽار ڊسٽ جي پروجيڪٽ مئنيجر ٽام ڊڪسبري چيو تہ، “اتر ڪيليفورنيا جي الهندي ساحل جي مٿي هلندو ۽ ڪيليفورنيا کان آسمان مان روشني سينٽرل اوريگون ۽ نواڊا ۽ اڊاهو کان ٿيندي اوٺا تائين ويندي”.
mt: When the capsule touches down at around 5 a.m. (PDT) and enters the atmosphere, people in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah can hope to see a light show. The capsule looks like a fading star as it moves across the sky. The capsule travels at about 12.8 kilometers or 8 miles per second, a very fast speed for a journey from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. The Apollo X command module set a record for the fastest return to Earth when it landed in May 1969, breaking the previous record set by the Starship Enterprise. Starship Enterprise project manager Tom DcKsberry said, "The light show will start in Northern California and move eastward, and will be visible in California, Central Oregon and Nevada, and will end in Utah."
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: اوهاوي اختيارين چيو ته، هڪ ڊاڪٽر جيڪو پٽس برگ پنسلوانيا جي ٻارن جي اسپتال ۾ ڪم ڪندو هو، جنهن جي ماءُ اربع ڏينهن تي پنهنجي گاڏي جي ڊڪي ۾ مرده ملڻ بعد قتل و غارت جو الزام عائد ڪيو ويندوئ ڊاڪٽر مالار بالاسبرامانيان، 29 سال، بليو ايش، اوهويو ۾، سنسناتي جي تقريبن 15 ميل اتر جي هڪ دامن ۾، ظاهري طور تي وڏي پيماني تي دوا آميز حالت ۾ روڊ جي ڀرسان هڪ ٽي شرٽ ۽ چڊي ۾ زمين تي ليٽيل مليو هو. هن پنهنجي آفيسر کي پنهنجي اولڊس موبائل انٽرگ ڏانهن موڪليو جيڪو 500 فٽ پري هئي. اُتي، انهن کي 53 سال جي سروجا بالا سبرميڻين جي لاش رتو رت ٿيل ڪمبلن سان ڍڪيل ملي. پوليس چيو تہ مليل لاش هتي اٽڪل هڪ ڏينهن کان موجود آهي.
mt: Authorities say a doctor who worked at a children's hospital in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, was charged with murder and arson after his mother was found dead in her car four days after being reported missing. Dr. Mallar Balasubramanian, 29, of Blue Ash, Ohio, was found in a wooded area near Cincinnati, about 15 miles north, in what appeared to be a large amount of drugs. He had called his office from his old mobile phone, which was about 500 feet away. There, they found the body of his mother, 53-year-old Suraj Balasubramanian, wrapped in blankets and stuffed in a trunk. Police say the body was found here about a day ago.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: اهو eBay جي تاريخ ۾ سڀ کان وڏي حاصل ٿيندڙ ملڪيت آهي. ڪمپني اميد ڪري ٿي تہ اهو پنهنجي فائدي واري ذريعي کي وڌائي ۽ انهن علائقن ۾ مشهوري ماڻي جتي اسڪائپ سٺي بيهڪ رکي ٿو، جهڙوڪ چين، اوڀر يورپ، ۽ برازيل.
mt: It is the largest property sale in eBay's history. The company hopes to increase its profitability and gain popularity in areas where Skype has good penetration, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: لڙائي ختم ٿيڻ کانپوءَ جڏهن زخمين کي اسپتال منتقل ڪيو ويو، تہ باقي لڳ ڀڳ 40 قيدي اڱڻ ۾ هي رهيا ۽ پنهنجين ڪوٺڙين ۾ واپس وڃڻ لاءِ منع ڪئي. وچين ماڻهو حالت بهتر ڪرڻ جي ڪوشش ڪئي، پر قيدي جون گهرجون صاف ناهن. شام 10: 00-11: 00 MDT جي وچ ۾، مقينن پاران هڪ يارڊ ۾ باهه ڏني وئي وئي. جلد ئي، حفاظتي لباس پاتل آفيسر اڱڻ ۾ داخل ٿيا ۽ آنسو گيس سان ڏوهين کي گهيري ورتا. فائر ریسڪيو عملدارن نيٺ آخر رات 11:35 تي باهه کي وسائي ڇڏيو.
mt: After the fighting ended, when the wounded were transferred to the hospital, the remaining 40 prisoners were in a cage and prohibited from returning to their cells. The middle man tried to improve their condition, but the prisoners' clothes were not clean. Between 10:00 and 11:00 p.m. MDT, a yard was set on fire by inmates. Soon, protective clothing entered the cage and took the prisoners with tear gas. Firefighters finally extinguished the fire at 11:35 p.m.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "ٽيلي ويزن تي لائيو تبصرا پهرين ڀيرو ٿيا هئا جڏهن ايران جي سينيئر عملدار اهو مڃيو تہ پابندين جو ڪو اثر ٿي رهيو آهي. اهي مالي پابنديون ۽ يورپين يونين کان کان خام تيل جي درآمد تي پاپنديون شامل ڪن ٿا، جنهن سان ايراني معيشت کي پنهنجي غير ملڪي آمدني جو 80% حاصل ٿئي ٿو. پنهنجي حاليه مهاني رپورٽ ۾، OPEC چيو آهي ته خام تيل جي برآمد ٻن ڏهاڪن تائين 2.8 ملين بيرل في ڏينهن جي سطح تي پنهنجي گھٽ ترين سطح تي پهچي چڪي آهي. ملڪ جي روحاني پيشوا آیت اللہ علی خامنائي چيو تہ 1979 ۾ ايران جي اسلامي انقلاب کان پهرين کان وٺي تيل تي ڀاڙڻ ""هڪ ڄار "" آهي جنهن مان ملڪ کي پنهنجو پاڻ کي آجو ڪرڻ گهرجي."
mt: "Comments on the oil market were first made when Iran's senior official said that the impact of sanctions is being felt. These economic sanctions and European Union sanctions on Iranian oil exports include a ban on Iranian oil exports, which account for 80% of Iran's foreign income. In its latest monthly report, OPEC said that crude oil exports have fallen to their lowest level in two decades, at 2.8 million barrels per day. Iran's spiritual leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said that the oil industry has been a "cancer" since the 1979 Islamic Revolution, and that the country must find its own way out of it."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: فرانس ۾، ووٽنگ روايتي طور تي گهٽ ٽيڪنالاجيءَ وارو هڪ تجربو آهي: ووٽر پنهنجو پاڻ کي بوٽ ۾ علحده ڪن ٿا، پنهنجي چونڊ اميدوار کي ظاهر ڪندڙ اڳ ۾ پرنٽ ٿيل ڪاغذ جي شيٽ لفافي ۾ وجهندا آهن. آفيسر ووٽر جي سڃاڻپ جي تصديق ڪري وٺندو آهي ته انکانپوءِ ووٽر لفافي کي بيلٽ باڪس ۾ وجهي ووٽنگ رول تي صحيح ڪندو آهي. فرانسيسي اليڪٽورل قانون ڪارواين کي سختي سان ترتيب ڏئي ٿو. 1988 کان وٺي، بيلٽ باڪس صاف هجڻ ضرور آهن تہ جيئن ووٽر ۽ نگران گواهي ڏيئي سگهن تہ شروع ڪرڻ مهل واجبي ڳڻيل ۽ منظور ٿيل ووٽرن کان علاوه ڪي بہ لفافا موجود نہ آهن ۽ ڪي بہ لفافا شامل نہ ڪيا ويا آهن. اميدوار عمل جي هر حصي جو ثبوت وٺڻ لاءِ نمائيندا موڪلي سگهن ٿا. شام جو، هڪ مخصوص طريقي ڪار تحت، ڳري نگراني هيٺ رضاڪارن پاران ووٽ ڳڻيا وڃن ٿا.
mt: In France, voting is a traditional low-tech experiment: voters put themselves in a booth, put their chosen candidate's printed sheet of paper in a ballot envelope, and an officer verifies the voter's identity before the voter puts the envelope in a ballot box. The French electoral law is strict. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be empty of any ballot envelopes except those of voters and officers who have signed and approved the ballots. Candidates can provide evidence of the process. In the evening, under a specific procedure, the votes are counted by volunteers.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: فرانس ۾، ووٽنگ روايتي طور تي گهٽ ٽيڪنالاجيءَ وارو هڪ تجربو آهي: ووٽر پنهنجو پاڻ کي بوٽ ۾ علحده ڪن ٿا، پنهنجي چونڊ اميدوار کي ظاهر ڪندڙ اڳ ۾ پرنٽ ٿيل ڪاغذ جي شيٽ لفافي ۾ وجهندا آهن. آفيسر ووٽر جي سڃاڻپ جي تصديق ڪري وٺندو آهي ته انکانپوءِ ووٽر لفافي کي بيلٽ باڪس ۾ وجهي ووٽنگ رول تي صحيح ڪندو آهي. فرانسيسي اليڪٽورل قانون ڪارواين کي سختي سان ترتيب ڏئي ٿو. 1988 کان وٺي، بيلٽ باڪس صاف هجڻ ضرور آهن تہ جيئن ووٽر ۽ نگران گواهي ڏيئي سگهن تہ شروع ڪرڻ مهل واجبي ڳڻيل ۽ منظور ٿيل ووٽرن کان علاوه ڪي بہ لفافا موجود نہ آهن ۽ ڪي بہ لفافا شامل نہ ڪيا ويا آهن. اميدوار عمل جي هر حصي جو ثبوت وٺڻ لاءِ نمائيندا موڪلي سگهن ٿا. شام جو، هڪ مخصوص طريقي ڪار تحت، ڳري نگراني هيٺ رضاڪارن پاران ووٽ ڳڻيا وڃن ٿا.
mt: In France, voting is a traditional low-tech experiment: voters put themselves in a booth, put their chosen candidate's printed sheet of paper in a ballot envelope, and an officer verifies the voter's identity before the voter puts the envelope in a ballot box. The French electoral law is strict. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be empty of any ballot envelopes except those of voters and officers who have signed and approved the ballots. Candidates can provide evidence of the process. In the evening, under a specific procedure, the votes are counted by volunteers.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: جيڪڏهن تصديق هجي ته، موساشي لاءِ الين جي اٺن سالن جي ڳولا مڪمل ٿئي ٿي. سامونڊي نَقشي سازي کان پوءِ، هڪ ROV استعمال ڪندي تباهه ٿيل جهاز مليو هو. دنيا جي سڀني امير ماڻهن مان هڪ، ايلن خبر تحت پنهنجي گهڻي دولت بحري ڳولا ۾ سيڙپ ڪئي ۽ سڄي زندگي لڙائي سان دلچسپي رکندڙ موساشي کي ڳولڻ جي پنهنجي جستجو شروع ڪئي.
mt: If confirmed, the search for the lost vessel will be complete after nine years. After a sonar survey, the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest men, Alan, under the guise of his philanthropic foundation, spent his entire life fascinated by war and the pursuit of his obsession, the wreck of the Musashi.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
