src: ٽيلي ويزن جون رپورٽون ڏيکارين ٿيون تہ ٻوٽي مان اڇو دونهون نڪري پيو. مقامي اختيارين پلانٽ جي ويجهو رهندڙ رهائشين کي خبردار ڪري رهيا آهن تہ پنهنجي گهرن ۾ رهن، ايئر ڪنڊيشنر بند ڪن ۽ ٽونٽي جو پاڻي نہ پئين. جاپان جي نيوڪليئر ايجنسي مطابق، ٻوٽي ۾ تابڪاري سيزيم ۽ آئيوڊين جي نشاندهي ڪئي وئي آهي. اختيارين جو اندازو آهي ته انهي مان ظاهر ٿئي ٿو ته سائيٽ تي يورينيم جي ايندڻ وارا ڪنٽينر ٿي سگهي ٿو ٽٽي ويا آهن ۽ ليڪ ڪري رهيا آهن.
mt: Reports from the plant say a white powder has fallen. Local authorities are warning residents near the plant to stay in their homes, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water. The Japanese nuclear agency has reported that the plant is emitting cesium and iodine. Authorities estimate that the plant may be leaking containers of uranium that have melted and are leaking.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "ڊاڪٽر ٽوني مول ڏکڻ آفريقا جي علائقي ڪوازولو-ناٽال ۾ انتهائي ڊرگ مزاحمتي ٽيوبر ڪلوسز (XDR-TB) دريافت ڪئي. هڪ انٽرويو ۾، هِن چيو ته ""نئون ويريئينٽ تمام گھڻي موت جي شرح جي ڪري تمام پريشان ڪندڙ ۽ خوفناڪ هو."" ڊاڪٽر مول جو خيال آهي تہ ٿي سگهي ٿو ڪجهہ مريضن بگ کي ڇهيو هوندو، ۽ گهٽ ۾ گهٽ ٻہ ڄڻا اسپتال جا صحت ڪارڪن هئا. هڪ سال جي عرصي ۾، هڪ متاثر ٿيندڙ شخص 10 کان 15 ويجهن رابطن کي متاثر ڪري سگهي ٿو. جيتوڻيڪ، ٽيوبرڪلوسز وارن مريضن جي سڄي گروپ ۾ XDR-TB جو سيڪڙو گهٽ ڏسڻ ۾ اچي ٿو. مجموعي طور تي 330،000 مان 6،000 ماڻهو ڏکڻ آفريڪا ۾ ڪنهن مخصوس وقت ۾ متاثر ٿيا."
mt: "Dr. Tony Moll received an extremely drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa. In an interview, he said, ""The new strain is very frightening and scary because of its high mortality rate."" Dr. Moll's concern is that some patients were treated with a placebo, and fewer and fewer health workers were available. In a year's time, an infected person can infect 10 to 15 close contacts. Although, the entire group of TB patients, the percentage of XDR-TB is decreasing. Overall, 330,000 people in South Africa were infected at some point."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen هڪ سسٽم آهي جنهن جا FAA دعويٰ ڪري ٿو تہ اهو هوائي جهاز کي ننڍن رستن تي اڏائڻ، هر سال لکين تيل جا گيلن بچائڻ، ڪاربان جو گهٽ خارج ڪرڻ ۾ مدد ڪري ٿو. ايئر ٽرئفڪ ڪنٽرولرز کي وڌ ۾ وڌ درستگي سان ايئر ڪرافٽ جي نشاندگي ڪرڻ ۽ پائلٽ کي وڌيڪ صحيح معلومات ڏيڻ جي لاءِ اهو زميني ريڊار جي پراڻي ٽيڪنالاجي کي ڇڏي سيٽلائيٽ تي ٻڌل ٽيڪنالاجي جو استعمال ڪري ٿو.
mt: NextGen is a system that the FAA claims will help aircraft fly shorter routes, save millions of gallons of fuel, and reduce carbon emissions each year. It will help air traffic controllers provide more accurate aircraft tracking and pilots more accurate information by using satellite-based technology instead of the ground-based radar technology of the past.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: تاريخ دانن ماضي جي FBI پاليسين تي تنقيد ڪئي آهي ته اجنسي جي ڪاميابي جي شرح کي مٿي کڻڻ لاءِ اهي صرف صرف اهڙن ڪيسن تي زور ڏئي رهيا آهن جيڪي حل ڪرڻ ۾ آسان آهن، خاص طور تي چوري ٿيل ڪارن وارا ڪيس. ڪانگريس مالي سال 2005 ۾ فحاشي واري منصوبي کي فنڊ ڏيڻ شروع ڪيو ۽ وضاحت ڪئي ته FBI کي 10 ايجنٽ بالغ فحاشي لاءِ وقف ڪرڻ گهرجن.
mt: Historians have criticized the agency for focusing only on cases that are easy to solve, particularly stolen cars. Congress began funding a prostitution program in fiscal year 2005 and explained that the FBI would devote 10 agents to adult prostitution.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: JAS 39C گرپين لڳ ڀڳ صبح 9:30 وڳي مقامي وقت (0230 UTC) تي رن وي تي تباه ٿيو، تنهن ڪري تجارتي اڏامن لاءِ هوائي اڏو بند ڪيو. پائلٽ جي سڃاڻپ اسڪواڊرن ليڊر دلوڪرت پاتاوي جي نالي سان ٿي هئي. مقامي ميڊيا رپورٽ ڏني تہ هوائي اڏي جي باهہ وسائڻ واري گاڏي ڪاروائي ڪندي ڪامياب ويئي.
mt: 9:30 a.m. local time (0230 UTC) a JAS 39C Gripen crashed on Runway 2, causing the airport to be closed to commercial traffic. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dolokrath Patavi. Local media reported that the aircraft was successfully brought to a stop after a hard landing.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: 1960 واري ڏهاڪي ۾، جان ايف ڪينيڊي لاءِ برزيزنسڪي هن جو صلاحڪار طور ڪم ڪيو ۽ پوءِ لينڊن بي جونسن جي انتظاميہ جي طور تي ڪم ڪيو. 1976 جي چونڊن دوران هن ڪارٽر کي خارجه پاليسي بابت صلاح ڏني، پوءِ هينري ڪسنگر کان کٽي 1977 کان 1981 تائين نيشنل سيڪيورٽي ايڊوائيزر (NSA) طور خدمت سرانجام ڏني. بطور NSA، هن دنيا جي معاملن کي سفارتي طور تي سنڀالڻ ۾ ڪارٽر جي مدد ڪئي، جهڙوڪ ڪيمپ ڊيوڊ اڪارڊس، 1978؛ آمريڪا-چين لاڳاپن کي معمول تي آڻڻ 1970ع جي آخر ؛ ايراني انقلاب، جرڪو ايران ڪفيل بحران جو سبب بڻيو، 1979؛ ۽ افغانستان  ۾ سوويٽ، 1979 ۾ حملو.
mt: 1960s, Kennedy's foreign policy adviser, then Johnson's National Security Adviser, then Henry Kissinger's National Security Adviser (NSA) from 1977 to 1981. As NSA, she helped Carter manage foreign affairs, such as Camp David Accords, 1978; normalization of U.S.–China relations in the 1970s; Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iranian Hostage Crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: 1960 واري ڏهاڪي ۾، جان ايف ڪينيڊي لاءِ برزيزنسڪي هن جو صلاحڪار طور ڪم ڪيو ۽ پوءِ لينڊن بي جونسن جي انتظاميہ جي طور تي ڪم ڪيو. 1976 جي چونڊن دوران هن ڪارٽر کي خارجه پاليسي بابت صلاح ڏني، پوءِ هينري ڪسنگر کان کٽي 1977 کان 1981 تائين نيشنل سيڪيورٽي ايڊوائيزر (NSA) طور خدمت سرانجام ڏني. بطور NSA، هن دنيا جي معاملن کي سفارتي طور تي سنڀالڻ ۾ ڪارٽر جي مدد ڪئي، جهڙوڪ ڪيمپ ڊيوڊ اڪارڊس، 1978؛ آمريڪا-چين لاڳاپن کي معمول تي آڻڻ 1970ع جي آخر ؛ ايراني انقلاب، جرڪو ايران ڪفيل بحران جو سبب بڻيو، 1979؛ ۽ افغانستان  ۾ سوويٽ، 1979 ۾ حملو.
mt: 1960s, Kennedy's foreign policy adviser, then Johnson's National Security Adviser, then Henry Kissinger's National Security Adviser (NSA) from 1977 to 1981. As NSA, she helped Carter manage foreign affairs, such as Camp David Accords, 1978; normalization of U.S.–China relations in the 1970s; Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iranian Hostage Crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: ڪروشيا جي گادي واري هنڌ زاگريب ۾ پيدا ٿيو، بوبيڪ پارٽيزن بيلگريڊ لاءَ کيڏي شهرت حاصل ڪئي. هو 1945 ۾ انهن سان شامل ٿيو ۽ 1958 تائين رهيو. ٽيم سان پنھنجي وقت دوران، هن 468 چڪرن ۾ 403 گول ڪيا. ڪنهن ٻي ڪڏهن بہ ڪلب جي لاءِ بابيڪ جي مقابلي ۾ وڌيڪ حاضريون نہ ڏنيون ۽ نه ئي گول ڪيا. 1995 ۾ کي پارٽيزان جي تاريخ جو بهترين رانديگر قرار ڏنو ويو
mt: Born in Zagreb, Croatia, he made his name in Belgrade with Partizan. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 matches. No other club in Partizan's history has had more attendances or goals scored in a match against them. In 1995, he was named the best player in Partizan's history.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "هيسپيرونائڪس ايلزابيٿئي ڊرومائيسورائيڊي خاندان جو هڪ جاندار ۽ ويلوسيريپٽر جو هڪ ڪزن آهي. هي مڪمل طور تي کنڀن وارو، گرم رت وارو شڪاري پکي آهي جنهن کي ويلوسيريپٽر وانگر چنبن سان سڌو سنئون ٻن ٽنگن تي هلڻ وارو سمجهيو ويندو هو. ان جو ٻيو پير وڏو هو، جنهن هيسپرونيچس جي نالي کي جنم ڏنو جنهن جو مطلب ""مغربي پنجو آهي."""
mt: "Hesperornis elizabethae is a member of the Hesperornithidae family and a close relative of the Velociraptor. It was a fully feathered, warm-blooded hunter, thought to have been bipedal like a Velociraptor. Its other leg was larger, giving it the name Hesperornis, meaning "western bird.""
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: گهٽ ۾ گهٽ 100 ماڻهن ۾ هڪ جوڙي جي پهريئن سالگرهه جي جشن واري پارٽي شرڪت ڪئي، جنهن جي شادي پوئين سال ٿي هئي. آفیسرن چیو ته، هڪ رسمي سالگره جي تقريب اڳتي جي تاريخ تي مقرر ڪيو ويو هو. جوڙي هڪ سال پهريان ٽيڪساز ۾ شادي ڪئي هئي ۽ دوستن ۽ مائٽن سان جشن ملائڻ لاءِ بفيلو ۾ آيو هو. 30 سالن جو مڙس، جيڪو بفيلو ۾ پيدا ٿيو هو، شوٽنگ ۾ مرڻ وارن 4 ڄڻن ۾ هڪ هو، پر هن جي زال کي ڪو ڌڪ نہ لڳو هو.
mt: 100 or more people attended the first anniversary party of a couple who married last year. Officials said the official anniversary celebration was scheduled for a later date. The couple had married in a taxicab and came to Beverly Hills to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old groom, who was born in Beverly Hills, was one of four people killed in the shooting, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: لونو ۾ 120–160 ڪيوبڪ ميٽر تيل هو جڏهن اهو ٽٽي ويو ۽ تيز هوائن ۽ لهرن ان کي ساحلي بند ڏانهن ڌڪيو. هيليڪاپٽرن ٻارنهن عملدارن کي بچايو ۽ نڪ تي صرف واحد زخم هو. 100 ميٽر وارو جهاز پنهنجو هميشہ ڀاڻ جو ڪارگو کڻڻ وڃي رهيو هو ۽ شروع ۾ عملدارن کي ڊپ لڳو تہ متان جهاز وزن ڪيرائي.
mt: 120–160 cubic metres of oil was on board when it sank and was pushed ashore by strong winds and waves. Helicopters rescued the crew of 11 and only one had a scratch. The 100-metre vessel was carrying its usual cargo of fuel and initially the crew thought the ship was taking on water.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: هدايت کان ٻاهر ووٽيئر جي ڪاميابين ۾ 1973 واري بک هڙتال شامل آهي جنهن کي سياسي احتساب جي طور تي ڏٺو. فرانسيسي قانون تبديل ڪيو ويو هو. جڏهن هُو ٻي عالمي جنگ دوران فرانسيسي مزاحمت ۾ شامل ٿيو ته هِن جي فعاليت 15سالن جي عمر ڏانهن واپس ٿي وئي. هن 1998 جي هڪ ڪتاب ۾ پاڻ کي دستاويزي ڪيو. 1960 واري ڏهاڪي ۾ هو فلم جي هدايت ڪاري سيکارڻ لاءِ نئين آزاد ٿيندڙ الجيريا ڏانهن واپس وريو.
mt: 1973 was also a successful vote in defiance of orders, which was later punished as a political offense. The French law was changed. When he was involved in the French resistance during World War II, his activity was reversed to 15 years old. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s, he returned to newly independent Algeria to direct a film.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: جنازي ۾ شريڪ ٿيڻ لاءِ چاليهہ لک کان وڌيڪ ماڻهو روم ويا. اتي موجود ماڻهن جي تعداد تمام گهڻي هئي تنهنڪري سينٽ پيٽر اسڪوائر ۾ جنازي تائين هر هڪ جي رسائي ممڪن نہ هئي. روم ۾ ڪيترين ئي جاين تي ماڻهن کي رسم ڏسڻ لاءِ ڪيترين ئي وڏين اسڪرينن وارين ٽيلي ويزنن کي نصب ڪيون ويو هو. اٽلي جي ڪيترن شهرن ۽ ٻي سڄي دنيا ۾، خاص ڪري پولينڊ ۾، ساڳئي قسم جا سيٽ اپ ٺاهيا ويا، جيڪي تمام گهڻن ماڻهن پاران ڏٺا ويا.
mt: 30,000 people attended the funeral. So many people were present that access to the St. Peter's Square for the funeral was impossible. In the room, many large screens were installed for people to see the ceremony. The same type of seats were set up in many cities in Italy and in the rest of the world, especially in Poland.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: رپورٽن موجب، مڪبيٿ اسٽريٽ تي هڪ اپارٽمنٽ ۾ گئس لڪيج جي ڪري ڌماڪو ٿيو. هڪ پاڙيسري پاران گئس ليڪ ٿيڻ بابت فون ڪال ڪرڻ کانپوءِ گئس ڪمپني جو هڪ آفيسر منظر جي رپورٽ ڪري رهيو هو. سرڪاري عملي جي پهچڻ تي اپارٽمينٽ ڍاٺو ويو. ڪا بہ زخمين جي رپورٽ نہ ملي، پرڌماڪي وقت واقعي واري هنڌ موجود پنج ماڻهن کي صدمي جي علامتن جي ڪري علاج ڪرايو ويو هو. اپارٽمينٽ جي اندر ڪير بہ نہ هو. ان وقت تي، تقريبن 100 رهاڪن کي علائقي مان نيڪالي ڏني وئي هئي.
mt: Reports say a gas leak in an apartment on Makphet Street caused an explosion. A neighbor called the gas company after noticing a gas leak, and a company official was on the scene reporting the incident. The apartment was evacuated after the arrival of the authorities. No injuries were reported, but five people who were in the vicinity were taken to the hospital for observation. No one was in the apartment at the time. At the time, about 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: حلاڪتن ۾ 25 سالن جو نڪولس ايلڊن ۽ 21 سالن جو زوڪري ڪڊي بيڪ هو. ڪڊي بيڪ ڊرائيور هو. ايڊگر ويگيولا کي ٻانهن ۽ ڄاڙي ۾ زخم ٿيا، جڏهن ته ڪرسٽوففر شنيڊر کي ان جي چهري جي بحالي لاءِ گهربل سرجري لاءِ نيو ويو هو. پنجين ماڻهو جي مٿي تي نشانو لڳائيندي يوڪا جو هٿيار ناڪام ٿي ويو. شنائيدر کي مسلسل سور آهي، هڪ اک سان انڌو، کوپڙي جو هڪ حصو غائب ۽ ٽائيٽينيم سان ٻيهر جوڙيل چهرو. شنائيڊر پنهنجي ملڪ ۾ USAF اڏي کان وڊيو لنڪ جي ذريعي گواهي ڏني.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cody were both identified as passengers. Cody was the driver. Edgar Weigela suffered facial and head injuries, while Christopher Schneidr was airlifted to a hospital for surgery to repair his skull. The fifth man was shot in the head. The gun of the Ukrainian failed. Schneidr suffers from burns, one eye is blind, a piece of his skull is missing and his head is titanium-plated. Schneidr gave testimony from his home country via video link to the USAF base.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: حلاڪتن ۾ 25 سالن جو نڪولس ايلڊن ۽ 21 سالن جو زوڪري ڪڊي بيڪ هو. ڪڊي بيڪ ڊرائيور هو. ايڊگر ويگيولا کي ٻانهن ۽ ڄاڙي ۾ زخم ٿيا، جڏهن ته ڪرسٽوففر شنيڊر کي ان جي چهري جي بحالي لاءِ گهربل سرجري لاءِ نيو ويو هو. پنجين ماڻهو جي مٿي تي نشانو لڳائيندي يوڪا جو هٿيار ناڪام ٿي ويو. شنائيدر کي مسلسل سور آهي، هڪ اک سان انڌو، کوپڙي جو هڪ حصو غائب ۽ ٽائيٽينيم سان ٻيهر جوڙيل چهرو. شنائيڊر پنهنجي ملڪ ۾ USAF اڏي کان وڊيو لنڪ جي ذريعي گواهي ڏني.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cody were both identified as passengers. Cody was the driver. Edgar Weigela suffered facial and head injuries, while Christopher Schneidr was airlifted to a hospital for surgery to repair his skull. The fifth man was shot in the head. The gun of the Ukrainian failed. Schneidr suffers from burns, one eye is blind, a piece of his skull is missing and his head is titanium-plated. Schneidr gave testimony from his home country via video link to the USAF base.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: گولف ۽ رگبي ٻئي اولمپڪ راندين ۾ واپسي لاءِ مقرر ٿيل آهن. بين الاقوامي اولمپڪ ڪميٽي اڄ برلن ۾ ان جي ايگزيڪيوٽو بورڊ جي اجلاس ۾ راندين کي شامل ڪرڻ جي حق ۾ ووٽ ڏنو. رگبي، خاص طور تي رگبي يونين، ۽ گولف کي اولمپڪ ۾ حصو وٺڻ لاءِ پنجن ٻين راندين مٿان چونڊڻ جو غور ڪيو ويو هو. اسڪواش، ڪراٽي ۽ رولر راندين کي اولمپڪ پروگرام سان گڏ بيس بال ۽ سافٽ بال ۾ پڻ وٺي اچڻ جي ڪوشش ڪئي، انهن کي 2005 ۾ اولمپڪ راندين ۾ ووٽ ڏنو ويو هو. ڪوپب هيگن ۾ آڪٽوبر واري ميٽنگ ۾ ووٽ جي اڃا بہ مڪمل IOC جي ذريعي تصديق ڪرڻ گهرجي.
mt: Golf and rugby are both returning to the Olympic program. The International Olympic Committee voted on Monday in Berlin at its executive board meeting to include the sports in the Olympics. Rugby, especially rugby union, and golf were among five other sports considered for inclusion in the Olympic program. Squash, cricket and roller sports were also considered for inclusion in the Olympic program along with baseball and softball, which were voted in for the 2005 Olympics. A vote of the IOC is still needed to make the vote official.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 24 سيپٽمبر 1759 تي، آرٿر گنيس آئرليند جي ڊبلن شهر ۾ سينٽ جيمز گيٽ بريوري جي لاءِ 9،000 سالن جي ليز تي صحي ڪئي. 250 سال کان پوءِ، گينيس هڪ عالمي ڪاروبار ڏانهن ترقي ڪري چڪو آهي جيڪو هر سال 10 بلين يورو (14.7 بلين ڊالر) جو ٽرن اوور ڪري ٿو.
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease on St James's Gate Brewery in Dublin for £45. 250 years later, Guinness has grown into a global business that turns over €10 billion (14.7 billion dollars) every year.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: برڊ فلو جو تدارڪ انسانن لاءِ مهلڪ آهي، H5N1، تصديق ڪئي آهي تہ فرانس جي اوڀر ۾ ليون جي ويجهو مارش لينڊ ۾ سومر تي هڪ مريل جهنگلي بدڪ کي متاثر ڪيو آهي. آسٽريا، جرمني، سلووينيا، بلغاريا، يونان ۽ اٽلي کان پوءِ فرانس يورپين يونين ۾ انهي وائرس جو شڪار ٿيندڙ ستون ملڪ آهي. ڪروشيا ۽ ڊينمارڪ ۾ H5N1 جي شڪي ڪيسن جي تصديق نہ ٿي.
mt: The confirmation of a wild duck infected with H5N1 in the vicinity of Lyon, France, has been made. Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece, and Italy have been infected with the virus after France, making it the seventh European Union country to be affected. Croatia and Denmark have not yet confirmed cases of H5N1.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: UN جا امن فوجي، جيڪو 2010 جي زلزلي کانپوءِ هيٽي ۾ پهتا، اتي انهن کي بيماري ڦهلائڻ جو الزام لڳايو پيو وڃي جيڪا فوجين جي ڇانوڻي جي ويجهو شروع ٿي هئي. قانوني ڪيس جي مطابق، گڏيل قومن جي ڪئمپ کان فضول ڪچري جي صحيح طريقي سان صفائي نه ڪئي وئي هئي، ان جي نتيجي ۾ هيٽي جي وڏي ۾ وڏو ندي، آرٽيبونائيٽ ندي جي ريلي ۾ بيڪٽيريا داخل ٿيو. فوجين جي اچڻ کان پهرين، هيٽي کي 1800 عيسوي کان ان بيماري سان لاڳاپيل مسئلن جو منهن نہ ڏيڻو پيو هو. انصاف ۽ جمهوريت جي هيٽي جي اداري آزاد مطالعن جو حوالو ڏنو آهي جيڪو ٻڌائي ٿو تہ UN امن بحالي جو ٽولو بي خبريءَ سان هيٽي ۾ بيماري کڻي آهيو. ڊينيل لانٽاگني، بيماري جي هڪ UN ماهر، بيان ڪيو آهي ته وڏي خرابي امن پسندن جي ڪري ممڪن آهي.
mt: UN peacekeepers, who arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, were accused of spreading disease that started in their camp's latrines. According to the legal case, the United Nations camp was not properly cleaned after parties, allowing bacteria to enter the Artibonite River, Haiti's largest river. Before the peacekeepers arrived, Haiti had not been associated with any of these problems since 1800. The Justice and Democracy of Haiti cited a UN independent review that said the UN peacekeepers brought disease to Haiti. Daniel Lantagne, a UN disease expert, said that a large outbreak is possible due to the UN peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "آئرش حڪومت صورتحال کي درست ڪرڻ لاءِ پارلياماني قانون جي ضرورت تي زور ڏئي رهي آهي. ""هاڻي اهو عوامي صحت ۽ ڏوهہ جي ڇوٽڪاري لاءِ انصاف جي ٻني نقطن جو حوالي سان جيترو جلدي ٿي سگهي قانون سازي لاڳو ڪئي وڃي""، هڪڙي سرڪاري ترجمان چيو. صحت واري وزير شامل مادن جي عارضي قانوني حيثيت کان فائدو حاصل ڪرڻ وارن ماڻهن جي فلاح، ۽ جڏهن کان غير آئيني تبديليون عمل ۾ آهيون تڏهن کان منشيات سان لاڳاپليل ڏوهن کي منتقل ڪيو ويو تي ڳڻتي جو اظهار ڪيو."
mt: "The Irish government is continuing to press for legislation to correct the situation. "As soon as possible, the legislation will be enacted to provide justice for those who have suffered from the health and safety failures of the State," a government spokesman said. Health Minister James Reilly's proposed legislation to benefit those who have suffered from illegal changes and when they have been made to be associated with the mind of the statement."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "لاس اينجلس پوليس ڊپارٽمينٽ جي هڪ ترجمان ڪرسٽوفر گارسيا چيو آهي ته شڪي مرد مجرم کي لوٽ مار بدران توڙ ڦوڙ لاءِ جاچ ڪئي پئي وڃي. هن نشاني کي ظاهري طور تي ڪو به نقصان نہ پهتو هو؛ ڦيرڦار امن ۽ دل جي نشانين سان سينگاريل ڪارين ترپالن سان ڪيو ويو هو تہ جيئن ""O"" جي جاءِ تي ننڍو اکر ""e"" پڙهيو وڃي."
mt: "A spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department said the suspect was being sought for questioning, not for robbery. The sign appeared to be undamaged; the word "O" was replaced with the letter "e" in the word "peace" and the word "love" was crossed out."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: ڪرنو هڪ مشهور پر تڪراري انگريزي استاد هو جنهن جديد تعليم ۽ ڪنگ گلوري جي ماتحت پڙهايو جنهن اهو دعويٰ ڪيو تہ هن جا 9000 شاگرد پنهنجي پيشي ۾ اوچائين تي آهن. هن پنهنجي نوٽس ۾ اهي لفظ استعمال ڪيا جيڪي ڪجهه والدين فحش سمجهندا هئا، رپورٽن موجن هي ڪلاس ۾ گار گند استعمال ڪئي. ماڊرن ايجيوڪيشن هن تي الزام لڳايو تہ هو اجازت کانسواءِ بسن تي وڏا اشتهار هڻي ٿو ۽ اهو چئي ڪري ڪوڙ ڳالهائي ٿو تہ هي چيف انگريزي استاد هو. هن تي پهريان ڪاپي رائيٽ جي خلاف ورزي جو الزام هنيو ويو هو پر تحويل ۾ نه ورتو ويو. هڪ اڳوڻي شاگرد چيو ته هو 'ڪلاس ۾ گندي زبان استعمال ڪندو هو، نوٽس ۾ ڊيٽنگ جي مهارت سيکاريندو هو، ۽ هو شاگردن جي دوست وانگر هو.
mt: 1. A famous and controversial English teacher who taught under the auspices of New Schools Network and King's College London, who claimed that his 9,000 students were at the top of their professions. He used words in his notes that some parents considered vulgar, reports that he used the word "garbage" in class. Modern Education accused him of advertising without permission and saying that he was the chief English teacher. He was first accused of violating copyright, but was not prosecuted. An old student said he "used vulgar language in class, learned the art of dating in notes, and was like a friend of students."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: هڪ اڳوڻي فلپائن جي پوليس آفیسر فلپائن جي گادي جي شهر منيلا ۾ هانگ ڪانگ جي سياحن کي انھن جی بس اغوا ڪري يرغمال بڻائي رکيو آهي. رولانڊو مينڊوزا پنهنجي M16 رائفل سان سياحن تي فائر ڪيو. ڪيترن ئي بندين کي آزاد ڪرايو ويو آهي ۽ هينئر تائين گهٽ ۾ گهٽ ڇهہ ڄڻن جي مرڻ جي تصديق ٿي ويئي آهي. 6 بندي، جنهن ۾ ٻار ۽ پيرسن هئا، جيڪي آزاد ڪرايا ويا هئا، جيئن تہ فلپائڻ فوٽوگرافر هئا. فوٽوگرافرن پوءِ پوڙهي عورت جي جاءِ ورتي جيئن ئي ان کي غسل خاني جي ضرورت پئي، مينڊوزا کي گولي هڻي ويئي.
mt: A former Philippine police officer has taken Hong Kong tourists hostage in Manila, the Philippines' capital. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at tourists. Several hostages have been freed and at least 6 deaths have been confirmed. Six hostages, including children and a pregnant woman, were freed, as they were Filipino photographers. The photographers then took the place of a woman who needed to take a bath, as Mendoza was hit by a grenade.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: برازيل ڌرتي تي سڀ کان وڏو رومن ڪيٿولڪ ملڪ آهي، ۽ رومن ڪيٿولڪ چرچ ملڪ ۾ هم-جنسي شادي کي جائز قرار ڏيڻ جي مسلسل مخالفت ڪندو رهيو آهي. برازيل جي نيشنل ڪانگريس 10 سالن کان قانوني حيثيت لاءِ بحث ڪري چڪي آهي، ۽ اهڙي طرح جون عام شاديون صرف ريو گرانڊي ڊو سول ۾ ئي جائز آهن. اصل بل سائو پولو جي ميئر مارٽا سوپليسي تيار ڪيو هو. پيش ٿيل قانون سازي، ترميم ڪرڻ کانپوءِ، هاڻي روبرٽو جيفرسن جي هٿ ۾ آهي. احتجاجين نومبر ۾ 1.2 ملين صحين جي درخواست نيشنل ڪانگريس ۾ جمع ڪرائڻ جي اميد رکن ٿا.
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed same-sex marriage. The Brazilian National Congress has been debating the legal status of such unions for 10 years, and thus same-sex marriages are only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by Mayor Marta Suplicy of São Paulo. The proposed legislation, after amendment, is now in the hands of Robert Jefferson. Protesters hope to deliver 1.2 million signatures to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "پنج منٽن تائين ڏيکاءُ ڏيڻ کان پوءِ هوا لڳڻ شروع ٿئي ٿي، اٽڪل هِڪ مِنٽ کانپوءِ، هوا 70 ڪِلو ميٽر في ڪلاڪ تائين پهچي رهي آهي... پوءِ مِينهن اَچي ٿو، پر ايترو تيز ۽ وڌيڪ آهي جو اهو توهان جي چمڙي کي سُوئن وانگي ٽُنڀي ٿو، پوءِ آسمان کان اولا ڪرن ٿا، ماڻهو خوفزده ٿين ٿا ۽ رڙيون ڪندي ۽ هِڪٻئي جي مٿان ڊوڙڻ لڳن ٿا. ارماند ورسيڪ چيو ته، آئون پنهنجي ڀيڻ ۽ هن جي دوست جي حياتي وڃائي ويٺهو آهيان هتي ويل چيئر ۾ ٻه معذور ماڻهو هئا، ماڻهو رڳو ڏئي رهيا هئا ۽ انهن کي ڌِڪي رهيا هئا."""
mt: "In five minutes, the wind starts to blow, then after a minute, the wind reaches 70 kilometers per hour... then the rain comes, but it is so fast and more that it burns your skin like a scorching sun, then the rain comes down from the sky, people get scared and run and run and run. Armand Vercellotti said, "I was saving my sister and her friend's life in this chair, there were two disabled people here, people were just crying and they were crying."
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: اڳڪٿي ڪندڙ چون ٿا تہ طوفان ڪيپ وردي ٻيٽ جي اولهہ طرف لڳ ڀڳ 645 ميل (1040 ڪلو ميٽر) تي واقع آهي، جيڪو ڪنهن بہ زميني علائقي کي نقصان پهچائڻ کان پهرين ختم ٿيڻ جو امڪان آهي. فريڊ کي هن وقت 105 ميل في ڪلاڪ (165 ڪلوميٽر في ڪلاڪ) جون هوائون آهن ۽ اتر ڏکڻ ڪنڍ ڏانهن وڌي رهيو آهي. فريڊ، سيٽلائيٽ تصويرون جي اچڻ کان پوءِ ڏکڻ ۽ اوڀر ۾ ايٽلانٽڪ ۾ اڄ ڏينهن تائين جي رڪارڊ ٿيل سڀني کان مضبوط سائيڪلون يا طوفاني هوا آهي، ۽ 35°W جي اوڀر طرف فقط ٽيون وڏو هُريڪين طوفان آهي.
mt: Forecasters say the storm is about 645 miles (1040 km) east of the Virgin Islands, which is likely to dissipate before it can cause any damage to land. Fred is currently moving at 105 mph (165 km/h) toward the north and east and is the third strongest hurricane ever recorded in the Atlantic, east of 35°W, since satellite observations began in 1960.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 802.11n معيار ٻني 2.4Ghz ۽ 5.0Ghz فريڪوئنسيز تي ڪم ڪري ٿو. هي 802.11a، 802.11b ۽ 802.11g سان پوئين طورف مطابق پذيري جي اجازت ڏيندو، جيڪڏهن بنيادي اسٽيشن وٽ ٻہ ريڊيو اسٽيشن آهن. 802.11n جي رفتار هن جي پوئين عمل جنهن جو نظري اتارو وڌ ۾ وڌ 600Mbit/s آهي جي مقابلي ۾ گهڻي تيز آهي.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies. It is backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, if two radio stations are present at the base station. The speed of 802.11n is much faster than its predecessor, which was estimated to be up to 600Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: اولمپڪ سوني جو تمغو 100 ميٽر ۽ 200 ميٽر فري اسٽائل ۽ ڪامن ويلٿ گيمز ۾ ٿري رليز ۾ ترڻ تي هو، پر هن جي شڪايت جي ڪري هن جي فٽنيس شڪي هئي. هو راندين ۾ رڪاوٽ وجهڻ کان هن جي درد کي دور ڪرڻ جي ڪوشش نه ڪري سگهيو آهي.
mt: 100 and 200 meter freestyle and the Commonwealth Games triple jump were on his schedule, but he had to pull out of the latter due to a complaint of pain in his feet. He was unable to overcome the pain to avoid the obstacles in the races.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: اولمپڪ سوني جو تمغو 100 ميٽر ۽ 200 ميٽر فري اسٽائل ۽ ڪامن ويلٿ گيمز ۾ ٿري رليز ۾ ترڻ تي هو، پر هن جي شڪايت جي ڪري هن جي فٽنيس شڪي هئي. هو راندين ۾ رڪاوٽ وجهڻ کان هن جي درد کي دور ڪرڻ جي ڪوشش نه ڪري سگهيو آهي.

src: آمريڪا جي جيولاجيڪل سروي بين الاقوامي زلزلي جي نقشي پوئين هفتي آئيس لينڊ ۾ ڪي بہ زلزلا ظاهر نہ ڪيا. آئس لينڊ جي موسميات واري محڪمي اطلاع ڏنو تہ گذريل 48 ڪلاڪن ۾ هيڪلا جي علائقي ۾ ڪا بہ زلزلي جي سرگرمي محسوس نہ ٿي. مرحلي ۾ تبديلي جي ڪري زلزلي جي واضع سرگرمي 10 مارچ تي ٻرندڙ جبل جي مٿانهن کڏ نما جي اتر اوڀر پاسي ٿي هوئي. ڪنهن به آتش فشان سرگرمي کان اڻ لاڳاپيل ڪاريون گهٽائون جبل جي بنياد ۾ رپورٽ ٿيون آهن. بادلن پريشاني جو امڪان پيش ڪيو آهي تہ واقعي اهو ڦاٽي پيو آهي يا نہ.
mt: The United States Geological Survey reported no earthquakes in the vicinity of Iceland in the past week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office reported no seismic activity in the region in the past 48 hours. A phase shift in the activity was reported to have occurred on March 10 in the upper northeast flank of the volcano. No signs of volcanic activity have been reported in the foundation of the volcano. Cloudy conditions may have obscured the fact that it was erupting or not.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: بغير ماڻهو جي لونر آربيٽر چندرائن-1 پنهنجو مون امپيڪٽ پروب (MIP) ڇڏيو، جيڪو چنڊ جي مٿاڇري تي 1.5 ڪلوميٽر في سيڪنڊ (3000 ميل في ڪلاڪ) تيزي سان پهتو، ۽ ڪاميابي سان چنڊ جي ڏکڻ قطب جي ويجهو لٿو. ٽن اهم سائنسي اوزارن کي گڏ کڻڻ سان گڏ، لونار پروب تي، هر طرف رنگيل، انڊين قومي جهنڊي جي تصوير پڻ رکيل آهي..
mt: The Chandrayaan-1 lunar orbiter released its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which impacted the Moon at 1.5 kilometers per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully landed near the Moon's south pole. The probe carried three important scientific instruments, as well as a picture of the Indian national flag on its side.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: بيماري جو پهريون ڪيس هن موسم ۾ جولائي جي آخر ۾ رپورٽ ٿيو هو. اهو بيماري سوئر جي ذريعي ايندي آهي، پوءِ مڇرن جي ذريعي انسانن ۾ منتقل ٿيندي آهي. هن وبا ڀارتي حڪومت کي گنڀير طرح سان متاثر علائقن ۾ سوئر جهلندڙن جي صف بندي، هزارين مڇر دانيون ورهائڻ ۽ جيت مار دوائن جو ڦوهارو ڪرڻ جهڙا اُپاءُ کڻڻ تي مجبور ڪيو. حڪومت انسيفلاٽس ويڪسين جا لکين وائلس ڏيڻ جو واعدو ڪيو، جيڪو ايندڙ سال لاءِ صحت جي ايجنسين کي ٺاهڻ ۾ مدد ڪندو. هن سال تاريخي طور تي سڀ کان وڌيڪ متاثر ٿيل علائقن ۾ ويڪسين ڏيڻ جي منصوبن کي فنڊ جي گهٽتائي جي ڪري يا ٻين بيمارين جي مقابلي ۾ گهٽ ترجيح جي ڪري روڪيا ويا هئا.
mt: The first case of the disease was reported in July. The disease is spread by mosquitoes, which are then spread to humans by mosquitoes. This epidemic forced the government to take measures such as the registration of swineherds, the destruction of millions of mosquito larvae, and the spraying of insecticides. The government promised to give millions of vaccines to health agencies for the coming year, which would help to build health facilities. Plans to vaccinate the most affected areas were thwarted by a lack of funding or other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: پيش ڪيل ترميم کي 2011 ۾ ٻنهي ايوانن منظور ڪيو هيو. هن قانوني سيشن ۾ هڪ تبديلي ڪئي وئي جڏهن ايوان پاران پهريان ٻيون جملو حذف ڪيو ويو هو ۽ پوءِ ان جهڙي ئي حالت ۾ سينيٽ پاران سومر ڏهاڙي منظور ڪيو ويو. ٻي فيصلي جي ناڪامي، جيڪو ساڳئي جنس جي سول يونين تي پابندي هڻڻ جي تجويز ڏي ٿو، مستقبل ۾ سول يونين جي لاءِ ممڪن دروازو کولي سگهي ٿو. عمل جي پيروي ڪندي، عمل ۾ رهڻ لاءِ HJR-3 جو 2015 يا 2016 ۾ ايندڙ چونڊيل قانون سازي پاران ٻيهر جائزو ورتو ويندو.
mt: 2011, both houses passed the bill. In this session, the House amended the bill by removing the first sentence and then the Senate passed the bill in the same form. The second amendment, which would repeal the ban on same-sex civil unions, could open the door to civil unions in the future. In following through, the bill would be subject to a second look by the 2015 or 2016 elected legislature.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """پاناما پيپرز"" هڪ ڇٽي لفظ آهي جيڪو پانامينين قانوني اداري موساڪ فونيسڪا جا اٽڪل ڏهہ ملين دستاويز آهن، جيڪو 2016 جي بهار واري موسم ۾ پريس کي ليڪ ٿيا. دستاويزن ڏيکاريو تہ چوڏانهن بئنڪن پنهنجي گراهڪن کي ٽيڪس ۽ ضابطن کان بچڻ لاءِ اربين آمريڪي ڊالر جي ماليت لڪائڻ ۾ مدد ڪئي. برطانوي اخبار دي گارڊين تجويز ڪئي ته اهو حاصل ڪرڻ لاءِ ڊيوٽشي بينڪ تقريبن 1200شيل ڪمپنين جو هڪ ٽيون حصو ڪنٽرول ڪندي هئي. سڄي دنيا ۾ احتجاج ٿيا، ڪيتريون ئي فوجداري ڪاروائيون ٿيون ۽ آئيس لينڊ ۽ پاڪستان جي حڪومتن جي ٻنهي اڳواڻن استعيفيٰ ڏني."
mt: "Panama Papers" is a slang term for the approximately 11.5 million documents from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca that were leaked to the press in the spring of 2016. The documents revealed that dozens of banks helped their clients to evade taxes and regulations by hiding billions of dollars in offshore accounts. The British newspaper The Guardian suggested that Deutsche Bank had control of one-third of the 1200 shell companies that Mossack Fonseca created. Protests occurred around the world, several criminal investigations were launched, and the prime ministers of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: ايران ۾ هوائي حادثا عام آهن جتي  جهاز پراڻا آهن جن جي سول توڙي فوجي آپريشن ٻنهي مقصدن لاءِ صحيح نموني سارسنڀال ناهي ڪئي ويندي. بين الاقوامي پابندين جو مطلب اهو آهي ته نوان جهاز نٿا خريد ڪري سگهجن. هن هفتي جي شروع ۾، هڪ پوليس هيليڪاپٽر ڪري تباهه ٿيڻ واري حادثي ۾ ٽي ماڻهو مارجي ويا ۽ ٽي وڌيڪ زخمي ٿيا. گذريل مهيني ايران سالن ۾ پنهنجي بدترين هوائي تباهي ڏٺي جڏهن ارمينيا ويندڙ هڪ هوائي جهاز حادثي ۾ تباه ٿيو، جنهن ۾ 168 سوار مري ويا. ساڳئي مهيني هڪ ٻي هوائي جهاز مشهد ۾ رن وي اورانگي هڪ ديوار ٽڪرائي سترنهن ڄڻن کي ماري ڇڏيو.
mt: Air accidents are common in Iran, where old planes are used for both civilian and military operations without proper maintenance. International sanctions mean new planes cannot be purchased. At the start of this week, a police helicopter crashed in a fatal accident, killing three people and injuring three more. Last month Iran suffered its worst air disaster in years when an Armenian airliner crashed, killing 168 people on board. The same month a second plane crashed into a wall in Mashhad, killing 17 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: عراقي مطالعي جي گروپ اڄ 12.00 GMT تي پنهنجي رپورٽ پيش ڪئي. اهو خبردار ڪري ٿو تہ ڪو بہ ذميواري نٿو کڻي سگهي تہ هن وقت عراق ۾ ڪنهن بہ قسم جي ڪاروائي فرقيواراڻي ويڙهہ، وڌندڙ ڏاڍائي، يا وڌندڙ وڳوڙن کي روڪيندي. هي رپورٽ ظاهري بحث مباحثي ۽ مڊل ايسٽ جي پاليسي بابت آمريڪا ۾ اتفاق راءِ واري ٺاهہ لاءِ دليل سان شروع ٿئي ٿي. اها رپورٽ عراق بابت ايگزيڪيوٽو جي موجود پاليسي جي تقريباً هر پهلو تي انتهائي تنقيدي آهي ۽ اهو ترت ان فيصلي مين تبديلي جي تاڪيد ڪري ٿو. ان جي 78 سِفارشن مان پهرين اِها آهي ته هِن سال جي پڇاڙي کان اڳ هڪ نئون سِفارتي قدم کڻڻ گهرجي ته جيئن هُو دُشمنن جي مُداخلتن خِلاف عِراق جي سرحدن کي محفوظ بڻائي ۽ پنهنجي پاڙيسري مُلڪن سان سِفارتي تعلقات بحال ڪري.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraqi Study Group released its report. It warns that no one can guarantee that Iraq will not see increased sectarian violence, increased sectarian strife, or increased sectarian tension. This report begins with a discussion of the current policy of the Executive Branch and its implications for the future. It is a highly critical examination of the current policy and calls for a major change in policy. Of its 78 recommendations, the first is that a new policy step be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq's borders against the incursions of the enemy and to restore relations with its neighboring countries.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: عراقي مطالعي جي گروپ اڄ 12.00 GMT تي پنهنجي رپورٽ پيش ڪئي. اهو خبردار ڪري ٿو تہ ڪو بہ ذميواري نٿو کڻي سگهي تہ هن وقت عراق ۾ ڪنهن بہ قسم جي ڪاروائي فرقيواراڻي ويڙهہ، وڌندڙ ڏاڍائي، يا وڌندڙ وڳوڙن کي روڪيندي. هي رپورٽ ظاهري بحث مباحثي ۽ مڊل ايسٽ جي پاليسي بابت آمريڪا ۾ اتفاق راءِ واري ٺاهہ لاءِ دليل سان شروع ٿئي ٿي. اها رپورٽ عراق بابت ايگزيڪيوٽو جي موجود پاليسي جي تقريباً هر پهلو تي انتهائي تنقيدي آهي ۽ اهو ترت ان فيصلي مين تبديلي جي تاڪيد ڪري ٿو. ان جي 78 سِفارشن مان پهرين اِها آهي ته هِن سال جي پڇاڙي کان اڳ هڪ نئون سِفارتي قدم کڻڻ گهرجي ته جيئن هُو دُشمنن جي مُداخلتن خِلاف عِراق جي سرحدن کي محفوظ بڻائي ۽ پنهنجي پاڙيسري مُلڪن سان سِفارتي تعلقات بحال ڪري.

The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "انسا جي مطابق، ""پوليس کي ڪجهه اعليٰ سطحي هٽ وارن لاڳاپن جي ڪري مسئلو هو جن بابت انهن کي خدشو هو ته جانشيني لاءِ هڪ مڪمل جنگ شروع ڪري پئي سگهيا. پوليس چيو لو پڪولو مٿيئن عهدي تي هو ڇاڪاڻ تہ هي پلرمو ۾ پرووينزانو جو خاص ماڻهو هو ۽ هن جي گهڻي تجربي هن کي پراڻن مالڪن کان عزت ڏيرائي جيئن تہ انهن پنهنجي طاقت جو نيٽورڪ مضبوط ڪرڻ دوران پرووينزانو جي پاليسي جيترو ٿي سگهي پنهنجي پاڻ کي هيٺ رکو تي عمل ڪيو. اهي مالڪ پرووين زانو جي واڳ ۾ هئا جڏهن هن رياست جي خلاف رينا کان هلندڙ جنگ ختم ڪئي جنهن ۾ 1992 ۾ مافيا لڙاڪو جُواني فالڪوني ۽ پائولو بورسيلينو مري ويا."""
mt: "According to the police, "the police had some high-level contacts with the problem that they feared would start a complete war for succession. The police said that the Piacentini were very important people in the province of Piacenza and that they had been respected by the old owners because they had strengthened their network during the war against the state in which in 1992 the Mafia killed young Falcone and Paolo Borsellino."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: جاپاني جوڊوڪا هتوشي سائتو، اولمپڪ ۾ ٻہ سوني جا ميڊل کٽيندڙ جيڪو 54 سالن جي عمر ۾ گذاري ويو آهي. موت جو سبب پِتي جو ڪيئنسر ٻڌايو ويو. هُو اڱاري جي ڏينهن اوساڪا ۾ وفات ڪري ويو. انهي سان گڏو گڏ هڪ اڳوڻي اولمپڪ ۽ عالمي چيمپيئن، سيٽو پنهنجي موت جي وقت آل جاپان جوڈو فيڊريشن ٽريننگ ڪميٽي جو چيئرمين هو.
mt: Japanese judoka Hidetoshi Nishiyama, who won two gold medals at the Olympics, died at the age of 54. The cause of death was reported as prostate cancer. He died in Osaka on the same day. In addition, a former Olympian and world champion, Seto was chairman of the All Japan Judo Federation's training committee at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: پنهنجي ٽرپ دوران، اواساڪي ڪيترن ئي موقعن تي مشڪل ۾ پئجي ويو. هُو دريائي ڌاڙيلن هٿان ڦُريو ويو، تبت ۾ پاگل ڪٿي پاران حملو ڪيو ويو، نيپال ۾ شادي کان فرار ٿيو ۽ انڊيا ۾ گرفتار ڪيو ويو هو.
mt: During his travels, Osaeki was attacked by sea pirates, attacked by a madman in Tibet, escaped a wedding in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: پنهنجي ٽرپ دوران، اواساڪي ڪيترن ئي موقعن تي مشڪل ۾ پئجي ويو. هُو دريائي ڌاڙيلن هٿان ڦُريو ويو، تبت ۾ پاگل ڪٿي پاران حملو ڪيو ويو، نيپال ۾ شادي کان فرار ٿيو ۽ انڊيا ۾ گرفتار ڪيو ويو هو.

ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: جيانڪارلو فسيشلا پنهنجي ڪار جو ڪنٽرول وڃائي ڇڏيو ۽ شروع ڪرڻ کان تمام جلد ريس ختم ڪري ڇڏي. هن جي ٽيم جي ساٿي فيرنانڊو الونسو گهڻي کانهر ريس ۾، پر هن پنهنجي پٽ-اسٽاپ کان پوءِ ريس کي ختم ڪيو، شايد ساڄي اڳيئن ٽائر ۾ تمام برو ڪيل ڦاٿو هو. مائيڪل شمومر الونسو کانپوءِ پنهنجي ريس ختم ڪيئ، ڇاڪاڻ تہ ريس جي دوران گهڻين ٽڪرن ۾ سسپينشن کي نقصان ٿيو.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and retired from the race after just a few laps. His teammate Fernando Alonso was also struggling, but retired after his pit stop, perhaps due to a puncture in the right front tire. Michael Schumacher retired after a few laps, citing suspension damage from several bumps.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: گذريل 3 مهينن ۾، 80 کان وڌيڪ گرفتار ڪيلن کي بنا ڪنهن قانوني سزا ڏيڻ جي جڳهه کان آزاد ڪيو ويو. هن سال اپريل ۾، جج گلائن طرفان جڳهه خلاف عارضي روڪ وارو آرڊر جاري ڪيو ويو ته انهن جي گرفتار ٿين کان 24 ڪلاڪن تائين بند پيلن کي آزاد ڪرڻ يقيني بنائن جن کي ڪورٽ ڪمشنر پاران شنوائي نه ملي. ڪمشنر زمانت سيٽ ڪري ٿو، جيڪڏهن منظور ٿئي ٿي، ۽ گرفتار ڪندڙ آفيسر طرفان لڳل الزام جي قانوني شڪل ڏي ٿو. ان کانپوءِ اهي الزام رياست جي ڪمپيوٽر سسٽم ۾ داخل ڪيا ويندا آهن جتان ڪيس کي ٽريڪ ڪيو ويندو آهي. ٻُڌڻي بہ تيز مقدمي جو ڏوهاري جي حق لاءِ تاريخ تي مارڪ ڪري ٿي.
mt: 80 or more have been released without charge in the last three months. In April, Judge Glain issued a temporary restraining order against the place, requiring the release of those arrested within 24 hours, who have not been certified by the court commissioner. The commissioner sets time, if approved, and the charges filed by the arresting officer. These charges are then entered into the state's computer system, from which the case is tracked. The speedy trial is marked on the calendar for the defendant's right.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: لوڊن اهو بہ چيو تہ عملدارن اهو فيصلو ڪيو تہ افغاني ٻي چونڊ لاءِ خرچو ۽ سيڪيورٽي رسڪ بچائڻ لاءِ رن آف رد ڪري. سفارتڪارن چيو ته هنن افغان آئين ۾ غيرضروري طور رن آف جو تعين ڪرڻ لاءِ ڪافي مونجهاري جو پتو لڳائي ورتو آهي. اهو اڳين رپورٽن جي مخالفت ڪري ٿو، جنهن ۾ چيو ويو هو تہ رن آف کي منسوخ ڪرڻ آئين جي خلاف هو.
mt: London said officials decided to suspend the runoff for the Afghan election and security costs for the runoff. Diplomats said they had been given enough time to comply with the Afghan constitution to cancel the runoff. This contradicts earlier reports, which said the runoff was canceled in violation of the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "پاڪستان 1947 ۾ برطانوي حڪومت جي آزادي کانپوءِ، پاڪستاني صدر فاٽا تي حڪومت ڪرڻ لاءِ ""سرڪاري نمائندن"" کي مقرر ڪري چڪو آهي، جيڪي علائقن تي لڳ ڀڳ مڪمل خودمختيار ڪنٽرول جو استعمال ڪن ٿا. پاڪستاني آئين جي آرٽيڪل 247 موجب اهي ايجنٽ سرڪاري ۽ عدالتي خدمتون مهيا ڪرڻ جا ذميوار آهن."
mt: "In 1947, after the British government granted independence to Pakistan, Pakistani President has appointed "official representatives" to govern FATA, which are areas that are used for almost complete autonomous control. Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution states that these agents are responsible for providing official and judicial services."
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: مووي، جنهن ۾ ريان گوسلنگ ۽ ايما اسٽون شامل آهن، سڀني وڏين ڪيٽيگريز ۾ نامزدگيون حاصل ڪيون. گاسلنگ ۽ اسٽون کي بهترين اداڪار ۽ اداڪاره لاءِ نامزدگيون مليون. ٻين نامزدگين ۾ بهترين فلم، هدايتڪار، سئنيما گرافي، ڪاسٽيوم ڊزائين، فلم ايڊيٽنگ، اوريجنل اسڪور، پروڊڪشن ڊزائين، سائونڊ ايڊيٽنگ، سائونڊ مڪسنگ، ۽ اوريجنل اسڪرين پلي شامل آهن. مووي جا ٻہ گانا، آڊيشن (دي فولس هو ڊريم) ۽ سٽي آف اسٽارز، کي بهترين اصلي گاني لاءِ نامزدگي ملي. لائنز گيٽ اسٽوڊيو کي 26 نامزدگيون مليون — ڪنهن ٻي اسٽوڊيو کان وڌيڪ.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress. Other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing, and Original Screenplay. The film's two songs, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars," were nominated for Best Original Song. La La Land received 14 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK اهو بہ ٻڌايو تہ نيگاٽا ضلعي ۾ ڪاشيوازڪي ڪري وا جوهري بجلي گهر عام طور تي ڪم ڪري رهيو هو. هوڪوريڪو اليڪٽرڪ پاور ڪمپني رپورٽ ڪيو ته زلزلي سان ڪجهه به متاثر نه ٿيو ۽ چيو ته هن جي شيڪا نيوڪليئر پاور پلانٽ تي نمبر 1 ۽ 2 ري ايڪٽر بند هئا. اهو رپورٽ ڪيو ويندو آهي تہ هن خطي ۾ اٽڪل 9400 گهرن ۾ پاڻي ۽ اٽڪل 100 گهرن ۾ بجلي نہ آهي. ڪجهہ رستن کي نقصان پهتو آهي، متاثر ٿيل علائقن ۾ ڪجهہ ريلوي سهولتون بند ٿي ويون آهن ۽ عيشڪاوا ضلعي ۾ نوتو هوائي اڏو بند ٿي ويو آهي.
mt: NHK reported that the Kashio Electric Power Company, which operates the Kashiwazaki-Kariwa nuclear power plant, said that the quake did not affect the plant. The company said that the plant's No. 1 and No. 2 reactors were shut down. The report said that about 9,400 homes in the area were without water and about 100 homes were without electricity. Some roads were damaged, and some railway services were suspended in the area, and the Niigata airport was closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: هن ليڪ جي مطابق، دستاويز سرحدن جي تڪرار جو حوالو ڏيندو، جيڪو فلسطين 1967 ۾ مڊل ايسٽ لڙائي کان پهرين سرحدن جي بنيان تي چاهي ٿو. ظاهري طور تي ڪور ڪيل ٻيا موضوع جنهن ۾ مستقبل جي رياست يروشلم جيڪو ٻني ملڪن جي لاءِ مقدس آهي ۽ اردن وادي جو مسئلو شامل آهي. جڏهن هڪ معاهدي تي دستخط ٿئي ٿي ته اسرائيل وادي ۾ ڏهن سالن لاءِ هڪ هلندڙ فوجي موجودگي جو مطالبو ڪري ٿو جڏهن ته PA صرف پنج سال لاءِ اها موجودگي ڇڏڻ تي راضي آهي.
mt: The article notes that the document refers to the dispute over the borders, which Israel claims to have been established before the 1967 Middle East War.  Other issues, including the future status of Jerusalem, which is holy to both parties, and the Jordan Valley, are also discussed.  When a deal is reached, Israel demands a ten-year running military presence in the valley, while the PA is willing to accept only five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "هانگ ڪانگ ۾ پيدا ٿيو، ما نيو يارڪ يونيورسٽي ۽ هارورڊ لا اسڪول ۾ تعليم حاصل ڪئي ۽ هڪ ڀيرو آمريڪي مستقل رهواسي ""گرين ڪارڊ"" حاصل ڪيو. هسي اليڪشن جي دوران تقاضا ڪئي ته ايم اي بحران جي هڪ دور ۾ ملڪ کان ڀڄي سگهي ٿو. هسي پڻ دليل ڏنو ته فوٽوجينڪ ايم اي سبسٽينس کان وڌيڪ اسٽائل آهي. اهي الزام هجڻ باوجود، ما چيني براعظم سان ويجهن لاڳاپن جي وڪالت ڪندي هڪ پليٽ فارم تي ڪاريگري سان ڪاميابي حاصل ڪئي."
mt: "Born in Hong Kong, educated at New York University and Harvard Law School and a permanent resident of the United States with a "green card," Ma demanded during the election that she be allowed to flee the country during a crisis. Ma also argued that a photogenic Ma was more stylish than the substance of the office. Despite these criticisms, Ma has successfully advocated for close ties with the Chinese mainland on a platform of creativity and success."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: ان کانپوءِ جڏهن اهو واضع ٿيو ته ڪيترائي خاندان بي دخلي خلاف وڙهڻ لاءِ قانوني مدد وٺي ڪري رهيا آهن، 20 مارچ تي هائوسنگ اسڪيم (ٺڳي) جي متاثرين لاءِ ايسٽ بي ڪميونٽي لا سينٽر تي هڪ اجلاس رکيو ويو هو. جڏهن ڪرائيدارن ان سان ٿيل شين جي باري ۾ ٻڌائڻ شروع ڪيو، تہ ان ۾ شامل گهڻين خاندانن کي اوچتو احساس ٿيو تہ OHA جي ڪيرولن ولسن انهن جي سيڪيورٽي ڊبازٽ چوري ڪري ڇڏيو ۽ ڀڄي ويو. لاڪ ووڊ گارڊن جي مسواڙين جو خيال آهي تہ بي دخلي کي منهن ڏيڻ لاءِ ٻيا 40 ڪٽنب يا ان کان وڌيڪ ٿي سگهن ٿا. ڇاڪاڻ تہ انهن کي خبر پئي آهي تہ OHA پوليس اوڪلينڊ م پبلڪ هائوسنگ پراپرٽيز جي پڻ جاچ ڪري رهئي آهي جيڪو هائوسنگ اسڪيم ۾ ڦاسي سگهن ٿيون.
mt: After this, when it became clear that many families were seeking legal help to fight the eviction, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the affected. When the landlords heard about the things that were stolen, many of the families felt that OHA's Carolyn Wilson had stolen and destroyed their security deposit. It is believed that there are another 40 or more households that could be evicted. Because they have been told that OHA is also investigating Oakland Public Housing Properties, which are also in the housing scheme.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: ڊوڙ جي پيروي ڪندي، ڪيسيلسوڪي 2،250 پوائنٽن سان ڊرائيورن جو چيمپين شپ ليڊر رَهي ٿو. ست پوائنٽن کان پوئتي، جانسن 2243 پوائنٽن سان ٻي نمبر تي آهي. ٽيون، هيملن ويهه پوائنٽو پوئتي آهي، پر بوير کان پنج اڳتي آهي. ڪهني ۽ ٽروڪس، جونيئر 2,220 ۽ 2,207 پوائنٽن سان ترتيبوار پنجين ۽ ڇهين نمبر تي آهن. اسٽيورٽ، گورڊن، ڪينسيٿ، ۽ هروڪ سيزن ۾ رهندي ڊرائيور چيمپيئن شپ جي لاءِ ٽاپ ٽين پوزيشنون حاصل ڪيون.
mt: In pursuit of the lead, Cassils is 2,250 points ahead of the driver's championship leader. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2243 points. Third, Hemlin is 5 points behind, but 5 points ahead of Bowyer. Knaus and Truex, Jr. are fourth and fifth with 2,220 and 2,207 points, respectively. Stewert, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick are the top 10 drivers in points for the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: اهو تاريخ ۾ پنجون ڀيرو سمجهو وڃي ٿو جيڪو ماڻهن ڏٺو ته زمين تي ڪرندڙ ڪيميائي طور تي تصديق ٿيل مارشين مادو ڇا هو. زمين تي اٽڪل 24،000 ڄاتل آسماني پٿر ڪري چڪا آهن جن مان صرف 34 جي تصديق ٿي آهي تہ اهي اصلي مريخ جا آهن. انهن ٽڪرين مان 15 پٿر گذريل جولاءِ ۾ پٿريلي شاور ۾ لڳايا ويا آهن. ڪجهه پٿر، جيڪي زمين تي گهڻا گهٽ ملندا آهن، انهن کي في اونس 11000 آمريڪي ڊالرن کان 22500 ڊالرن تائين وڪرو ڪيو ويندو آهي، جيڪو سوني جي قيمت کان ڏهہ ڀيرا وڌيڪ آهي.
mt: It is the fifth time that people have seen rocks that fell from the sky. About 24,000 meteorites have been found on Earth, of which only 34 have been confirmed to be from Mars. Of these rocks, 15 were collected in a meteorite shower in July. Some rocks, which are rare on Earth, are sold for between $11,000 and $22,500 per ounce, which is ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: شو ماڪر جيڪو 7 ڀيرا فارمولا 1 چيمپئين شپ کٽڻ کانپوءِ 2006 ۾ رٽائر ٿي ويو، زخمي فيلپ مسا جي جاءِ تي هو. برازيلين کي 2009 ۾ هنگيرين گرانڊ پرڪس جي دوران ٽڪر لڳڻ کانپوءِ مٿي ۾ گهڻو ڌڪ لڳو هو. ماسا کي گهٽ ۾ گهٽ 2009 جو رهيل سيزن مان ٻاهر رهڻو آهي.
mt: 7-time Formula One champion Schumacher, who retired in 2006 after winning the title seven times, was injured in a crash with Felipe Massa. The Brazilian had been hit in the head in a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is expected to miss the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: شو ماڪر جيڪو 7 ڀيرا فارمولا 1 چيمپئين شپ کٽڻ کانپوءِ 2006 ۾ رٽائر ٿي ويو، زخمي فيلپ مسا جي جاءِ تي هو. برازيلين کي 2009 ۾ هنگيرين گرانڊ پرڪس جي دوران ٽڪر لڳڻ کانپوءِ مٿي ۾ گهڻو ڌڪ لڳو هو. ماسا کي گهٽ ۾ گهٽ 2009 جو رهيل سيزن مان ٻاهر رهڻو آهي.

src: هينئر تائين، AOL آمريڪا ۾ گهڻي استعمال جي ڪري، پنهنجي زور تي IM مارڪيٽ ۾ منتقل ۽ ترقي ڪرڻ جي قابل ٿي ويو آهي. اهو بندوبست هجڻ ڪري، اهو آزادي ختم ٿي سگهي ٿي. Yahoo جي صارفن جي تعداد ۽ Microsoft خدمتن جي تعداد ٻئي ملي ڪري AOL جي صارفن جي تعداد جو مقابلو ڪندا.
mt: AOL has been able to make inroads and grow in the IM market in the United States, due to its popularity. It is losing its freedom, due to its setup, and Yahoo's and Microsoft's numbers are both approaching AOL's.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: هينئر تائين، AOL آمريڪا ۾ گهڻي استعمال جي ڪري، پنهنجي زور تي IM مارڪيٽ ۾ منتقل ۽ ترقي ڪرڻ جي قابل ٿي ويو آهي. اهو بندوبست هجڻ ڪري، اهو آزادي ختم ٿي سگهي ٿي. Yahoo جي صارفن جي تعداد ۽ Microsoft خدمتن جي تعداد ٻئي ملي ڪري AOL جي صارفن جي تعداد جو مقابلو ڪندا.
mt: AOL has been able to make inroads and grow in the IM market in the United States, due to its popularity. It is losing its freedom, due to its setup, and Yahoo's and Microsoft's numbers are both approaching AOL's.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: ڪلهه صبح، ترڪي جي گيزيانٽيپ ۾ پوليس هيڊ ڪوارٽر تي ڪار بم ڌماڪو ٿيو، ٻه پوليس اهلڪار مارجي ويا ۽ ويهه کان ويڪ ٻيا ماڻهو زخمي ٿيا. گورنر جي آفيس ٻڌايو تہ زخمي ٿيل ماڻهن ۾ اُڻويهہ پوليس وارا هئا. پوليس چيو تہ اهي حملي جي ذميواري داعش (ISIL) جي مبينا شدت پسندن تي هڻن ٿا.
mt: At dawn, a car bomb exploded outside a police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers and wounding 28 others. The governor's office said the wounded included 26 police officers. Police said the attack was carried out by suspected members of the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: میسوچُوسٽس جي اڳوڻي گورنر مِٽ رومني فلوريڊا اڱاري جي ڏينهن تي ريپبليڪن پارٽي جي صدارتي پرائمري اليڪشن 46 سيڪڙو ووٽن سان ڪاميابي حاصل ڪئي. ايوان جو اڳوڻو آمريڪي اسپيڪر نيوٽ گنگرچ 32 سيڪڙو ووٽ کڻي ٻئي نمبر تي آيو. هڪ فاتح-سڄي-رياست وٺي ٿو، فلوريڊا هنن کي فرنٽر-رنر طور تي ريپبلڪن پارٽي جي نامزدگيءَ لاءِ اڳتي ڌڪي پنهنجي سڀني پنجاهه وفدن کي رومني کي ڏئي ڇڏيا، .
mt: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida primary on Tuesday with 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. A winner-take-all state, Florida delegates have already begun to throw their support behind Romney, giving him all five of their pledged delegates.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "اڳوڻي هائوس اسپيڪر نيوٽ گنگرچ، ٽيڪساس جي گورنر رِڪ پيري، ۽ ڪانگريس خاتون مِشيل باڪمين، ترتيب وار چوٿين، پنجين ۽ ڇهين نمبر تي پورو ڪيو. نتيجا اچڻ کانپوءِ، جنگرچ سينٽورم جي تعريف ڪئي، پر رومني لاءِ سخت الفاظ چيا، جن جي پاران جنگرچ خلاف لووا ۾ منفي مهم جا اشتهار نشر ڪيا ويا هئا. پيري ٻڌايو تہ ""اڄ رات ڪائوڪس جي رزلٽ جو جائزو وٺڻ لاءِ ٽيڪساس واپس موٽيندو، اهو طئي ڪندو تہ آيا ان ڊوڙ ۾ منهنجي لاءِ ڪو اڳيان رستو آهي يا نہ""، پر پوءِ ان چيو تہ هي هن ڊوڙ ۾ رهندو ۽ 21 جنوري تي سائوٿ ڪيرولينا پرائمري ۾ مقابلو ڪندو. باڪمين، جنهن آگسٽ ۾ ايمس اسٽرا پول کٽيو، ان پنهنجي مهم ختم ڪرڻ جو فيصلو ڪيو."
mt: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michelle Bachmann, finished fourth, fifth and sixth, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich praised the Senate, but used harsh words for Romney, who had been criticized by Gingrich in the last few days. Perry said he would "return to Texas tonight to take a look at the results of the caucus," but then said he would stay in the race and compete in South Carolina's primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "اسٽيشن جي ويب سائيٽ هن شو کي ""نئين ۽ فحش گيڪي اسپن سان پراڻي اسڪول جي ريڊيو ٿيٽر""! جي طور تي بيان ڪري ٿي. ان جي شروعاتي ڏينهن ۾، شو صرف ۽ صرف گهڻي عرصي کان هلندڙ انٽرنيٽ ريڊيو سائيٽ ٽوگينيٽ ريڊيو، ٽاڪ ريڊيو تي مرڪوز هڪ سائيٽ تي نثر ڪيو ويو هو. 2015 جي آخر ۾، ٽوگيٽنيٽ هڪ ماتحت اسٽيشن طور ايسٽرونيٽ ريڊيو قائم ڪيو. هن شو ۾ غير پيشور آوازن جا اداڪار اصلي طور تي پيش ڪيا ويا، جيڪي ايسٽ ٽيڪساز جا مقامي آهن."
mt: "The station's website describes the show as "New and filthy geeky spin on old school radio theater!" In its early days, the show was only available on the long-running Internet radio site, The Geeky Show, a subsidiary station of East Texas Radio. In late 2015, The Geeky Show became an official station of East Texas Radio. The show features non-professional voice actors, who are all local to East Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: ممبئي تي حملو ڪندڙ 26 نومبر 2008 تي ٻيڙي جي ذريعي پهتا، پاڻ سان دستي بم، خودڪار هٿيار کڻي آيا ۽ ڪيترين ئي جاين کي نشانو بڻايو جنهن ۾ ڇترپتي شوا جي ٽرمينس ريلوي اسٽيشن ۽ مشهور تاج محل هوٽل شامل هئا. ڊيوڊ هيڊلي جي اسڪائوٽنگ ۽ معلومات گڏ ڪرڻ پاڪستاني جنگجو گروپ لشڪر-اي- طيبه جي 10 هٿيار بندن پاران آپريشن کي فعال ڪرڻ ۾ مدد ڪئي. حملي پاڪستان ۽ هندوستان جي وچ ۾ لاڳاپن تي وڏي ڇڪتاڻ پيدا ڪئي.
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers arrived by boat, brought with them hand grenades and automatic weapons and marked many places, including Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering helped the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba activate the operation. The attack strained relations between Pakistan and India.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "ڪينيڊا جي خلاف نڊال جو هيڊ ٽو هيڊ رڪارڊ 7–2 آهي. هي تازو برسبين اوپن ۾ رائونڪ خلاف هارائي ويٺو. نڊال پهرين سرو ۾ 76 ميچ کٽندڙ پوائنٽس ۾ 88% نيٽ پوائنٽس حاصل ڪيون. ميچ کانپوءِ، ڪنگ آف ڪلي چيو ته، ""مان هتي تمام اهم واقعن جي آخري رائونڊ ۾ واپس اچڻ جي باري ۾ پرجوش آهيان. آئون اهو کٽڻ جي ڪوشش لاءِ هتي آهيان."""
mt: "Canada's record against Australia is 7–2. This is the latest loss to Russia in the Brisbane Open. The team won 76 matches with 88% net points. After the match, the King of the Clue said, "I am very excited to come back to the last round of important events. I am here to try to win."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: گذريل هفتي نيڪڊ نيوز اعلان ڪيو تہ اهو پنهنجي بين الاقوامي ٻولي جي مينڊيٽ کي ٽن نئين براد ڪاسٽن سان نيوز رپورٽنگ کي وڏي پئماني تي وڌائيندو. اڳ ۾ ئي انگريزي ۽ جاپاني ۾ رپورٽ ڪري رهيو آهي، عالمي تنظيم ٽيليويزن، ويب ۽ موبائل ڊوائيس لاءِ اسپينش، اطالوي، ۽ ڪورين ٻولين جا پروگرام شروع ڪري رهي آهي.
mt: Last week, NDTV announced that it would expand its international language news coverage with three new bureaus. It already reports in English and Japanese, and has been broadcasting in Spanish, Italian, and Korean for global television, web, and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
