src: ٻيهر داخل ٿيڻ وارو جهٽڪو ثقافتي جهٽڪي (هني مون وارو مرحلو گهٽ هوندو آهي) کان پوءِ اچي ٿو جيڪو گهڻي عرصي تائين رهي ٿو، ۽ وڌيڪ تڪليف وارو ٿي سگهي ٿو. اهي مسافر جنن کي نئي ثقافت ۾ رلڻ ملڻ لاءِ آسان وقت لڳو هو پر ڪڏهن ڪڏهن پنهنجي اباڻي ثقافت ۾ واپس رلڻ ملڻ لاءِ ڏکيو وقت گذارڻو پوي ٿو. جڏهن توهان ٻاهرين ملڪ ۾ رهي پنهنجي گهر واپس موٽيو ٿا تہ، توهان نئي ثقافت کي اختيار ڪري ڇڏيو آهي ۽ توهان پنهنجي گهريلو ثقافت مان ڪجهہ پنهنجيون عادتون وڃائي ڇڏيون آهن. جڏهن توهان پهرين ڀيرو ٻاهرين ملڪ ويا، تہ ماڻهن کي صبر ۽ سمجهہ هئي، اهو سمجهندي تہ مسافر کي هڪ نئين ملڪ ۾ ريتي کي اختيار ڪرڻ جي ضرورت آهي. ماڻهو اهو نٿا سمجهي سگهن تہ ملڪ واپس اچڻ وارن مسافرن لاءِ پڻ صبر ۽ سمجهہ ضروري آهي.
mt: 2nd time around, the jetlag (the cultural jetlag is lessening) comes after the cultural jetlag (the cultural jetlag is lessening), which lasts for a long time, and can be more difficult. These travelers who go to a new culture are easy to adapt to the new culture, but sometimes they feel sad to adapt to their old culture again. When you return to your home country after living in a foreign country, you have adopted a new culture and you have given up some of your home culture. When you first went abroad, people were patient and understanding, realizing that travelers need to adapt to a new country. People do not realize that travelers also need patience and understanding when they return to their home country.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: موز (جنهن کي هڪ ايل به چيو ويندو آهي) فطري طور تي جذباتي نہ آهي، پر جيڪڏهن خطرو محسوس ٿئي ٿو تہ هو پنهنجو بچاءُ ڪندو. جڏهن ماڻهو ٻارانهن سڱي کي ممڪن طور تي خطرناڪ نٿا سمجهن تہ، اهي گهڻو ويجهو بہ وڃي سگهن ٿا ۽ پنهنجي پاڻ کي خطري ۾ وجهي سگهن ٿا.
mt: A mouse (which is sometimes called a "rodent") is not naturally aggressive, but if it feels threatened it will defend itself. When humans are not able to perceive a rodent as dangerous, they will approach it closely and handle it without fear.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: موز (جنهن کي هڪ ايل به چيو ويندو آهي) فطري طور تي جذباتي نہ آهي، پر جيڪڏهن خطرو محسوس ٿئي ٿو تہ هو پنهنجو بچاءُ ڪندو. جڏهن ماڻهو ٻارانهن سڱي کي ممڪن طور تي خطرناڪ نٿا سمجهن تہ، اهي گهڻو ويجهو بہ وڃي سگهن ٿا ۽ پنهنجي پاڻ کي خطري ۾ وجهي سگهن ٿا.
mt: A mouse (which is sometimes called a "rodent") is not naturally aggressive, but if it feels threatened it will defend itself. When humans are not able to perceive a rodent as dangerous, they will approach it closely and handle it without fear.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: گرمي جي ڏينهن ۾، مسافر معجزات جو تجربو ڪري سگھن ٿا جيڪي پاڻي (يا ٻين شين) جو دوکو ڏيندا آهن. اهو خطرناڪ ٿي سگهي ٿو جيڪڏهن مسافر قيمتي توانائي ۽ بچيل پاڻي وڃائي نظري فريب جي پٺيان پوي ٿو. ايستائين جو گرم ترين ريگستان ۾ رات جي وقت انتهائي ٿڌ ٿي سگهي ٿي. گرم ڪپڙن کان سواءِ هائيپوٿرميا حقيقي خطرو آهي.
mt: On hot days, passengers can experience miracles that cool water (or other things) that they can touch. It can be dangerous if passengers transfer valuable energy and remaining water under the illusion of fraud. Until the hottest desert at night can become extremely cold. Without hot clothes, hypothermia is a real danger.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: ڊومينيسين ري پبلڪ (اسپينش: ريپبليڪا ڊومينيسانا) هڪ ڪيريبين ملڪ آهي جيڪو هسپينيولا جي ٻيٽ جو اڌ اوڀر پاسو ولاري ٿو، جيڪو هيٽي سان حصيداري ڪري ٿو. اڇي ريٽ واري سمنڊ ڪنارن ۽ جبل جي نظارن کان علاوه، هي ملڪ آمريڪا ۾ سڀ کان قديم يورپين شهر جو ڳڙ آهي، جيڪو هاڻي سانتو ڊومنگو جو حصو آهي. هن ٻيٽ تي سڀ کان پهرين تينوس ۽ ڪيريبس آباد هئا. ڪيريبس آراواڪن ڳالهائيندڙ ٻولي وارا هئا جيڪي 10,000 BCE جي لڳ ڀڳ آيا هئا. يورپي کوجين جي اچڻ کانپوءِ ڪجهه سالن اندر ، ٽينوس جي آبادي اسپين جي فتح مندن جي ڪري گهٽجي وئي هئي فيري بارٽولوم ڊي لاس ڪاساس (ٽراٽاڊو ڊي لاس انڊياس) جي بنياد تي 1492 ۽ 1498 جي وچ ۾ هسپانوي فاتحن تقريبن 100،000 تينوس کي قتل ڪيو.
mt: The Dominican Republic is a Caribbean nation that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. Its capital is Santo Domingo, the oldest continuously inhabited European city in the Americas and the site of the first cathedral, monastery, and fortress in the Americas. The first inhabitants of the island were the Taíno, an Arawakan-speaking people. They were wiped out by the Spanish conquest of the Americas, beginning in 1492 and 1498, when the Spanish conquistador, Christopher Columbus, landed on the island. The Taíno were forced into slavery and were later replaced by African slaves. The island was first colonized by Spain and later ruled by France. Spanish rule remained in place until the early 19th century, when Haiti attained its independence after a successful slave revolt. The Dominican Republic became independent in 1844.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "ڊائون هل سنو اسپورٽس، جن ۾ اسڪيئنگ ۽ سنوبورڊنگ شامل آهن، اهي مشهور رانديون آهن جن ۾ برف سان ڍڪيل ميدان تي سلائيڊنگ ڪرڻ يا پنهنجي پير سان هڪ سنو بورڊ منسلڪ ڪري سلائيڊنگ ڪرڻ شامل آهي. اسڪيئنگ هڪ وڏي سفر واري سرگرمي آهي، جنهن ۾ گهڻا شوقين هوندا آهن، انهن کي عام طور تي ""اسڪي بمز"" چيو وڃي ٿو، اهي ڪنهن خاص ماڳ تي اسڪيئنگ جي چوڌاري پورين موڪلن جو منصوبو ٺاهين ٿا. اسڪائينگ جو تصور گهڻو پراڻو آهي — اسڪائير جي غار تي چٽسالي 5000 BC پراڻي آهي. ڊائون ھل اسڪيئنگ هڪ اسپورٽ طور تي گھٽ ۾ گھٽ 17 هين صدي ۾ اچي ٿي، ۽ 1861 ۾ آسٽريليا ۾ نارويجين طرفان پهريون تفريحي اسڪي ڪلب کوليو ويو هو."
mt: "Downhill skiing, which includes sliding on snow or sledding on a snowboard, are popular sports in which sliding on snow or sledding on a snowboard is included. Skiing is a long-distance sport, in which many enthusiasts are involved, they are commonly referred to as "ski bums", they plan the best slopes for skiing around a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — the cave paintings of the Ice Age are 5000 BC old. Downhill skiing as a sport came in the late 17th century, and the first recreational ski club was opened in Australia in 1861 by Norwegians."
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: اوڀر آفريقي ٻيٽ انڊين سمنڊ ۾ آفريقا جي اوڀر سامونڊي ڪناري کان پري آهن. جهنگلي جاندارن جي ڳالهہ ڪئي وڃي تہ مداگاسڪر هينئر تائين جو سڀني کان وڏو ۽ کنڊ آهي. گهڻا ننڍا ٻيٽ آزاد ملڪ آهن، يا فرانس سان لاڳاپيل آهن، ۽ انهن کي لگزري بيچ رسورٽس بہ چئبو آهي. عربن زمينن تي بہ اسلام آندو، ۽ اهو ڪومورس ۽ ميوٽي ۾ وڏي پيماني تي پکڙيون. يورپي اثر ۽استعماريت 15 هين صدي ۾ شروع ٿي، جڏهن پرتگالي ايڪسپلورر واسڪو دا گاما يورپ کان انڊيا تائين ڪيپ روٽ ڳولهي ورتو.
mt: The islands of the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest and wildest of them all. Many are independent countries, or are associated with France, and are known as the luxury beach resorts. Islam was brought to the mainland by the Arabs, and is widespread in Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, when Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama sailed the Cape Route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: هتي سج اڀرڻ کي ڏسڻ لاءِ کليل جاءِ تي ايسٽر واري رات جاڳي گذارڻ هڪ رواج آهي. هن ثقافت جي باري ۾ يقيناً عيسائي مذهب جون علمي تشريحون موجود آهن، پر اهي عيسائي مذهب کان پهرين واري بهار ۽ ٻار پيدا ٿيڻ واري رسم ٿي سگهي ٿي. ايسٽر هفتي جي دوران گهڻا روايتي گرجا گهر گهڻو ڪري ڇنڇر رات هڪ ايسٽر اوجاڳو ڪن ٿا، ميڙ گهڻو ڪري عيسيٰ جو ٻيهر زنده ٿيڻ کي ملهائڻ لاءِ اڌ رات جو خاص وقت تي جشن ملهائيندا آهن.
mt: Here, it is customary to spend the night of Easter vigil in a church or cathedral.  The custom is likely to have pre-Christian origins, but Christian explanations exist.  Many traditional churches hold a vigil on the night of Holy Saturday, the night before Easter Sunday, to commemorate the resurrection of Jesus Christ.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: اڪواڊور گهري ٿو ته ڪيوبن شهرين کي بين الاقوامي ايئر پورٽس يا فرنٽيئر داخلا پوائنٽس ذريعي اڪواڊور ۾ داخل ٿيڻ کان اڳ هڪ دعوت نامو ملي. هن خط کي ايڪواڊور جي خارجي معاملن واري وزارت ذريعي قانوني حساب سان ٺاهڻ گهرجي، ۽ ڪجهہ ضرورتن جي تعميل ڪرڻي پوندي. اهي گهرجون ٻن ملڪن جي وچان انتظام ٿيل لڏپلاڻ جي رواني مهيا ڪرڻ جي لاءِ ٺاهيون ويون آهي. ڪيوبا جا شهري جيڪي آمريڪا جي گرين ڪارڊ هولڊر آهن انهن کي هن ضرورت کان استثنا حاصل ڪرڻ لاءِ اڪواڊورين قونصليٽ جو دورو ڪرڻ گهرجي. سفري تاريخن کان توهان جو پاسپورٽ گهٽ ۾ گهٽ 6 مهينن لاءِ مفيد هجڻ گهرجي. توهان جي رهڻ جي عرصي کي ثابت ڪرڻ لاءِ هڪ رائونڊ/اڳتي سفر واري ٽڪيٽ جي ضرورت آهي.
mt: Ecuador is requiring Cubans to present an invitation letter before entering the country through international airports or frontier points. The letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and some requirements must be met. These requirements are intended to facilitate the orderly movement of people between the two countries. Cubans who are green card holders in the United States must visit the Ecuadorian consulate to obtain an exemption. Your passport must be valid for at least six months from the date of travel. A round-trip ticket is required to prove the length of your stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: اکين جا چشما هڪ ٻاهرين ملڪ ۾ سستا ٿي سگهن ٿا خاص طور تي گهٽ آمدني وارن ملڪن ۾ جتي مزدوي جي قيمت گهٽ آهي. گهر ۾ اکين جو معائنو ڪرائڻ تي غور ڪريو، خاص طور تي جيڪڏهن انشورنس هيٺ اچي ٿو، ۽ دوا جي پرچي ڪنهن ٻئي هنڌ فائل ڪرڻ لاءِ گڏ کڻي اچو. اهڙن علائقن ۾ موجود هائي-اينڊ برانڊ نالن واري فريمز جا ٻه مسئلا ٿي سگهن ٿا؛ ڪجهه نقل ڪاپي ٿي سگهن ٿا، ۽ اصل درآمد ٿيل گهر کان وڌيڪ گهر کان مهانگا ٿي سگهن ٿا.
mt: Eyes are cheap in other countries, especially in low-income countries where labor costs are low. Consider having your eyes checked at home, especially if you have insurance, and bring your prescription to another location. There are two problems with high-end brand names in such areas; some are copied, and the original imported from home is more expensive than home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: فاڪ لينڊ جي سرڪاري ڪرنسي فاڪ لينڊ پائونڊ آهي (FKP) جنهن جي قيمت برطانوي پائونڊ (GBP) جي برابر آهي. FIC ويسٽ اسٽور کان هن ٻيٽ ۾ صرف هڪ بئنڪ ۾ پئسا مٽا سٽا ٿي سگهن ٿا جيڪو اسٽينلي ۾ آهي. برطانوي پائونڊ عام طور تي ٻيٽن ۾ ڪٿي به ۽ اسٽينلي ڪريڊٽ ڪارڊ ۾ قبول ڪيا ويندا ۽ آمريڪي ڊالر پڻ اڪثر قبول ڪيا ويندا آهن. ٻاهر وارين ٻيٽن تي ڪريڊٽ ڪارڊ گهڻو ڪري قبول نہ ڪيا ويندا، جيتوڻڪ برطانيا ۽ آمريڪا جي ڪرنسي وٺي سگهجي ٿيون؛ ڪهڙي قسم جي ادائيگي قابل جوڳي آهي پهرين مالڪن سان پڇي وٺو. ٻيٽن کان ٻاهر فلڪ لينڊ جي ڪرنسي مٽائڻ تقريبن ناممڪن آهي، تنهن ڪري ٻيٽ ڇڏڻ کان پهريان ايڪسچينج ڪري وٺو.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland Islands pound (FKP), which is worth the same as the British pound (GBP). FIC is only one bank in Stanley that will exchange money for the islands. British pounds are usually accepted on the islands and in Stanley credit cards, and American dollars are also usually accepted. Credit cards are usually not accepted on other islands, although British and American currency can be exchanged. First, ask the owners of the property you are buying for the best way to exchange money. It is almost impossible to exchange money outside the islands, so exchange money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: گهڻن مندرن ۾ ساليانو فيسٽيول نومبر جي آخر کان مئي جي وچ ۾ شروع ٿئي ٿو، جيڪو هر مندر جي سالياني ڪئلينڊر جي حساب سان ٿيندو آهي. مندر جا گهڻا فيسٽيول مندر جي يادگار واقعي يا ديوي ۽ ديوتائن جي جنم ڏينهن يا ٻي ڪا وڏي تقريب جيڪو مندر سان لاڳاپيل آهي. ڪيريلا جي مندرن جي ميلو ڏسڻ لاءِ گهڻو دلچسپ آهي، باقاعدي جلوس سان سينگاريل هاٿي، مندر جا ڀڄني ۽ ٻيا جشن.
mt: Many temples have festivals that run from the end of November to the middle of May, which are based on the temple's annual calendar. Many temple festivals are based on the birth anniversary of a temple deity or deity, or some other major event associated with the temple. The temple festival in Kerala is very interesting, with decorated elephants, temple dancers and other festivities.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: خاص حيثيت جي لاءِ گهڻي رقم ڏيڻ فرسٽ ڪلاس يا بزنس ڪلاس ۾ سفر جو ظاهري طريقو آهي (اڃا اهو بهتر آهي، تہ توهان جي ڪمپني توهان جي لاءِ ڪري). جيتوڻيڪ، اهو سستو نه هوندو آهي: جيئن ٿورن جا انگ اکر، آڱرين جي حساب سان، توهان بزنس لاءِ عام اڪانامي ڪلاس واري ڀاڙي کان چار ڀيرا، فرسٽ ڪلاس لاءِ يارانهن ڀيرا مٿي ادائگي ڪرڻ جي اميد ڪري سگهو ٿا. عام ڳالهه طور، A کان B تائين ڊائريڪٽ فلائيٽ تي ڪاروبار يا فرسٽ ڪلاس سيٽن لاءِ رعايت ڳولڻ جو ڪو به فائدو ناهي. ايئر لائنز چڱي ريت ڄاڻين ٿيون ته جهازن جو هڪ مخصوص بنيادي گروپ آهي جيڪي تيز ۽ تسڪين حاصل ڪرڻ جي استحڪام لاءِ تمام گهڻا ڊالر ادا ڪرڻ تي راضي آهن ۽ انهي مطابق ئي ڪرايو وصول ڪن ٿا.
mt: 1. For the sake of prestige, paying a premium for first class or business class travel is the obvious way to go (and it's better yet if your company is footing the bill). However, it's not cheap: as the old saying goes, you can't get something for nothing, and you can expect to pay four times as much for business class and ten times as much for first class as you would for coach. In general, there is no benefit to be had in negotiating a discount on a direct flight for business or first class seats. Airlines know that there is a specific group of people who are willing to pay a lot of money for speed and comfort, and they charge accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: ايئر لائنز جهڙوڪ ايمريٽس، اتحاد ايئر ويز، قطر ايئر ويز ۽ ترڪش ايئر لائنز پنهنجون خدمتون سٺي نموني سان افريقا تائين وڌائي ڇڏيون آهن، ۽ ٻين يورپي ايئر لائنز جي نسبت مسابقتي قيمتن تي آفريڪا جي ڪيترن ئي وڏن شهرن ڏانهن رابطا پيش ڪن ٿيون. 2014 تائين ترڪش ايئر لائنز 30 آفريقي ملڪن ۾ 39 منزلن تائين پرواز ڪري ٿو. جيڪڏهن توهان وٽ سفر ڪرڻ لاءِ اضافي وقت آهي ته اهو چيڪ ڪريو ته افريقا ڏانهن توهان جو ڪُل ڀاڙو پوري دنيا جي ڀاڙي جي ڀيٽ ۾ ڪيترو آهي. آفريڪا کان ٻاهر انهن سڀني جڳهين لاءِ اضافي ويزائن، روانگي ٽيڪسز، گرائونڊ ٽرانسپورٽ وغيره جي اضافي قيمت شامل ڪرڻ نه وساريو.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have expanded their services to Africa well, and other European airlines offer competitive prices to many large cities in Africa. By 2014, Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries. If you have extra time to travel, check how much your total bill is compared to the total bill of the world. Do not include additional visas, taxes, ground transportation, etc. in Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: سپر مارڪيٽ ۾ خوراڪ خريد ڪرڻ عام طور تي کاڌو حاصل ڪرڻ جو سستو تريب طريقو آهي. پچائڻ جي موقعي کان علاوه، چونڊون پهريان-ٺهيل کاڌ خوراڪ جي شين تائين محدود هونديون آهن. اڳتي وڌندي سپر مارڪيٽن مان ريڊي-ميڊ کاڌي جا مختلف سيڪشن ٺهي رهيا آهن. جيتوڻيڪ ڪجهه مائڪرو ويوو اوون يا خوراڪ کي گرم ڪرڻ جا ٻيا وسيلا فراهم ڪن ٿا. ڪجھ ملڪن يا اسٽورن جي قسمن ۾، گهٽ ۾ گهٽ هڪ آن-سائيٽ ريسٽورينٽ آهي، اڪثر ڪري مناسب قيمتن سان هڪ غير رسمي.

ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: بيلجيم ۽ سوئٽزلينڊ ۾ ڳالهائيندڙ فرانسيسي جا قسم فرانس ۾ ڳالهائيندڙ فرانسيسي کان ٿورا مختلف آهن، جيتوڻڪ اهي باهمي سمجهڻ لاءِ ڪافي هڪجهڙا آهن. خصوصي طور تي، فرانسيسي ڳالهائيندڙ بيلجيم ۽ سوئٽزرلينڊ ۾ نمبرن جي نظام ۾ ڪجهه انوکيون خاصيتون آهن جيڪي فرانس ۾ ڳالهائي ويندڙ فرانسيسي کان مختلف آهن ۽ ڪجهه لفظن جو تلفظ به ٿورو مختلف آهي. تنهن هوندي بہ، سڀئي فرانسيسي ڳالهائيندڙ بيلجين ۽ سوئس اسڪول ۾ معياري فرانسيسي ٻولي سکي سگهيا پي، تہ جيئن اهي توهان کي سمجهڻ جي قابل هوندا توڙي توهان معياري فرانسيسي نمبرنگ سسٽم استعمال ڪيو هجي.
mt: Belgian and Swiss French are slightly different from the French spoken in France, although they are mutually intelligible. In particular, Belgian and Swiss French have some numerical peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France and some words are pronounced differently. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss can learn standard French in school, so that they can be understood by you, even if you use the standard French numbering system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: صرف ڪجهہ ايئر لائنس اڃا تائين سوگ وارن جو ڪرايو پيش ڪن ٿا، جيڪو آخري منٽ جي ڪفن جي سفر جي قيمت ڪجهہ گهٽ ڪندا آهن. ايئر لائنز جيڪي اهو آڇ ڪن ٿيون انهن ۾ ايئر ڪينيڊا ، ڊيلٽا ايئر لائينز ، آمريڪا يا ڪينيڊا کان ايندڙ پروازن لاءِ لفٿانسا، ۽ ويسٽ جيٽ شامل آهن. هر صورت ۾ توهان کي لازمي طور تي ايئرلائن کان فون ذريعي بُڪ ڪرائڻ ضروري آهي.
mt: Only a few airlines currently waive the surcharge for funeral flights, which are typically cheaper than last-minute shrouds. Airlines that do this include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, American Airlines, and Lufthansa for flights arriving in the United States or Canada. In any case, you must necessarily book a flight with the airline by phone.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: جڏهن توهان پنهنجي ملڪ سان ٻاهر هجو تہ نيويگيٽ ڪرڻ لاءِ توهان پنهنجي سمارٽ فون تي GPS نيويگيشن ائپس استعمال ڪرڻ آسان ۽ گهڻو موزون ٿي سگهي ٿو. اهو هڪ GPS لاءِ نوان نقشا خريد ڪرڻ، هڪ اسٽينڊ الون GPS ڊوائيس يا هڪ ڪار رينٽل ڪمپني لاءِ هڪ ڪرايي تي ڏيڻ لاءِ پئسا بچائي سگهي ٿو. جيڪڏهن توهان وٽ پنهنجي فون لاءِ ڊيٽا ڪنيڪشن ناهي، يا جڏهن اهو حد کان ٻاهر آهي، ته انهن جي ڪارڪردگي محدود يا غير موجود ٿي سگهي ٿي.
mt: When you travel abroad, you can easily and conveniently use your smartphone's GPS navigation app to find your way. That's cheaper than buying a new map for a GPS, renting an entire GPS device, or paying a car rental company for a speed. If you don't have data connection for your phone, or when it's out of range, their functionality is limited or nonexistent.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: جڏهن توهان پنهنجي ملڪ سان ٻاهر هجو تہ نيويگيٽ ڪرڻ لاءِ توهان پنهنجي سمارٽ فون تي GPS نيويگيشن ائپس استعمال ڪرڻ آسان ۽ گهڻو موزون ٿي سگهي ٿو. اهو هڪ GPS لاءِ نوان نقشا خريد ڪرڻ، هڪ اسٽينڊ الون GPS ڊوائيس يا هڪ ڪار رينٽل ڪمپني لاءِ هڪ ڪرايي تي ڏيڻ لاءِ پئسا بچائي سگهي ٿو. جيڪڏهن توهان وٽ پنهنجي فون لاءِ ڊيٽا ڪنيڪشن ناهي، يا جڏهن اهو حد کان ٻاهر آهي، ته انهن جي ڪارڪردگي محدود يا غير موجود ٿي سگهي ٿي.

src: گالاپاگوس جا نظارا ۽ جهنگلي دنيا ٻيڙي جي ذريعي ڏسڻ بهترين طريقو آهي، جيئن چارلس ڊارون 1835 م ڪيو هو. 60 کان وڌيڪ بحري جهاز گالاپوگس پاڻي ۾ هلن ٿيون - جنهن ۾ 8 کان 100 مسافرن جي گنجائش آهي. گهڻا ماڻهو پنهنجي جاءَ پهريان ئي بُڪ ڪن ٿا (ڇاڪان تہ مصروف سيزن م ٻيڙيون عام طور تي ڀريل هونديون آهن). پڪ ڪريو ته ايجنٽ جيڪو توهان بڪ ڪريو ٿا اهو گالاپيگوس ماهر آهي ۽ مختلف قسمن جي سامنونڊي جهازن بابت سٺي ڄاڻ رکي ٿو. هن ڳالهہ کي يقيني بڻائيدو تہ توهان جون خاص دلچسپيون/يا رڪاوٽون بحري جهاز سان ميچ ٿين ٿيون ۽ انهن لاءِ نهايت موزون آهي.
mt: The best way to see the Galapagos and the wild world is by boat, as Charles Darwin did in 1835. There are over 60 boats cruising the Galapagos waters - with 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their boat before they go (as the busy season boats are usually full). Make sure the agent you book with is a Galapagos expert and knows about different types of boats. Make sure you are sure about your specific interests/obstacles and that the boat is suitable for them.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: ڪسينو عام طور تي مهمانن پاران خرچ ڪيل وقت ۽ پئسن کي وڌائڻ جون وڌ ۾ وڌ ڪوششون ڪندا آهن. دريون ۽ گھڙيون عام طور تي غائب هونديون آهن، ۽ ٻاهر نڪرڻ وارو رستو مشڪل ٿي سگهي ٿو. مهمانن کي سٺي مزاج ۾ رکڻ لاءِ ۽ انهن کي اهو مزاج برقرار رکڻ لاءِ انهن کي سٺا کاڌا، شرپت ۽ وندر پيش ڪجي. ڪجهہ ماڳ اندر ئي شراب پيش ڪن ٿا. تنهن هوندي بہ، نشي جي حالت فيصلن ۾ رڪاوٽ وجهي ٿي، ۽ سڀئي سٺا جواري هوش ۾ رهڻ جي اهميت کي سمجهن ٿا.
mt: Cassini is often used to enhance the time and money spent by guests. The drunks and druggies are usually absent, and the exit is difficult to find. Guests are kept in good humor and kept in good humor by providing them with good food, drink and entertainment. Some places serve alcohol. However, intoxication is a hindrance to decisions, and all good parties recognize the importance of keeping their wits about them.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: سڀئي اسم، توهان لاءِ لفظ سائي سان گڏ، ٿوڙي جو هڪ جملي جي وچ ۾ به، هميشه هڪ وڏي اکر سان شروع ٿيندا آهن. ڪجهہ فعلن ۽ شين جي وچ ۾ فرق ڪرڻ لاءِ اهو اهم طريقو آهي. اهو پڻ بحث طور پڙهائي کي آسان بڻائي ٿو، جيتوڻيڪ لکڻ اهو معلوم ڪرڻ ۾ ڪجهه سنجيده آهي ته آيا فعل يا صفت ڪمالي معني ۾ استعمال ڪئي وئي آهي يا نه.
mt: All words, except for articles, begin with a capital letter. This is an important way to distinguish between nouns and verbs. It also makes reading easier, although it takes a little practice to know whether a word is a noun or a verb.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: سڀئي اسم، توهان لاءِ لفظ سائي سان گڏ، ٿوڙي جو هڪ جملي جي وچ ۾ به، هميشه هڪ وڏي اکر سان شروع ٿيندا آهن. ڪجهہ فعلن ۽ شين جي وچ ۾ فرق ڪرڻ لاءِ اهو اهم طريقو آهي. اهو پڻ بحث طور پڙهائي کي آسان بڻائي ٿو، جيتوڻيڪ لکڻ اهو معلوم ڪرڻ ۾ ڪجهه سنجيده آهي ته آيا فعل يا صفت ڪمالي معني ۾ استعمال ڪئي وئي آهي يا نه.

src: "دنيا جي ڪيترن ئي حصن ۾ هٿ هلائڻ هڪ دوستاڻو اشارو آهي، جيڪو ""هيلو"" ڏانهن اشارو ڪري ٿو. جيتوڻيڪ، ملائيشيا ۾، گهٽ ۾ گهٽ ڳوٺاڻن علائقن مان ملي ماڻهن ۾، ان جو مطلب ""هيڏانهن اچو"" آهي جيئن جسم ڏانهن مڙيل انڊيڪس فنگر، هڪ اشارو جيڪو ڪجهه مغربي ملڪن ۾ استعمال ٿئي ٿو، ۽ صرف انهي مقصد لاءِ استعمال ٿيڻ گهرجي. اهڙي طرح، اسپين ۾ هڪ برطانوي مسافر هٿ جي اشاري کان موڪلائي غلطي ڪري سگهي ٿو پر جيڪڏهن هٿ جي تري سامهون واري ماڻهو جي سامهون آهي (جيڪو هٿ لهرائي پيو) اهو واپس اچڻ جو اشارو آهي."
mt: "In many parts of the world, a friendly wave is a greeting, as in the index finger pointed toward the body, a gesture used in some Western countries, and only for that purpose. Thus, a British passenger in Spain could misinterpret a hand signal, but if the hand is palm forward, it is a signal to go back."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: برفاني ڇپون مستقل نہ هونديون آهن، پر اهي جبلن کان هيٺ تري اچن ٿيون. ان جي ڪري ڦوٽون، ڏار ٿيندا، جيڪي برف جي پلن هيٺ لڪيل ٿي سگهن ٿيون. برف جي غفائن جون ڀتيون ۽ ڇتون ڪري سگهن ٿيون ۽ درار بند ٿي سگهي ٿي. گليشيئرز جي ڪنارن تي وڏا بلاڪ ٽٽي ڍرا ٿي ويا، ڪري پيا ۽ شايد ڪناري کان ٽپ يا ريڙجي پيا.
mt: Glaciers are not static, but are constantly changing. As glaciers retreat, valleys and gorges are carved out and rivers are dammed. Large ice blocks calve, crack, and may even fall off the edge of the glacier.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: گوما روانڊا جي ويجهو انتهائي اوڀر ۾ ڊيموڪريٽڪ ريپبلڪ آف ڪانگو جو هڪ سياحتي شهر آهي. 2002 ۾ نيراگونگو آتش فشاں کان لاوا ذريعي گوما کي تباهه ڪيو ويو جنهن شهر جي اڪثر گهٽين، خاص طور تي شهر جي مرڪز کي دفن ڪري ڇڏيو. جڏهن تہ گوما مناسب حد تائين محفوظ آهي، گوما جي ٻاهريان ڪنهن بہ دوري لاءِ اترئين ڪيو صوبي ۾ هلندڙ لڙائي جي حالت کي سمجهڻ لاءِ تحقيق ٿيڻ گهرجي. شهر نيراگونگو ٻرندڙ جبل تي چڙهڻ جو اڏو بہ آهي ان سان گڏوگڏ آفريڪا ۾ ڪجهہ سستا مائونٽين گوريلا ٽريڪنگ آهن. توهان گوما ۾ گهمڻ لاءِ بوڊا-بوڊا (موٽرسائيڪل ٽيڪسي) استعمال ڪري سگهو ٿا. عام طور تي سواري لاءِ عام (مقامي) قيمت ~ 500 ڪانگوليس فرينڪ آهي.
mt: Goma is a tourist city in eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo. In 2002, lava from the Nyiragongo volcano destroyed much of Goma, including its downtown. Goma is safe to a certain extent, but research is needed to understand the situation in the rest of North Kivu province, where fighting is ongoing. Goma is also a base for climbing the Nyiragongo volcano and for some of the cheapest gorilla trekking in Africa. You can get around Goma by boda-boda (motorcycle taxi). The usual price for a ride is about 500 Congolese francs.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: گرينڊ ڪينون ۾ رم جي هيٺيان ڪنهن به ڪيمپنگ کي پوئين ملڪ جو اجازت نامو گهربل آهي. اونهي ماٿري جي حفاظت لاءِ اجازت نامان محدود هوندا آهن. ۽ مهيني جي پهرين ڏينهن، ان مهيني جي شروعات کان چار مهينا اڳ موجود ٿي ويندا آهن. اهڙي طرح، مئي ۾ ڪنهن بہ شروعاتي تاريخ لاءِ هڪ پٺتي پيل علائقي جي اجازت 1 جنوري تي موجود ٿي سگهي ٿي. تمام گهڻو مشهور علائقن لاءِ جڳهہ، جهڙوڪ فينٽم رينچ جي پاسي ۾ برائيٽ اينجل ڪيمپ گرائونڊ، عام طور تي پهرين تاريخ تي درخواستن کي ڀرن ٿا اهو ڏينهن رزرويشن جي لاءِ کولي ڇڏيندا آهن. پهرين اچو، پهرين حاصل ڪريو جي بنياد تي درخواستن جي لاءِ محدود انگ ۾ اجازت ناما رکيل آهن.
mt: A permit for any camping in a backcountry area is valid for the entire month. Thus, for any starting date in May, a permit for a backcountry area in May will be available on January 1. Very popular areas, such as the vicinity of the Bridal Veil Falls Campground at the base of Bridal Veil Falls, are often reserved for the first date on the first day of the month for reservations. First come, first served is the basis for limited number of permits for reservations.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: ڪجهہ هوٽلن ۾ ٻاڦ وارين ريل گاڏين ۽ سامونڊي جهاز جي سونهري دور جو ورثو پيل آهي، ٻي عالمي جنگ کان پهرين، 19 صدي يا 20 صدي جي شروعات ۾. اهي هوٽل جتي امير ۽ مشهور ماڻهو رهندا هئا، ۽ اتي اڪثر بهترين کاڌا ۽ نائيٽ لائيف هئي. پراڻي زماني جو سامان، جديد سهولتن جي گهٽتائي، ۽ ڪجہہ خوبصورت قديقمي ڏيک انهن جي ڪردار جو حصو آهن. جڏهن ته برباديون حيرت انگيز آهن، توهان ممڪن طور تي پارڪ ۾ وڏي انگ ۾ اجازت ڏنل دڪاندارن کان مايوس ٿيندا. پئسي جي ڍير سان مسافر انهن ڪيترن ئي هوٽلن ۾ رهي وڃڻ سان ٽٽل، دنيا جي هڪ اوٽ موٽ جي فلائيٽ وٺي سگهي ٿو.
mt: Some hotels have bathtubs and gold-plated fixtures that date back to before the first World War, the 19th century or the early 20th century. They were where the rich and famous stayed, and where the best food and nightlife was. The old fixtures, modern amenities, and some beautiful antiques are part of their charm. When you're disappointed by the number of vendors allowed in the park, you can take a taxi to one of these hotels and get a world-class flight.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: "سمنڊ جي اندر فائبر آپٽڪ ڪيبل يورپ ۽ براڊبينڊ سيٽلائيٽ کي جوڙي ٿي ان جي مهرباني، گرين لينڊ انٽرنيٽ رسائي حاصل ڪرڻ واري 93% آبادي سان سٺي نموني جڙيل آهي. توهان جو هوٽل يا ميزبان (جيڪڏهن ڪنهن گيسٽ هائوس يا نجي گهر ۾ رهو ٿا)وٽ ممڪن طور تي وائي فائي يا انٽرنيٽ سان ڪنيڪٽ ٿيل ڪمپيوٽر هوندو، ۽ سڀني آبادين ۾ انٽرنيٽ ڪيفي موجود هوندا آهن يا عوامي وائي فائي سان ڪجهه جڳهيون موجود هونديون آهن جيئن مٿي بيان ٿيل آهي، جيتوڻيڪ لفظ ""ايسڪيمو"" آمريڪا ۾ قابل قبول رهي ٿو، اهو ڪيترن ئي غير امريڪا جي شمالي ماڻهن پاران، خاص طور تي ڪئناڊا ۾ جزا سمجهيو ويندو آهي. جڏهن ته توهان گرينلينڊڪ جي رهاڪن طرفان استعمال ڪيل لفظ ٻڌي سگهو ٿا، پرڏيهي ماڻهن کي ان جي استعمال کان پاسو ڪرڻ گهرجي. گرين لينڊ جا مقامي رهواسي پنهنجي پاڻ کي ڪينيڊا ۾ انويٽ چون ٿا ۽ گرين لينڊ ۾ ڪالاليق (جمع ڪالالٽ)، جيڪي گرين لينڊر آهن. جرم، ۽ غيرقانوني رويو پرڏيهي ماڻهن ڏانهن عام آهي، بعيد طور تي گرينلينڊ ۾ نامعلوم آهي. توڙي جو شهرن ۾، اتي ڪي به ""رف علائقا"" آهن. ٿڌي موسم شايد ئي واحد اهڙو خطرو آهي جنهن کي بنا تياري واري ماڻهن کي منهن ڏيڻو پوندو. جيڪڏهن توهان ٿڌي موسم دوران گرين لينڊ جو دورو ڪريو ٿا (غور ڪريو ته توهان جيئن اتر طرف ويندا، اوتري ٿد وڌندي ويندي)، ڪافي گرم ڪپڙا کڻي اچن ضروري آهي. اونهاري ۾ گهڻو وڏو ڏينهن ڪافي ننڍ ڪرڻ ۽ صحت جي مسئلن سان لاڳاپيل مسئلن جو سبب بڻجي سگهي ٿو. اونهاري ۾، نارڊڪ مڇرن کي پڻ ڏسو. جيتوڻيڪ اهي ڪنهن به بيماري کي منتقل نه ڪندا آهن، پر اهي تنگ ڪري سگهن ٿا."
mt: "The sea connects Europe and the satellite broadband with the United States, thanks to which the Internet access of 93% of the population is well connected. Your hotel or host (if you are staying in a guest house or private home) will probably have a wireless or Internet-connected computer, and there are Internet cafes or public wireless in most towns, as described above, although the word "eskimoes" is still acceptable in the United States, but is considered a derogatory term by many non-Americans, especially Canadians. When you hear the word used by Greenlanders, foreigners should avoid using it. Greenlanders call themselves Inuit, which means "people of the sea" in their language. Crime, and illegal activity is common among foreigners, and is largely unknown in Greenland. There are no "backwoods" in the towns. The only real danger is the cold weather, which can be dangerous to those unprepared. If you are visiting Greenland in the summer (note that you are travelling north, not south), be sure to bring plenty of warm clothing. The long days of summer can cause problems with health issues. In the summer, also watch out for mosquitoes. Although they do not carry disease, they can be annoying."
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: جارڊن دي يونين. اهو جاءِ 17 صدي جي ڪنوينٽ جي ايٽريم جي طور تي اڏي ويئي هئي، جنهن ۾ ٽيمپلو دي سان ڊيگو رهيل عمارتن مان هڪ آهي. اهو هاڻي هڪ مرڪزي پلازه جي حيثيت سان ڪم ڪري ٿو، ۽ ان ۾ ڪيتريون ئي شيون ڏينهن ۽ رات ٿينديون رهنديون آهن. باغ جي چوڌاري ڪيترائي ريسٽورينٽس آهن، ۽ منجهند ۽ شام جو اڪثر سينٽرل گزيبو جي طرفان مفت ڪانسرٽ ڪرايا ويندا آهن. ڪاليجون ڊيل بيسو (ڪس جو الي). صرف 69 سينٽي ميٽر الڳ ٻه بالڪنيون هڪ پراڻي محبت جي داستان جو گهر آهن. ڪجهه ڏوڪڙن لاءِ، ڪجهه ٻار اوهان کي سڄي ڪهاڻي ٻڌائيندا.
mt: Garden of the Union. This was the site of the 17th century convent of the Order of the Immaculate, one of the temples of the Templo de San Diego. It now serves as a central palace, and many things happen during the day and night. There are several restaurants around the garden, and most of the Central District's free concerts are held in the evening. Colleges of the Del Basso (Kiss the El). Only 69 centimeters apart, two balconies are a house of an old love story. For some, some children will tell you the whole story.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: هائيڪنگ هڪ آئوٽ ڊور سرگرمي آهي جيڪا قدرتي ماحولن ۾ گھمڻ تي مشتمل هوندي آهي، اڪثر جابلو پيچرن تي. ڊي هائيڪنگ ۾ هڪ ميل کان به گھٽ مفاصلو يا وڌ ۾ وڌ مفاصلو شامل آهي جيڪو هڪ ڏينهن ۾ پورو ڪري سگهجي ٿو. هڪ آسان پيچري تي هڪ ڏينهن جي هائيڪ لاءِ گهٽ تيارين جي ضرورت آهي، ۽ ڪو وچولو صحتياب ماڻهو انهن مان لطف اندوز ٿي سگهي ٿو. ننڍڙن ٻارن سان خاندانن کي وڌيڪ تياري گهرجي، پر ٻار ۽ پري-اسڪول وارا ٻار ساڻ هوندي به هڪ ڏينهن جي ٻاهر رهڻ آسان آهي.
mt: Hiking is a popular outdoor activity, usually practiced in natural environments, in mountainous regions. A hike can be either long or short, and may require overnight stays. A simple hike in a mountainous region can be done with minimal training, and can be enjoyed by most people. Families with young children will require more training, but children and pre-schoolers can enjoy a day hike in the outdoors.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "ناروي ۾  اُڀيون فيوڊز ۽ واديون عام آهن جيڪي ڪنهن اوچي ۽ ٿوري يا گهڻي سڌي مٿانهين پٽ ڏانهن نڪرنديون آهن. انهن ميدانن کي اڪثر ""وڊي"" جي نالي سان سڏيو ويندو آهي جنهن جي معنيٰ ويڪرو، بغير وڻن جي خالي جاءِ، بيحد پکڙيل. روگالينڊ ۽ اگڊر ۾ انهن کي عام طور تي ""hei"" سڏجي ٿو مطلب ننڍي جهاڙين ۾ ڍڪيل هڪ بغير ون واري دَلدَل."
mt: "In Norway, the term "våt" is used for areas that are wet and flat, and which are drained by ditches. In Rogaland and Agder, the term "hei" is used, meaning a small, flat, treeless area."
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: هل اسٽيشن لاءِ سياح جو موسم عام طور تي انڊين سمر دوران گهڻو هوندو آهي. جيتوڻيڪ، انهن وٽ سياري جي دوران، ڪيترن ئي هِل اسٽيشنن تي برف جي ڀرپور مقدار ۽ اسڪيئنگ ۽ سنوبورڊنگ جهڙيون سرگرميون پيش ڪندي هڪ مختلف قسم جي خوبصورتي ۽ دلڪشي آهي
mt: ۾ ڪيترائي هِل اسٽيشنن تي برف جي ڀرپور مقدار ۽ اسڪيئنگ ۽ سنوبورڊنگ جهڙيون سرگرميون پيش ڪندي هڪ مختلف قسم جي خوبصورتي ۽ دلڪشي آهي
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: هل اسٽيشن لاءِ سياح جو موسم عام طور تي انڊين سمر دوران گهڻو هوندو آهي. جيتوڻيڪ، انهن وٽ سياري جي دوران، ڪيترن ئي هِل اسٽيشنن تي برف جي ڀرپور مقدار ۽ اسڪيئنگ ۽ سنوبورڊنگ جهڙيون سرگرميون پيش ڪندي هڪ مختلف قسم جي خوبصورتي ۽ دلڪشي آهي

src: يقين ڪريو ته هڪ دفعو جڏهن توهان ميريناس کي ڌڪ هڻو ٿا ته سڀ ڪجهه تمام گهڻو واضح ٿيندو. توهان ٻين ٻيڙي جي هچڪرن سان ملندا ۽ اهي پنهنجي معلومات توهان سان شيئر ڪندا. بنيادي طور تي، توهان پنهنجي مدد آڇ ڪندڙ نوٽيسز لڳائيندا، جهاز کي اڳتي وڌائڻ، پنهنجي ياچ صاف ڪرڻ لاءِ مانهن تائين پهچ ڪرڻ، بار ۾ ملاح سان رابطو ڪرڻ جي ڪوشش وغيره. وڌ کان وڌ ماڻهن سان ڳالهائڻ جي ڪوشش ڪريو. ٿوري دير کانپوءِ سڀ توهان کي سڃاڻيندا ۽ توهان کي اشارا ڏيندا تہ ڪهڙي ٻيڙي کي ڪنهنجي ڳولا آهي.
mt: 100% sure that when you are in a lifeboat, everything is very clear. You see other boats and they share their information with you. Basically, you are sending distress signals to get the ship to come closer, to get your lifeboat to the ship, to get the boatswain to come to you, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while, everyone recognizes you and points you to which boat is yours.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: هانگ ڪانگ ٻيٽ هانگ ڪانگ جي علائقي کي پنهنجو نالو ڏئي ٿو ۽ اُها جڳهه آهي جنهن کي ڪيترائي سياح خاص ڌيان ڏين ٿا. هانگ ڪانگ اسڪائي لائڻ ٺاهڻ لاءِ عمارتن جي ترتيب کي هڪ چمڪندڙ بار چارٽ سان ڀيٽيو ويو آهي جيڪو وڪٽوريا بندرگاه جي پاڻي جي موجودگي سان ظاهر ٿئي ٿو. هانگ ڪانگ جو بهترين نظارو ڏسڻ لاءِ، جزيرو ڇڏيو ۽ ڪوولن واٽر فرنٽ جي برعڪس نڪرو. هانگ ڪانگ ٻيٽ جي شهري ترقی جی گھڻي آبادي اترهين سامونڊي ڪناري سان گڏ واپس ورتل زمين تي ڀريل آهي. هي اهو جڳهہ آهي جتي برطانوي آبادگارن پنهنجو پاڻ آباد ڪئي هئي ۽ جيڪڏهن توهان هن علائقي جي ماضي جي آبادگارن جو ثبوت ڳولي رهيا آهيو تہ، اهو شروع ڪرڻ جي لاءِ سٺي جڳهہ آهي.
mt: Hong Kong is named after the island it occupies and is a popular destination for tourists. The construction of the Hong Kong Skyline has been compared to a sparkling bar chart, which is visible due to the presence of Victoria Harbour's water. For the best view of Hong Kong Island, turn around and look at the back of the Cowloon Waterfront. The urban development of Hong Kong Island is densely populated on reclaimed land along the northern waterfront. This is the place where British settlers first settled and if you were to collect evidence of the island's settlers in the past, it would be a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: هانگ ڪانگ ٻيٽ هانگ ڪانگ جي علائقي کي پنهنجو نالو ڏئي ٿو ۽ اُها جڳهه آهي جنهن کي ڪيترائي سياح خاص ڌيان ڏين ٿا. هانگ ڪانگ اسڪائي لائڻ ٺاهڻ لاءِ عمارتن جي ترتيب کي هڪ چمڪندڙ بار چارٽ سان ڀيٽيو ويو آهي جيڪو وڪٽوريا بندرگاه جي پاڻي جي موجودگي سان ظاهر ٿئي ٿو. هانگ ڪانگ جو بهترين نظارو ڏسڻ لاءِ، جزيرو ڇڏيو ۽ ڪوولن واٽر فرنٽ جي برعڪس نڪرو. هانگ ڪانگ ٻيٽ جي شهري ترقی جی گھڻي آبادي اترهين سامونڊي ڪناري سان گڏ واپس ورتل زمين تي ڀريل آهي. هي اهو جڳهہ آهي جتي برطانوي آبادگارن پنهنجو پاڻ آباد ڪئي هئي ۽ جيڪڏهن توهان هن علائقي جي ماضي جي آبادگارن جو ثبوت ڳولي رهيا آهيو تہ، اهو شروع ڪرڻ جي لاءِ سٺي جڳهہ آهي.

src: اسٽر اپ سوار جي لاءِ مدد ڪري ٿو جيڪو سيڊل جي ٻني پاسن تي هوندو آهي. اهي رائيڊر کي وڌ ۾ وڌ حفاظت مهيا ڪن ٿا پر سوار جا پير انهن ۾ ڦسڻ جي امڪان جي ڪري حفاظتي خدشا ٿي سگهن ٿا. جيڪڏهن هڪ سوار کي گهوڙي کان ڪيرايو وڃي پر پير اسٽرپ ۾ ڦاسي ويو هجي، جيڪڏهن گهوڙو ڀڄي وڃي ٿو ته اهي گهيلجي سگهن ٿا. اهو خدشو گھٽ ڪرڻ لاءِ، ڪيترائي حفاظتي اپاءَ وٺي سگهجن ٿا. پهريان، گُهڙ سوار هڪ کُڙي سان ۽ تمام سوڙهي هموار تَري سان سَواري وارا بوٽ پائين ٿا، ان کانپوءِ، ڪجهہ پاکڙا، خاص طور تي انگريزي پاکڙو، جنهن ۾ حفاظتي بار آهن جيڪي پاکڙي کان ڪرائڻ ۾ رڪاب جي مدد ڪن ٿا جيڪڏهن ڪرندڙ سوار انهن کي پوئتي ڇڪي ٿو.
mt: For the rider, the saddle is the most important part of the horse. It provides support and protection for the rider, but the rider's feet can get caught in the stirrups, which can be dangerous. If a rider is thrown from a horse, but his feet get caught in the stirrups, the horse can become spooked. This can be prevented by taking several safety precautions. First, the rider wears a helmet and a full-length, smooth-fitting riding jacket, which protects the rider from injury. Next, the rider wears a vest, especially an English vest, which has safety features that can be released if the rider is thrown from the horse, and the horse becomes spooked. The vest can be released by the rider if the horse becomes spooked.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: هاسپيٽلٽي ايڪسچينج نيٽورڪ هڪ ادارو آهي جيڪو مسافرن کي مقامي شهرين سان ملائيندو آهي جتي اهي دورو ڪرڻ وڃي رهيا آهن. اهڙي قسم جي نيٽورڪ ۾ شامل ٿيڻ جي لاءِ عام طور تي صرف هڪ آن لائن فارم ڀرڻو پوي ٿو؛ جيتوڻڪ ڪجهہ نيٽورڪ وڌيڪ تصديق جي گهرج ڪن ٿا. پوءِ ميزبانن جي هڪ فهرست يا ته پرنٽ ۽/يا آن لائن ۾ مهيا ڪئي ويندي آهي، ڪڏهن ڪڏهن ٻين مسافرن پاران حوالن ۽ جائزي ساڻ. ڪمپيوٽر پروگرامر ڪاسي فينٽون کي آئس لينڊ لاءِ هڪ سستي فلائيٽ ملي پر اتي رهڻ جي جاءِ نه ملڻ کان پوءِ جنوري 2004 ۾ ڪوچ سرفنگ جو بنياد رکيو ويو. هن مقامي يونيورسٽي جي شاگردن کي اِي ميل موڪلي ۽ مُفت رهائش لاءِ تمام گهڻيون آڇُون حاصل ڪيون.
mt: Hospitality Exchange Network is an organization that connects travelers with local citizens where they are visiting. To join such a network, usually only one online form needs to be filled out; although some networks require more verification. Then a list of hosts or printed and/or online is made available, sometimes with references and verifications from other travelers. Computer programmers invented CouchSurfing in January 2004 after a cheap flight to Iceland but no place to stay after arriving. This connected University students with free lodging and many requests.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: هاسٽل بنيادي طور تي نوجوانن کي کاڌو ڏيندي آهي ـ هڪ عام مهمان پنهني ويهين سال ۾ هوندو آهي - پر توهان اڪثر اتي وڏا مسافر پڻ ڏسي سگهو ٿا. ٻارن ساڻ خاندان ورلي نظر ايندا آهن، پر ڪجھ هوٽليون انهن کي نجي ڪمرن ۾ اجازت ڏين ٿيون.
mt: The hotel is primarily geared towards feeding children -- a typical guest is a teenager -- but you will often see older travelers there as well. Families with young children are allowed to stay, but some hotels allow them to stay in separate rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: هاسٽل بنيادي طور تي نوجوانن کي کاڌو ڏيندي آهي ـ هڪ عام مهمان پنهني ويهين سال ۾ هوندو آهي - پر توهان اڪثر اتي وڏا مسافر پڻ ڏسي سگهو ٿا. ٻارن ساڻ خاندان ورلي نظر ايندا آهن، پر ڪجھ هوٽليون انهن کي نجي ڪمرن ۾ اجازت ڏين ٿيون.

src: بومرينگ اڇلڻ هڪ مشهور مهارت آهي جيڪو ڪيترائي سياح حاصل ڪرڻ چاهين ٿا. جيڪڏهن توهان هڪ بُومرينگ اُڇلڻ سکڻ چاهيو ٿا جيڪو توهان جي هٿ ۾ واپس اچي ٿو، انهي کي پڪ ڪريو ته توهان وٽ واپسي لاءِ هڪ مناسب بُومرينگ آهي. آسٽريليا ۾ موجود گهڻا بوميرنگ اصل م واپس نہ موٽي رهيا آهن. اهو سکڻ وارن جي لاءِ بهتر آهي تہ ان کي تيز هوائن ۾ اُڇلڻ جي ڪوشش نہ ڪن.
mt: Bungee jumping is a popular activity that many tourists want to try. If you want to learn how to bungee jump and have it come back to you, make sure that you have a suitable bungee. Most bungees in Australia are not coming back. It is better for learners not to try to jump in a tight rope.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: چونڊ لاءِ 17000 ٻيٽن سان، انڊونيشيائي خوراڪ هڪ ڇٽي آهي جيڪو پوري قوم ۾ ملندڙ علائقائي کاڌي کي ملائي ٿي. پر ، جيڪڏهن وڌيڪ پاس ٿيندڙن کان علاوه استعمال ٿئي ٿي، ته انهي لفظ جي معني مک جاوا ٻيٽ جي مرڪزي ۽ اوڀر واري حصن مان اصل کاڌو آهي. هاڻي پوري آرڪيپيلاگو ۾ موجود آهي، جاوياني کاڌا صرف سادا موسمي کاڌا، جاوياني کاڄن، مرچن، کنڊ (خاص طور تي جاويانين جي ناريل جي کنڊ)۽ مختلف خوشبودار مصالحن جي هجڻ جي مدد سان بهترين ذائقي سان پيش ڪن ٿا.
mt: 17000 islands, Indonesian food is a staple that is shared across the nation. But if more than just passing through, the meaning of this word is the original food of the central and eastern parts of the main island of Java. Now it is present throughout the archipelago, Javanese food is just simple weather food, Javanese spices, chili, nuts (especially the nuts of Javanese nutmeg) and various aromatic spices help to bring the best taste.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: انهن ماڻهن لاءِ جيڪي ميڊيڪل جارگن سان نا واقف آهن، لفظ وبائي ۽ مُضر ٻنهي جي مختلف معني آهي. هڪ وبائي بيماري اهو آهي جيڪو هڪ پيٿوجين ذريعي ٿئي ٿي، جيئن هڪ وائرس، بيڪٽيريم، فنگس يا ٻيا پيراسائيٽ. هڪ وچڙندڙ بيماري اها بيماري آهي جيڪا بيماري ۾ متاثر ٿيل ماڻهو جي ويجهو ٿيڻ سان منتقل ٿيندي آهي. ڪيتريون حڪومتون پنهنجي ملڪ ۾ اچڻ وارن مسافرن، يا رهائيشن کي مختلف بيمارين جي ويڪسين ڪرائڻ جي گهرج ڪري ٿي. اهي گهرجون ڪهڙي ملڪ جو مسافر دورو ڪيو آهي يا دوري ڪرڻ جو ارادو رکي ٿو تي ڀاڙي سگهن ٿيون.
mt: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words "epidemic" and "contagious" have different meanings. An epidemic is a disease that is transmitted by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungus, or other parasite. A contagious disease is one that is transmitted by contact with an infected person. Many governments require incoming travelers or residents to provide proof of immunization against certain diseases. These requirements vary depending on the country of origin or destination of the traveler.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: انهن ماڻهن لاءِ جيڪي ميڊيڪل جارگن سان نا واقف آهن، لفظ وبائي ۽ مُضر ٻنهي جي مختلف معني آهي. هڪ وبائي بيماري اهو آهي جيڪو هڪ پيٿوجين ذريعي ٿئي ٿي، جيئن هڪ وائرس، بيڪٽيريم، فنگس يا ٻيا پيراسائيٽ. هڪ وچڙندڙ بيماري اها بيماري آهي جيڪا بيماري ۾ متاثر ٿيل ماڻهو جي ويجهو ٿيڻ سان منتقل ٿيندي آهي. ڪيتريون حڪومتون پنهنجي ملڪ ۾ اچڻ وارن مسافرن، يا رهائيشن کي مختلف بيمارين جي ويڪسين ڪرائڻ جي گهرج ڪري ٿي. اهي گهرجون ڪهڙي ملڪ جو مسافر دورو ڪيو آهي يا دوري ڪرڻ جو ارادو رکي ٿو تي ڀاڙي سگهن ٿيون.

src: ذاتي VPN (ورچوئل پرائيوٽ نيوٽورڪ) مهيا ڪندڙ سياسي سينسرشپ ۽ تجارتي IP-جيوفلٽرنگ ٻني کي روڪڻ جو هڪ بهترين طريقو آهي. اهي ڪيترن ئي سبب جي ڪري ويب پراڪسيز کان مٿانهون آهن: اهي نہ صرف http پر سموري انٽرنيٽ ٽرئفڪ کي ري-روٽ ڪن ٿا. اهي عام طور تي اعليٰ بينڊوڊٽ ۽ بهتر معيار جي خدمت جي آڇ ڪن ٿا. اهي انڪرپٽيڊ آهن ۽ اهڙي طرح جاسوسي ڪرڻ ڏکيو آهي.
mt: Political censorship and commercial IP geofiltering are best defeated by personal VPNs. They are superior to web proxies in many ways: they don't just re-route all your internet traffic through http. They usually offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted, so it's harder to spy on them.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: ذاتي VPN (ورچوئل پرائيوٽ نيوٽورڪ) مهيا ڪندڙ سياسي سينسرشپ ۽ تجارتي IP-جيوفلٽرنگ ٻني کي روڪڻ جو هڪ بهترين طريقو آهي. اهي ڪيترن ئي سبب جي ڪري ويب پراڪسيز کان مٿانهون آهن: اهي نہ صرف http پر سموري انٽرنيٽ ٽرئفڪ کي ري-روٽ ڪن ٿا. اهي عام طور تي اعليٰ بينڊوڊٽ ۽ بهتر معيار جي خدمت جي آڇ ڪن ٿا. اهي انڪرپٽيڊ آهن ۽ اهڙي طرح جاسوسي ڪرڻ ڏکيو آهي.

They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: ڇاڪاڻ ته ڪالون انٽرنيٽ تي رائوٽ ٿينديون آهن، توهان جتي رهو ٿا يا جتي سفر ڪريو ٿا ان هنڌ تي موجود هڪ فون ڪمپني استعمال ڪرڻ جي توهانکي ضرورت ناهي. ڪا بہ گهرج ناهي تہ توهان جنهن ڪميونٽي ۾ رهو ٿا اتان توهان هڪ مقامي نمبر حصل ڪريو؛ توهان الاسڪا ۾ چڪن جي جهنگلن ۾ هڪ سيٽلائيٽ انٽرنيٽ ڪنيڪشن حاصل ڪري سگهو ٿا ۽ هڪ نمبر چونڊي سگهو ٿا جيڪو دعويٰ ڪري تہ توهان سني ايريزونا ۾ آهيو. گهڻو ڪري، توهان کي هڪ عالمي نمبر الڳ سان وٺڻ جي ضرورت پوندي آهي جيڪو PSTN فونن کي توهان ڏانهن ڪال ڪرڻ ڏي ٿو. اهو نمبر ڪٿان کان آهي توهان کي فون ڪرڻ وارن ماڻهن کي فرق پوي ٿو.
mt: Even though you may be reading this on a computer connected to the Internet, you don't need to use a phone company where you live or where you are traveling. You don't need to have a local number if you are in the Alaskan wilderness and can get a satellite Internet connection and choose a number that claims you are in sunny Arizona. Usually, you need a global number to call you from PSTN phones.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: ڇاڪاڻ ته ڪالون انٽرنيٽ تي رائوٽ ٿينديون آهن، توهان جتي رهو ٿا يا جتي سفر ڪريو ٿا ان هنڌ تي موجود هڪ فون ڪمپني استعمال ڪرڻ جي توهانکي ضرورت ناهي. ڪا بہ گهرج ناهي تہ توهان جنهن ڪميونٽي ۾ رهو ٿا اتان توهان هڪ مقامي نمبر حصل ڪريو؛ توهان الاسڪا ۾ چڪن جي جهنگلن ۾ هڪ سيٽلائيٽ انٽرنيٽ ڪنيڪشن حاصل ڪري سگهو ٿا ۽ هڪ نمبر چونڊي سگهو ٿا جيڪو دعويٰ ڪري تہ توهان سني ايريزونا ۾ آهيو. گهڻو ڪري، توهان کي هڪ عالمي نمبر الڳ سان وٺڻ جي ضرورت پوندي آهي جيڪو PSTN فونن کي توهان ڏانهن ڪال ڪرڻ ڏي ٿو. اهو نمبر ڪٿان کان آهي توهان کي فون ڪرڻ وارن ماڻهن کي فرق پوي ٿو.

src: اُچارڻ اندليسي ٻولي ۾ نسبتاً آسان آهن ڇاڪاڻ تہ گهڻن لفظن جا ائين ئي اچار ڪڍيا وڃن تا جيئن اهي لکيل آهن. مکيہ اکر c ۽ g لاءِ ڏسڻا آهن ڇاڪاڻ تہ انهن جا اُچار هيٺين واويل جي بنياد تي مختلف ٿين ٿا. پڻ، آر ۽ آر آر کي الڳ الڳ اُچارڻ يقيني بڻايو: caro جو مطلب آهي پيارو ، جڏهن ته carro جو مطلب آهي گهوڙا گاڏي.
mt: ہجڻ ۽ ڏسڻ ۾ ٻولي ۾ نسبتاً آسان آهن ڇاڪاڻ تہ گهڻن لفظن جا ائين ئي ہجڻ ۽ ڏسڻ ڪڍيا وڃن تيئن اهي لکيل آهن. مکيہ اکر c ۽ g لاءِ ڏسڻا آهن ڇاڪاڻ تہ انهن جا ہجڻ ۽ ڏسڻ هيٺين واويل جي بنياد تي مختلف ٿين ٿا. پڻ، آر ۽ آر آر کي الڳ الڳ ہجڻ ۽ ڏسڻ يقيني بڻايو: caro جو مطلب آهي پيارو ، جڏهن ته carro جو مطلب آهي گهوڙا گاڏي.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: ازمير ترکي جو ٽيون سڀني کان وڏو شهر آهي جنهن ۾ اٽڪل 3.7 ملين ماڻهن جي آبادي آهي، استنبول کانپوءِ ٻيو سڀني کان وڏو بندرگاهہ، ۽ هڪ گهڻو سٺو ٽرانسپورٽ جو مرڪز آهي. هڪ ڀيرو قديم شهر سميرنا، اهو هاڻي هڪ جديد، ترقي يافتہ، ۽ مشغول تجارتي مرڪز آهي، جيڪو هڪ وڏي اُپسمنڊ جي چوڌاري قائم آهي ۽ جبلن سان گهيريل آهي. وڏا بوليورڊز، شيشي سان جايون، ۽ جديد شاپنگ سينٽر روايتي ڳاڙهي رنگ واري ٽائيلن سان ڇتون اڏيل آهن، 18 صدي جو بازار، ۽ پراڻيون مسجدون ۽ گرجا گهر، جيتوڻڪ اهو شهر روايتي ترکي کان وڏيڪ ميڊيٽرينين يورپ جي ماحول آهي.
mt: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of about 3.7 million, the second largest port after Istanbul, and a major transportation hub. The ancient city of Smyrna, now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, is situated on a bay and surrounded by mountains. Large boulevards, glass-fronted shops, and modern shopping centers are built with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century bazaar, and old mosques and churches, although the city is in a Mediterranean European environment.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: چيري بلومس ڏيک، جنهنکي هانامي سڏيو ويندو آهي، 8 صدي کان وٺي جاپاني ڪلچر جو حصو رهيو آهي. اهو تصور چين کان آيو جتي آلو بخارا پسند جو گل هو. جاپان ۾، پهرين چيري بلوسم پارٽين جي ميزباني صرف بادشاهه پاڻ ۽ شاهي عدالت جي آس پاس جي ارسطو جا ٻين ميمبرن لاءِ ڪندا هئا.
mt: The cherry blossom, which is called sakura in Japanese, has been part of Japanese culture for over 800 years. It is a symbol of China, where it was originally a peach blossom. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were held only for the emperor and members of the aristocracy.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: چيري بلومس ڏيک، جنهنکي هانامي سڏيو ويندو آهي، 8 صدي کان وٺي جاپاني ڪلچر جو حصو رهيو آهي. اهو تصور چين کان آيو جتي آلو بخارا پسند جو گل هو. جاپان ۾، پهرين چيري بلوسم پارٽين جي ميزباني صرف بادشاهه پاڻ ۽ شاهي عدالت جي آس پاس جي ارسطو جا ٻين ميمبرن لاءِ ڪندا هئا.

src: يروشلم اسرائيل جي گادي جو هنڌ ۽ سڀ کان وڏو شهر آهي، جيتوڻڪ ٻيا گهڻا ملڪ ۽ گڏيل قومون ان کي اسرائيل جي گادي جو هنڌ نٿيون مڃن. يهودي جبلن ۾ قديم شهر جي هزارن سالن کان جڙيل هڪ دلچسپ تاريخ آهي. شهر هڪ خدا کي مڃيندڙ ٽنهي مذهب - يهودي، عيسائي ۽ اسلام لاءِ پاڪ آهي، ۽ روحاني، مذهبي ۽ ثقافتي مرڪز جو طور تي ڪم ڪري ٿو. شهر جي مذهبي ساک جي ڪري، ۽ خاص طور تي پراڻي شهر جون ڪيتريون ئي سائيٽون، جيروسلم اسرائيل جي سياحت جي جڳهين مان هڪ آهي. يروشلم ۾ ڪيتريون ئي تاريخي، آثارياتي، ۽ ثقافتي سائيٽون آهن، ان سان گڏوگڏ پرجوش ۽ ماڻهن سان ڀريل شاپنگ سينٽر، ڪيفي، ۽ ريسٽورينٽ آهن.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, although other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as such. The city has a fascinating history as an ancient city on the hills of Jerusalem. The city is holy to Jews, Christians and Muslims, and serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Because of its religious sanctity, and especially its many ancient sites, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist attractions in Israel. There are many historical, archaeological and cultural sites in Jerusalem, along with lively and crowded shopping centers, cafes, and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: ڪروگر نيشنل پارڪ (KNP) ڏکڻ آفريقا جي اتر-اوپر پاسي ۾ واقع آهي ۽ اوڀر ۾ موزمبيق جي سرحد، اتر ۾ زمبابوي، ۽ ڏکڻ سرحد جيڪو ڪروڪوڊائيل ندي آهي سان گڏ هلندي اچي ٿي. اهو پارڪ 19،500 اسڪوائر ڪلوميٽر تي مشتمل آهي ۽ اهو 14 مختلف ايڪوزونز ۾ ورهايل آهن، هر هڪ جهنگلي جيوت جي حمايت ڪري ٿو. اهو ڏکڻ آفريقا جو مکيہ من موهيندڙ ماڳ آهي ۽ ان کي ڏکڻ آفريڪا جي قومي پارڪن (SAN پارڪس) جونمائندو سمجهيو وڃي ٿو. جئين سڀني ڏکڻ آفريڪا جي نيشنل پارڪن سان، هتي روزانه جي بنياد تي تحفظ ۽ داخلا فيس آهي. ڪنهن کي وائلڊ ڪارڊ وٺڻ بہ فائديمنڊ ٿي سگهي ٿو، جيڪو ڏکڻ آفريقا جي چونڊيل پارڪن ۾ يا سڄي ڏکڻ آفريقا جي سڀني قومي پارڪن مان چونڊيل م داخل ٿي سگهو ٿا.
mt: The Kruger National Park is located in northeastern South Africa and borders with Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north, and the Crocodile River to the west. It covers 19,500 square kilometres and is divided into 14 different ecozones, each supporting a different type of savanna habitat. It is the main tourist attraction in South Africa and is considered one of the country's flagship protected areas. Like all the South African National Parks, there is an entrance fee and daily conservation fee. A Wild Card is also beneficial, which can be used in selected parks in South Africa or all the national parks in South Africa.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: ماچو پچو جي اترئين ڇيڙي مٿي بيٺل اُڀو جبل آهي، جيڪو اڪثر کنڊرن جي ڪيترين ئي تصويرن جو منظر آهي. اهو هيٺيان کان ٿورو ڏکيو لڳي ٿو، ۽ اها سڌي ۽ ڏکي چڙهايئ لڳي ٿي، پر گهڻو ڪري تندرست ماڻهن کي ان تي 45 منٽن ۾ چڙهي وڃڻ گهرجي. سڄي رستي ۾ پٿر جون چاڙهيون رکيل آهي، ۽ چاڙهي واري حصي ۾ اسٽيل جون تارون لڳل آهن جيڪي جهلڻ لاءِ مدد مهيا ڪن ٿيون. هن چيو، ڇرڪ جي اميد ڪريو، ۽ چوٽين واري حصي م خيال ڪريو، جڏهن اهي پُسيل هجن، جيئن تہ اهي جلدي خطرناڪ ٿي سگهي ٿي. چوٽي جي ويجهو هڪ ننڍي غفا آهي جنهن کان ضرور گذرڻ گهرجي، اهو بلڪل ننڍي ۽ ٻي صورت ۾ سوڙي آهي.
mt: The north face of Machu Picchu is a steep mountain, which is often seen in many pictures of the Inca ruins. It looks a little scary, and is both beautiful and scary, but healthy people can climb it in 45 minutes. The whole path is paved with stones, and steel ropes are hung in the climbing part to help you. He said, "Please hold the railing, and be careful on the steep part, when you are on the edge, because they can be dangerous quickly. There is a small cave near the top, which you should pass through, it is very small and in any case slippery.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: ميجرڪين کاڌو، ميڊيٽرينين ۾ اهڙي طرح جي علائقن ۾ ملي ٿو، جيڪو روٽي، ڀاڄين ۽ گوشت (خاص طو تي سوئر جو گوشت) سان ٺهندو آهي، ۽ سڄو زيتون جو تيل استعمال ٿئي ٿو. هڪ عام مقبول ڊنر، خاص طور تي اونهاري دوران، Pa amb Oli آهي: زيتون جي تيل سان گڏ ماني، ٽماٽو، ۽ ڪي به دستياب مصالحا جيئن چيز، ٽونا فش وغيره.
mt: ڪين کاڌو, found in such areas of the Mediterranean, is made with rice, vegetables and meat (especially pork), and all olive oil is used. A popular dinner, especially in the summer, is Pa amb Oli: olive oil with bread, tomatoes, and any available seasonings such as garlic, onion, tuna fish, etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: هڪ هينگي ماني زمين ۾ گرم تندور ۾ پچائي ويندي آهي. چلي کي يا تہ باهہ ذريعي گرم ٿيل پٿرن سان گرم ڪيو ويندو آهي، يا ڪجهہ جائين تي جيو ٿرمل جي گرمي علائقن کي قدرتي طور گرم رکي ٿي. هينگي گهڻو ڪري روايتي روسٽ جهڙو ڊنر پچائڻ لاءِ استعمال ڪيو ويندو آهي. روٽورو ۾ ڪيترن ئي جاين تي جيو ٿرمل هنگي پيش ڪيو وڃي ٿو، جڏهن ته ٻيا هينگي گرجا گهر، ويلنگٽن ۽ ٻين جاين تي چيڪ ڪري سگهجن ٿا.
mt: A clay pot is being heated in a traditional tandoor. It can be heated by either natural convection of hot stones or by natural convection of geothermal heat in some areas. The pot is usually used for roasting dinner in a roti. Roti is available in many places in the world, including churches, Wellington and other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: هڪ هينگي ماني زمين ۾ گرم تندور ۾ پچائي ويندي آهي. چلي کي يا تہ باهہ ذريعي گرم ٿيل پٿرن سان گرم ڪيو ويندو آهي، يا ڪجهہ جائين تي جيو ٿرمل جي گرمي علائقن کي قدرتي طور گرم رکي ٿي. هينگي گهڻو ڪري روايتي روسٽ جهڙو ڊنر پچائڻ لاءِ استعمال ڪيو ويندو آهي. روٽورو ۾ ڪيترن ئي جاين تي جيو ٿرمل هنگي پيش ڪيو وڃي ٿو، جڏهن ته ٻيا هينگي گرجا گهر، ويلنگٽن ۽ ٻين جاين تي چيڪ ڪري سگهجن ٿا.
mt: A clay pot is being heated in a traditional tandoor. It can be heated by either natural convection of hot stones or by natural convection of geothermal heat in some areas. The pot is usually used for roasting dinner in a roti. Roti is available in many places in the world, including churches, Wellington and other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: ڌرم شالا جو دورو ڪرڻ دوران، عورتن کي ڳوڏن کان هيٺ اسڪرٽ پائڻ جي ضرورت آهي ۽ انهن جا ڪلها پڻ ڍڪيل هجڻ گهرجن. گهڻيون خانقاهون اهڙين عورتن کي خاص لباس مهيا ڪن ٿيون جيڪي تياري کانسواءِ اچن ٿيون، پر جيڪڏهن توهان پنهنجو، خاص طور تي هڪ چمڪندڙ رنگن وارو لباس کڻي اچو ٿا تہ، توهان کي دروازي تي منڪ يا نن جي مرڪ ملندي. ساڳي لائن سان گڏ، مردن کي گوڏن کان هيٺ تائين وارا ٽرائوزر پائڻ گهربل آهن. اهو داخلي رستي تي اسٽاڪ کان وٺي سگهجي ٿو پر اهو لباس هر صارف جي استعمال کانپوءِ نٿو ڌوپجي ان ڪري توهان کي ٿي سگهي ٿو اسڪرٽ پائڻ ۾ تسلي نہ ملي. سڀني ماڻهن کي هڪڙي سائيز اچي ٿي!
mt: During a pilgrimage, women need to be covered from the waist down and their legs should be covered. Many convents provide such clothing, but if you wear a brightly colored outfit, you will be mistaken for a prostitute. The same line, men should wear trousers down to the knee. This can be found in the interior of the stock from the stake, but the clothing will not be used after use, so you will not be able to be covered. All people have one size!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: جيڪڏهن توهان سياري ۾ آرڪٽڪ يا انٽارڪٽڪ علائقن جو دورو ڪريو ٿا ته توهان پولر نائيٽ جو تجربو ٿيندو، ان جو مطلب ته سج افق کان مٿي نٿو اُڀري. هي اورورا بوريليس ڏسڻ لاءِ سٺو موقعو ڏيئي رهيا آهن، جيئن تہ چوويهہ ڪلاڪن ۾ آسمان ۾ وڌيڪ يا گهٽ انڌيرو ٿيندو. جئين ته علائقا گهٽ آباد ٿيل آهن ۽ تنهنڪري روشني جي آلودگي جو به گهڻو ڪو مسئلو ناهي، تنهنڪري توهان رات جا تارا ڏسڻ جو مزو وٺڻ جي پڻ قابل هوندا.
mt: If you travel to the Arctic or Antarctic in the winter, you will experience polar night, meaning the sun will not rise above the horizon. These are good times to see the aurora borealis, as the sky will be darker or lighter for up to 24 hours. As the areas are less populated, there is also less light pollution, so you can also enjoy the night sky.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: بعيد جڳهين ۾، سيل فون جي ڪوريج کان بغير، شايد توهان جو واحد اختيار هڪ سيٽلائيٽ فون هجي. هڪ سيٽلائيٽ فون عام طور تي موبائل فون جو متبادل ناهي، جيئن ته فون ڪال ڪرڻ لاءِ توهان کي سيٽلائٽ ڏانهن واضح ڏيک سان ٻاهر رهڻو پوندو. اهو سروس گهڻو ڪري شپنگ استعمال ڪندي آهي، جنهن ۾ وندرائيندڙ ٻيڙي، ۽ ان جهڙو بحري سفر جنهن کي رموٽ ڊيٽا ۽ وائيس جي ضرورت پوي ٿي. توهان جي مقامي ٽيليفون سروس فراهم ڪندڙ توهانکي انهي سروس سان ڪنيڪٽ ٿيڻ بابت وڌيڪ معلومات ڏيڻ جي قابل هوندو.
mt: In the near future, without a cell phone signal, your only option may be a satellite phone. A satellite phone is not usually a mobile phone's replacement, as you would have to have a satellite dish to send calls out. This service is mostly used by shipping, which includes cruise ships, and other maritime travel that requires remote data and voice. Your local telephone service provider can give you more information about connecting to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
