src: مالديپ جي گادي جو هنڌ خشي نو آهي. مقامي ٻولي رومانين آهي، پر روسي ٻولي بہ گهڻي استعمال ٿيندي آهي. مالڊووا هڪ گهڻ نسلي جهموريت آهي جيڪو نسلي تڪرارن جو شڪار آهي. 1994 ۾، هي تڪرار مشرقي مولودووا ۾ خود-ساخته ٽرانسنسٽريا ريپبلڪ جي ٺهڻ جو سبب بڻيو، جنهن جي پنهنجي حڪومت ۽ ڪرنسي آهي پر گڏيل قومن جي ڪنهن ميمبر ملڪ پاران تسليم ناهي ڪيو ويو. سياسي معاملن ۾ ناڪامي جي باوجود مولودووا جي انهن ٻنهي حصن وچان اقتصادي رابطا ٻيهر قائم ٿي چڪا آهن. مالڊووا ۾ گهڻائي آرٿوڊڪش عيسائي مذهب جي آهي.
mt: The capital of Maldives is Malé. The official language is Dhivehi, but Russian is also widely spoken. Maldives is a multiethnic society that has been plagued by ethnic strife. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistrian Republic, which has its own government and currency but is not recognized by any member state of the United Nations. Despite political failures, economic relations between the two parts of Moldova have been restored. The majority of Maldives are Orthodox Christians.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: "جيئن تہ مونٽي ويڊيو خط استوا جي ڏکڻ پاسي آهي، جڏهن اتي گرمي جي موسم هوندي آهي تڏهن اتر هيمسفئير ۾ سياروي جي موسم هوندي آهي ۽ برعڪس هوندو آهي. مونٽي وڊيو سب ٽراپڪس م آهي. گرمين جي مهينن ۾، گرمي پد +30°C کان مٿي عام آهي. سيارو بهاني سان سرد ٿي سگهي ٿو: گرمي پد ڪڏهن ڪڏهن برف ڄمڻ واري نقطي کان هيٺ وڃي ٿو، هوا ۽ نمي ٻئي ملي ڪري ٿرما ميٽر جيڪو ڏيکاري ٿو ان کان وڌيڪ ٿڌ محسوس ٿئي ٿي. خاص طور تي ڪي بہ ""مينهن"" واري يا ""خشڪ"" موسم نہ هونديون آهن: مينهن جو مقدار سڄو سال هڪ جهڙو رهي ٿو."
mt: "As the Montevideo is on the southern hemisphere, when it is summer there, it is winter in the northern hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is a sub-tropical city. In the warm months, the temperature is usually above +30°C. The sun can also make it cold: the temperature can sometimes fall below the freezing point, the air and the humidity combine to make the thermometer read even colder. In particular, there are no ""wet"" or ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain remains the same throughout the year."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "ناپسنديده چٽ يا رهڙي کي گريفٽي چئبو آهي. جڏهن تہ اهو جديد نظاري کان پري آهي، گهڻا ماڻهو هن کي اسپري پينٽ جو استعمال ڪندي سرڪاري ۽ نجي ملڪيت کي نقصان پهچائيندڙ نوجوانن سان جوڙيندا آهن. جيتوڻيڪ، اڄڪلهه هتي مقرره گرافِٽي فنڪار، گرافِٽي واقعا ۽ ""قانوني"" ديوارون آهن. ان حوالي سان گرافِٽي پينٽنگون اڪثر ڪري ناگزير ٽيگز جي ڀيٽ ۾ آرٽ ورڪ سان مشابت رکن ٿيون."
mt: "Spray-painted graffiti is illegal. While this is a new phenomenon, many people associate graffiti with young people who damage public and private property with spray paint. However, today there are legal graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. In this context, graffiti paintings are often associated with art work rather than tags."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: ڪجهه تهوارن لاءِ، موسيقي جي تهوارن ۾ شرڪت ڪندڙن جي وڏي اڪثريت سائيٽ تي ڪيمپ ڪرڻ جو فيصلو ڪندي آهي، ۽ اڪثر حاضرين ان کي تجربي جو اهم حصو سمجهندا آهن. جيڪڏهن توهان ايڪشن جي ويجهو ٿيڻ چاهيو ٿا ته توهان کي موسيقي ۾ ويجهو ڪيمپ واري سائيٽ تائين پهچڻ لاءِ صبح جو سوير اٿڻو پوندو. ياد رکو تہ جيڪڏهن مين اسٽيجن تي ٿي سگهي ٿو موسيقي ختم ٿي چڪي هجي، پر فيسٽيول جا ڪجهہ سيڪشن ٿي سگهي ٿو رات دير تائين موسيقي هلائيندا هجن. جوان ٻارن سان ڪٽنبن جي لاءِ ڪجهہ فيسٽيولن ۾ خاص ڪيمپنگ جا ميدان آهن.
mt: For some festivals, a large majority of attendees camp on site, and most consider camping an integral part of the experience. If you want to camp near the action, you'll need to get up early to make it to the music festival's camping site. Remember that if the main stages are done for the day, some festivals will continue to play music into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: ڪجهه تهوارن لاءِ، موسيقي جي تهوارن ۾ شرڪت ڪندڙن جي وڏي اڪثريت سائيٽ تي ڪيمپ ڪرڻ جو فيصلو ڪندي آهي، ۽ اڪثر حاضرين ان کي تجربي جو اهم حصو سمجهندا آهن. جيڪڏهن توهان ايڪشن جي ويجهو ٿيڻ چاهيو ٿا ته توهان کي موسيقي ۾ ويجهو ڪيمپ واري سائيٽ تائين پهچڻ لاءِ صبح جو سوير اٿڻو پوندو. ياد رکو تہ جيڪڏهن مين اسٽيجن تي ٿي سگهي ٿو موسيقي ختم ٿي چڪي هجي، پر فيسٽيول جا ڪجهہ سيڪشن ٿي سگهي ٿو رات دير تائين موسيقي هلائيندا هجن. جوان ٻارن سان ڪٽنبن جي لاءِ ڪجهہ فيسٽيولن ۾ خاص ڪيمپنگ جا ميدان آهن.
mt: For some festivals, a large majority of attendees camp on site, and most consider camping an integral part of the experience. If you want to camp near the action, you'll need to get up early to make it to the music festival's camping site. Remember that if the main stages are done for the day, some festivals will continue to play music into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: ڏٺو وڃي ته ڪيترائي پيوبولز پري آهن، توهان البُڪريڪيو يا سينٽا في ڏانهن سفر ڪرڻ کان بغير توهانکي نائيٽ لائيف جو ڪافي انگ نٿو ملي سگهي. جيتوڻيڪ، مٿي فهرست ڏنل تقريبن سڀئي ڪسينو ڊرنڪس پيش ڪندا آهن، ۽ انهن مان ڪيترائي نالي-برانڊ تفريح آڻين ٿا (خاص طور تي البڪرڪي ۽ سينٽا في جي ڀرپاسي وارا وڏا ڪسينو). خبردار: هتي ننڍن-شهرن جون بارن ۾ ٻاهر جي سياحت وارن جي گهمڻ لاءِ هميشه سٺيون جڳهيون نه هونديون آهن. هڪ شيءَ لاءِ، اتر نيو ميڪسيڪو ۾ نشي ۾ ڊرائيونگ ڪرڻ جا اهم مسئلا آهن، ۽ ننڍي ٽائون بارن جي ويجهو نشي آور ڊرائيورن جو ڌيان وڌيڪ آهي.
mt: Note that many of these populations are remote, so you won't find nightlife in Albquerque or Santa Fe. However, most of these towns have at least one decent bar (especially in the areas around Albquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: there are always better places to go for nightlife in larger towns. One thing, driving in New Mexico at night can be a problem, and the remote towns of the small towns have more problems with drunk driving.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: "مکيہ مقامي بيئر 'نمبر ون' آهي، اهو پيچيدو بيئر نہ آهي، پر وڻندڙ ۽ تازو ڪندڙ آهي. ٻي مقامي بيئر کي ""مانتا"" چيو وڃي ٿو. گهڻيون ئي فرانسيسي وائين آهن پيئڻ لاءِ پر نيوزيلينڊ ۽ آسٽريلوي وائين شايد ان کان گهڻو هلي وڃن. مقامي نل جو پاڻي پيئڻ جي لاءِ بلڪل محفوظ آهي، پر جيڪڏهن توهان کي ڊپ آهي تہ بوتل وارو پاڻي آساني سان ملي ويندو آهي. آسٽريليا جي ماڻهن لاءِ ‘فليٽ وائيٽ’ ڪوفي جو خيال پرڏيهي آهي. هڪ ننڍڙي ڪاري ’اسپريسو‘ آهي، ڪيپيچينو ڪريم سان ڀريل ايندي آهي (جهاگ نه)، ۽ چانهه بغير کير جي پيش ڪئي ويندي آهي. گرم چاڪليٽ بيلجين جي معيار مطابق آهي، ميون جا جوس مهانگا آهن پر بهترين آهن."
mt: "The local beer is 'Number One', it's not a heavy beer, but it's refreshing and crisp. The other local beer is called 'Mint'. There are many French wines to drink but New Zealand and Australian wines may be a bit too much. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but if you're thirsty, bottled water is readily available. For Australians, 'Flat White' coffee is a bit of a novelty. A small 'Espresso' is a little bit of a 'Cappuccino' (no foam), and a 'Latte' is served without cream. Belgian chocolate is up to standard, fruit juices are expensive but the best."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "گوارني سڀني کان وڌيڪ عظيم ديسي گروپ هو جيڪو هاڻي اوڀر پيراگوئي ۾ آباد آهي، اهي اڌ خانہ بدوش شڪارين جي طور تي رهيا پيا هئا، جن پڻ گهربل زراعت جو ڪم ڪيو. چاڪو جو علائقو گائيڪورو ۽ پائياگو جهڙن ديسي قبيلن جو گهر هو، انهن شڪار، گڏجاڻي ۽ مڇي ماري زندگي گذاري. 16 صدي ۾ پيراگوي، جنهن کي اڳي ""انڊيز جو وڏو صوبو"" سڏيو ويندو هو، اسپين فاتحن جي مقامي ڏيهي گروهن سان ويڙهه جي نتيجي ۾ پيدا ٿيو. اندلسين نو آبادياتي جو دور شروع ڪيو جيڪو ٽي صدين تائين رهيو. 1537 ۾ اسونسن جي بنياد کانپوءِ، پيراگوئي پنهنجو گهڻو ڪجهہ ديسي ڪردار ۽ سڃاڻپ برقرار رکڻ ۾ ڪامياب ويو آهي."
mt: "Guaraní was the most important indigenous group in what is now eastern Paraguay, who were semi-nomadic hunter-gatherers who also practiced subsistence agriculture. Chaco was home to the Guaycuru and Pai Tavytera indigenous groups, who lived a nomadic, gregarious and fishing lifestyle. In the 16th century, Paraguay was formed from the local indigenous groups in the wake of the Spanish conquest. The period of Andalusian colonization began in 1537, after the foundation of Asunción, and Paraguay has largely maintained its indigenous character and identity since then."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "پئرس جا ماڻهو انا پسند، سخت ۽ جذباتي هجڻ جي شهرت رکن ٿا. جڏهن ته اڪثر ڪري اهو صرف ناقص اسٽيريوٽائپ هوندو آهي، پيرس ۾ هلڻ جو بهترين طريقو اڃا تائين پنهنجي بهترين رويي تي رهڻ آهي، ڪنهن ماڻهو وانگر عمل ڪرڻ جيڪو ""bien élevé"" (بهترين پرورش ٿيل) آهي. اهو پورو ڪرڻ بابت تمام آسان ٿي ويندو. جيڪڏهن توهان ڪجهہ بنيادي نوڙت سان پيش اچو ٿا تہ پئرس جا ماڻهن جي ٻاهرين ڪاوڙ جلدي ختم ٿي ويندي."
mt: "Parisians are known for being polite, tough and emotional. While this is often just a poor stereotype, the best way to get around Paris is still to be at your best, like a "bien élevé" (well brought up). This is easy to do. If you approach things with a basic respect, Parisians' initial reserve will quickly melt away."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: ميٽرو ريل وٽ ڪيپ ٽائون ۽ ويجهو مسافر ٽرينن جون ٻہ ڪلاسون آهن: ميٽرو پلس (جنهن کي فرسٽ ڪلاس چئبو آهي) ۽ ميٽرو (جنهن کي ٿرڊ ڪلاس چئبو آهي). ميٽرو پلس وڌيڪ تسڪين ڏيندڙ ۽ گهٽ رش وارو آهي پر ٿورو مهانگو آهي. جيتوڻڪ يورپ ۾ عام ميٽرو ٽڪيٽن جي مقابلي ۾ اڃا تائين سستو آهي. هر ٽرين کي ميٽرو پلس ۽ ميٽرو ڪوچون آهن؛ ميٽرو پلس ڪوچون هميشه ڪيپ ٽائون جي ويجهو ٽرين جي آخر ۾ هونديون آهن.
mt: There are two classes of metro trains: Metro Plus (which is called First Class) and Metro (which is called Third Class). Metro Plus is more comfortable and less crowded but more expensive. It is still cheaper than the average metro ticket in Europe. Each train has Metro Plus and Metro coaches; Metro Plus coaches are always at the end of the train near the driver.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: مسافرن کي جانورن جي پيسٽ کي منهن ڏيڻو پئجي سگهي ٿو ڇو تہ اهي پنهنجي گهريلو خطن ۾ ان سان واقف ناهن. جيت کاڌو خراب ڪري سگهن ٿا، خارش جو ڪارڻ ٿي سگهن ٿا، يا ڪنهن بد تر صورتحال ۾ الرجڪ رد عمل جو سبب بڻجي سگهن ٿا، زهر ڦهلائي سگهن ٿا يا انفيڪشن منتقل ڪري سگهن ٿا. وبائي بيماريون پاڻ، يا خطرناڪ جانور جيڪي طاقت سان ماڻهن کي زخمي ڪري سگهن ٿا يا ماري سگهن ٿا، عام طور تي وبا ۾ نٿا اچن.
mt: Passengers can be exposed to animal pee because they are not familiar with it in their domestic environments. Cats can make food inedible, cause itching, or be the cause of allergic reactions in some cases, poison, transmit infection, or kill. Epidemics are not usually caused by dangerous animals that can injure or kill people.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: هر ڪنڊ ڪڙڇ جو اسٽور پري پيڊ فون ڪارڊن منجهيل قطار سان ڀريل آهي، جيڪي پيفون يا عام ٽيليفونن تي استعمال ٿي سگهجن ٿا. جڏهن ته اڪثر ڪارڊ ڪٿي به فون ڪال ڪرڻ لاءِ بهتر آهن، ڪجهه ڪارڊ ملڪن جي مخصوص گروپن ڏانهن سازگار ڪال ريٽ مهيا ڪرڻ جي خاصيت رکن ٿا. هنن سروسز تائين رسائي اڪثر ڪري ٽال-فري ٽيليفون نمبر ذريعي ٿيندي آهي جنهن تي گھڻن فونن کان براه راست ڪال ڪري سگهجي ٿي.
mt: Every corner store in Thailand is filled with prepaid phone cards, which can be used on pay phones or regular phones. While most cards are good for any phone, some cards are tailored to specific groups in certain countries. These services are usually available through toll-free telephone numbers, which allow you to call directly from many phones.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

While most cards are good for any phone, some cards are tailored to specific groups in certain countries. These services are usually available through toll-free telephone numbers, which allow you to call directly from many phones.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: پلٽ وائيس ڍنڍن جي قومي پارڪ تمام گهڻي جهنگ سان ڍڪيل آهي، خاص طور تي بيچ، اسپروس ۽ فر جي وڻن سان گڏ، ۽ هن ۾ الپائن ۽ ميڊيٽرينين وڻ ٽڻ شامل آهن. ان جي مائيڪرو ڪلائيميٽس جي رينج جي ڪري، مختلف زمين، ۽ مختلف سطح جي اوچائي جي ڪري، ان ۾ پلانٽ ڪميونٽي جا ڪيترائي مقبول قسم موجود آهن. اهو علائقو مختلف جانورن ۽ پکين جي قسمن جو هڪ گهڻو وڏو گهر پڻ آهي. اُتي ناياب جهنگلي جانور جهڙوڪ يورپي ڀورو رڇ، بگهڙ، باز، چٻرو، جهنگلي ٻلو، جهنگلي ٻلي، ۽ جهنگلي ڪڪڙ، ان سان گڏ ڪيترائي عام قسم ملي سگهن ٿا.
mt: The Platte River National Park is heavily wooded, particularly with beech, spruce and fir trees, and includes alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. Its microclimates range from dry to wet, and from high to low elevation, allowing a wide variety of plant communities. It is also home to a large number of animals and birds. Rare wild animals include the European bison, elk, eagle, owl, crow, raven, hawk, falcon, and vulture, as well as many common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "ميڊيا ڪمپنيون باقاعدي سان هن جي مقصد بابت ڪوڙ ڳالهائين ٿيون، ۽ اهو دعويٰ ڪن ٿيون تہ اهو ""نقل کي روڪڻ"" لاءِ آهي. حقيقت ۾، علائقي ڪوڊن جو غير قانوني ڪاپي ڪرڻ تي ڪوبه اثر ناهي؛ هڪ ڊسڪ جي هڪ بٽ-لاءِ-بٽ ڪاپي ڪنهن به ڊوائيس تي صحيح طريقي سان هلندي جيئن اصلي هلندي. اصل مقصد انهن ڪمپنين کي پنهنجين مارڪيٽن تي وڌيڪ ڪنٽرول ڏيڻ آهي. اهو سڀ پئسن کي گهمائڻ بابت آهي."
mt: "Media companies openly admit that this is its purpose, and claim that it is to "stop piracy". In fact, there is no effect on illegal copying of copyrighted code; a disk's bit-for-bit copy runs on any device as well as the original. The real purpose is to give these companies more control over their markets. This is all about controlling the flow of information."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: جڏهن توهان پنهنجي ملڪ واپس پهچندا آهيو تہ عام طور تي اميگريشن چيڪ غير حاضر هوندو آهي يا قاعدو هوندو آهي، ڪسٽمز ڪنٽرول ۾ پريشاني ٿي سگهي ٿي. ان ڳالهہ جي پڪ ڪريو تہ توهان ڄاڻو ٿا تہ توهان قانوني حد ۾ ڪجهہ کڻي يا نہ کڻي سگهو ٿا ۽ هر شئي ظاهر ڪري سگهو ٿا.
mt: When you return to your country, you will usually find that immigration checks are absent or lax, customs control can be frustrating. Be sure that you know that you are allowed to bring or not bring certain things and everything is declared.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: ڪوچامو وادي ـ چلي جي مشهور ترين چڙهائي واري منزل، جنهن کي مختلف قسم جي گرينائيٽ وڏن ديوارن ۽ ٽڪرين سان، ڏکڻ آمريڪا جي يوسيمائيٽ جي نالي سان سڃاتو وڃي ٿو. انهن چوٽين ۾ اهي به شامل آهن جن تان دل موهيندڙ نظارا ڏسڻ ۾ ايندا آهن. دنيا جي سڀني حصن مان جبل چاڙهو اڻ کُٽندڙ مضبوط ديوارن جي وچ ۾ لڳاتار رستا ٺاهيندا آهن.
mt: Cueva de las Manos, Chile's most famous rock art site, is known for its large granite walls and boulders, similar to the Yucamane in southern Chile. These include those from which breathtaking views can be seen. Roads are built through the world's strongest unbroken walls.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: جيڪڏهن توهان ڏاکڻي اڌ گولي ۾ پوري دنيا جي اُڏام ڪرڻ چاهيو ٿا ته، بحري رستن جي نه هجڻ جي ڪري، پروازن ۽ منزلن جي چونڊ محدود آهي. ڪو بہ ايئر لائن اتحاد ڏکڻ هيمسفيئر ۾ ٽئي سامونڊي ڪراسنگ ڪور نٿو ڪري (۽ SkyTeam ڪو بہ ڪراسنگ ڪور نٿي ڪري). جيتوڻيڪ، اسٽار الائنس سينتياگو ڊي چلي کان ٽيهٽي تائين اوڀر ڏکڻ پئسفڪ کان سواءِ هر شيءَ کي ڪَوَر ڪري ٿو، جيڪا هڪ ليٽم ون ورلڊ اڏام آهي. جيڪڏهن توهان ڏکڻ پئسفڪ ۽ ڏکڻ آمريڪا جو ويسٽ ڪوسٽ ڇڏڻ چاهيو ٿا تہ صرف هن فلائيٽ جو آپشن نہ آهي. (هيٺ ڏسو)
mt: If you want to fly around the entire world in the Southern Hemisphere, limited options exist due to the lack of ocean crossings. No airline alliance crosses the South Pacific (and SkyTeam doesn't cross any ocean). However, Star Alliance covers Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a one-stop world tour. If you want to fly from the Southern Pacific and Southern America to West Coast, there is no option. (See below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: بين الاقوامي طور تي، لڳ ڀڳ 200 هلندڙ ٽوئر تنظيمون آهن. انهن مان گهڻيون آزاد طور تي ڪم ڪن ٿيون. گلوبل رننگ ٽوئرس سڪسيسر، گو رننگ ٽوئرس نيٽورڪس چار کنڊن تي درجنن ۾ سائيٽ رننگ مهيا ڪندڙ. بارسيلونا جي رننگ ٽور بارسيلونا ۽ ڪوپن هيگن جي رننگ ڪوپن هيگن ۾ جڙن سان، پراگ ۽ ٻين جي بنياد تي ان کي جلدي رننگ ٽورس پراگ پاران شامل ڪيو ويو.
mt: Internationally, there are about 200 active running organizations. Most of them are independent. Global Running Tour Successor, Go Running Network Networks in dozens of sites running in Barcelona, Barcelona and Copenhagen Running Copenhagen, Copenhagen and other running on the basis of the inclusion of the fast running tour Prague by Prague.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "سفاري شايد آفريقا ۾ وڌ ۾ وڌ سياحت کي ڇڪندي آهي ۽ سياحن جي لاءِ نمايان آهي. حيرت ڏيندڙ آفريڪي جهنگلي دنيا خاص طور تي سوانا ۾، ڏسڻ لاءِ زميني سفر ڪرڻ جو مشهور لفظ سفاري آهي. ڪجهہ جانور، جهڙوڪ هاٿي ۽ جراف، ڪارن جي بلڪل ويجهو ايندا آهن ۽ معياري سامان سٺو ڏسڻ جي اجازت ڏي ٿو. شينهن، چيتا ۽ ليوپارڊز ڪڏهن شرميلا هوندا آهن ۽ توهان انهن کي دوربينن سان بهتر ڏسندا. هڪ واڪنگ سفاري (جنهن کي ""بش واڪ""، ""هائيڪنگ سفاري""، يا گوئنگ ""فوٽنگ"" پڻ سڏيو ويندو آهي) ڪجهه ڪلاڪن يا ڪيترن ئي ڏينهن لاءِ، هائيڪنگ تي مشتمل آهي."
mt: "Travel may be Africa's fastest growing tourism sector and is particularly notable. The famous phrase'safari' in Swahili means 'journey' and refers to land-based travel. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, are close to the car and allow good viewing equipment. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you can see them better with cameras. A walking safari (also known as a "bush walk", "hiking safari" or "footing safari") is for a few hours or several days, is based on hiking.
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: سياحت وڏن گروهن جي لاءِ سستا آهن، جيڪڏهن توهان پاڻ يا هڪ ٻي دوست سان، ٻين ماڻهن سان ملڻ جي ڪوشش ڪريو ٿا ۽ في ماڻهو تي گهٽ ريٽ لاءِ 4 کان 6 جو گروپ ٺاهيو ٿا. جيتوڻيڪ، اهو توهان جي پريشاني نه هجڻ گهرجي، ڇاڪاڻ ته اڪثر ڪري گاڏيون ڀرڻ لاءِ سياحن کي ادل بدل ڪيو ويندو آهي. ائين لڳي ٿو تہ اهو ٺڳي جو هڪ طريقو آهي تہ جيئن ماڻهن جو خيال هجي تي انهن کي وڌيڪ قيمت ڀرڻي پوندي.
mt: Tourism is cheap for large groups, if you and a friend or two try to meet up and form a group of 4 to 6 people per person. Although, it is not necessary to be upset, as most of the time the tourists are given discounts for renting cars. It seems that this is a way to make people think that they are getting more expensive.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: سياحت وڏن گروهن جي لاءِ سستا آهن، جيڪڏهن توهان پاڻ يا هڪ ٻي دوست سان، ٻين ماڻهن سان ملڻ جي ڪوشش ڪريو ٿا ۽ في ماڻهو تي گهٽ ريٽ لاءِ 4 کان 6 جو گروپ ٺاهيو ٿا. جيتوڻيڪ، اهو توهان جي پريشاني نه هجڻ گهرجي، ڇاڪاڻ ته اڪثر ڪري گاڏيون ڀرڻ لاءِ سياحن کي ادل بدل ڪيو ويندو آهي. ائين لڳي ٿو تہ اهو ٺڳي جو هڪ طريقو آهي تہ جيئن ماڻهن جو خيال هجي تي انهن کي وڌيڪ قيمت ڀرڻي پوندي.
mt: Tourism is cheap for large groups, if you and a friend or two try to meet up and form a group of 4 to 6 people per person. Although, it is not necessary to be upset, as most of the time the tourists are given discounts for renting cars. It seems that this is a way to make people think that they are getting more expensive.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: جڏهن ته عالمي معيار جي سياحتي ڪشش هجڻ ڪري سين فرانسسکو جي معيشت ان سان جڙيل آهي، ان جي معيشت متنوع آهي. روزگار جا سڀ کان وڏا شعبا هنري خدمتون، سرڪار، مالي، واپار، ۽ سياحت آهن. موسيقي، فلمن، ادب ۽ مشهور ثقافت جي ان جي اڪثر نقاشي شهر ۽ ان جي سرزمين کي سڄي دنيا ۾ مشهور ڪرڻ ۾ مدد ڪئي آهي. سان فرانسسڪو گهڻين هوٽلن، ريسٽورينٽس، ۽ اعليٰ معيار ڪنوينشن جي سهولتن سان هڪ وڏو سياح جو ڍانچو تيار ڪيو آهي. سان فرانسسڪو ٻين ايشيائي کاڌن جي لاءِ بہ ملڪ ۾ بهترين جاين مان هڪ آهي: ڪوريائي، ٿائي، هندوستاني، ۽ جاپاني.
mt: While the city's economy is largely dependent on tourism, its economy is diverse. The largest employment sectors are health care, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Music, film, literature, and its famous culture have been largely responsible for the city's worldwide fame. San Francisco has a large number of hotels, restaurants, and high-quality convention facilities, making it a major tourist destination. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the country to eat Asian cuisine: Chinese, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: ايڊوانس ۾ بکنگ ڪرڻ مسافر کي ذهني سڪون ملندو آهي ته هڪ ڀيرو منزل تي پهچي انهن کي ڪٿي ڪجهه ننڊ ڪرڻي پوندي. ٽريول ايجنٽن وٽ اڪثر مخصوص هوٽلن سان ڊيلز هونديون آهن. تنهن هوندي بہ هڪ ٽريول ايجنٽ جي ذريعي توهان کي رهائش جي ٻين قسمن جي بڪنگ ممڪن ٿي سگهي ٿي، جهڙوڪ ڪيمپنگ گرائونڊز. ٽريول ايجنٽ اڪثر پيڪيجز آڇ ڪندا آهن جنهن ۾ ناشتو، هوائي اڏي کان/تائين ٽرانسپورٽ جو بندوبست يا ايتري قدر جو متحد فلائيٽ ۽ هوٽل پيڪيجز شامل آهن. جيڪڏهن توهان کي آڇ جي بابت سوچڻ يا پنهنجي منزل جي لاءِ ڪي ٻيا دستاويز (مثال طور ويزا) حاصل ڪرڻ لاءِ ڪجهہ وقت گهربل آهي تہ اهي توهان لاءِ ڪمرو والاري بہ رکي سگهن ٿا. ڪي به ترميمون يا درخواستون جيتوڻيڪ سفري ايجنٽ ذريعي پهچائڻ گهرجن ۽ سڌو هوٽل کي نه.
mt: Booking in advance gives the passenger peace of mind that they will arrive at their destination without any problems. A good travel agent will have deals with specific hotels. However, a travel agent can also arrange other types of accommodation, such as camping grounds. Travel agents often offer packages which include transport to/from the airport, or a package with a combined flight and hotel. If you need time to think about the offer or to obtain other documents (for example, visas) for your journey, these can be arranged for you. Any changes or requests should be made through the travel agent and not directly to the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: ريئل ٽائيم ٽيڪسٽ ٽرانسليٽر ائپس – ائپليڪيشنز جيڪي خودڪار طور تي متن جو پورو جملو هڪ ٻولي کان ٻي ٻولي ۾ ترجمو ڪرڻ جي قابل آهن. هن زمري ۾ ڪجهہ اپلي ڪيشنون حقيقي دنيا م نشانين يا ٻين شين تي ٻاهرين ملڪن جي ٻولين ۾ متن جو ترجمو پڻ ڪري سگهن ٿيون جڏهن صارف سمارٽ فون کي انهن شين ڏانهن اشارو ڪري ٿو. ترجمي وارو انجڻن ڊرامائي انداز ۾ بهتري ٿيا آهن، ۽ هاڻي اڪثر گهڻو يا گهٽ صحيح ترجما ڏين ٿا (۽ وڌيڪ ڪڏهن ڪڏهن بي معنيٰ)، پر ڪجهہ توجهہ لازمي آهي، ڇو تہ اڃا تائين اهي سڀ غلط ٿي سگهن ٿا. هن قسم جي سڀني مشهور ايپس مان هڪ Google Translate آهي، جيڪو گهربل ٻولي جي ڊيٽا ڊائون لوڊ ڪرڻ کانپوءِ آف لائن ترجمو ڪرڻ جي اجازت ڏي ٿو.
mt: Real-time text translators apps – apps that can automatically translate full sentences from one language to another. Some apps in this category can translate text on signs or other objects in foreign countries' languages when the user points their smartphone at them. Translation engines have become more dramatic, and now mostly give good or fair translations (and more often than not, nonsense), but some attention is needed, as they can still be wrong. One of the most famous apps of this kind is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: برفشار غير معمولي ناهن؛ سڌيون لهواريون صرف ايترو ئي تمام سست انداز ۾ سهي سگهن ٿيون ۽ اضافي مقدار برفشار طور هيٺ اچي ويندو. مسئلو اهو آهي تہ برف چيڙهي آهي، تنهنڪري ان کي گهٽائڻ لاءِ ڪجهہ ڪجي، ۽ ڪجهہ هيٺ ڪرندڙ برف ٻين جي لاءِ حادثو وڌائي سگهي ٿي. ڪڏهن ڪڏهن اصلي اوچتا واقعا اهي آهن تہ سج جو برف کي گرم ڪرڻ، ڪڏهن ڪڏهن ڪجهہ گهڻي برفباري، ڪڏهن ڪڏهن ٻيا قدرتي واقعا، گهڻو ڪري انسان.
mt: Unusually, the snowfall is not heavy; melting snows only slowly and additional snowfall is below freezing. The problem is that the snow is melting, so something needs to be done to reduce it, and some of the snow that is melting is falling on others. Sometimes the original high events are that the sun is melting the snow, sometimes heavy snowfall, sometimes other natural events, mostly human.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: برفشار غير معمولي ناهن؛ سڌيون لهواريون صرف ايترو ئي تمام سست انداز ۾ سهي سگهن ٿيون ۽ اضافي مقدار برفشار طور هيٺ اچي ويندو. مسئلو اهو آهي تہ برف چيڙهي آهي، تنهنڪري ان کي گهٽائڻ لاءِ ڪجهہ ڪجي، ۽ ڪجهہ هيٺ ڪرندڙ برف ٻين جي لاءِ حادثو وڌائي سگهي ٿي. ڪڏهن ڪڏهن اصلي اوچتا واقعا اهي آهن تہ سج جو برف کي گرم ڪرڻ، ڪڏهن ڪڏهن ڪجهہ گهڻي برفباري، ڪڏهن ڪڏهن ٻيا قدرتي واقعا، گهڻو ڪري انسان.

src: "هڪ ڪري جڙي ٻوٽين ۽ مصالحن تي ٻڌل هڪ ڊش آهي، جنهن ۾ گڏ گوشت يا ڀاڄيون پونديون آهن. هڪ ڪري پاڻياٺ جي مقدار تي ڀاڙيندي ""خشڪ"" يا ""رس واري"" ٿي سگهي ٿي. اترئين هندستان ۽ پاڪستان جي اندرين علائقن ۾ مختلف ٻوڙ ٺاهڻ ۾ عام طور ڌونئرواستعمال ڪيو ويندو آهي جڏهن ته  ڏکڻ هندستان ۽ ننڍي کنڊ جي ڪجهه ٻين ساحلي علائقن ۾ عام طور تي ناريل جو کير استعمال ڪيو ويندو آهي."
mt: "A dish consisting of a layer of vegetables and spices, with either meat or lentils on top. The amount of water in the dish can vary from "dry" to "moist". In the northern parts of India and Pakistan, different types of dough are commonly used when making rotis, while in the southern parts of India and some coastal areas of the Indian subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: "هڪ ڪري جڙي ٻوٽين ۽ مصالحن تي ٻڌل هڪ ڊش آهي، جنهن ۾ گڏ گوشت يا ڀاڄيون پونديون آهن. هڪ ڪري پاڻياٺ جي مقدار تي ڀاڙيندي ""خشڪ"" يا ""رس واري"" ٿي سگهي ٿي. اترئين هندستان ۽ پاڪستان جي اندرين علائقن ۾ مختلف ٻوڙ ٺاهڻ ۾ عام طور ڌونئرواستعمال ڪيو ويندو آهي جڏهن ته  ڏکڻ هندستان ۽ ننڍي کنڊ جي ڪجهه ٻين ساحلي علائقن ۾ عام طور تي ناريل جو کير استعمال ڪيو ويندو آهي."

src: سائوٿ پول ٽراورس (يا هائي وي) روز سمنڊ تي ميڪمرڊو کان پول تائين 1600 ڪلو ميٽر جو رستو آهي. اهو ڳتيل برف گليشيئر جي ڏارن سان ڀريل آهي ۽ جهنڊين سان نشان لڳل آهن. اتي صرف خاص ٽريڪٽرن، ايندهن ۽ سپلائيز سان هولنگ سليڊز جي ذريعي سفر ڪري سگهجي ٿو. اهي وڌيڪ تيز نہ هوندا آهن تنهنڪري مٿانهن پٽ تي پهچڻ لاءِ ٽرانس انٽارڪٽڪ جبل جي چوڌاري ڊگهو گهمڻو پوندو.
mt: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km (1000 mi) route across the sea ice from McMurdo Station to the Pole. It is covered with thick glacial ice and marked with flags. Only specially equipped trucks, snowmobiles, and supply sleds can travel on it. They are not very fast, so getting to the top of the plateau takes a long time, going around the Transantarctic Mountains.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: سائوٿ پول ٽراورس (يا هائي وي) روز سمنڊ تي ميڪمرڊو کان پول تائين 1600 ڪلو ميٽر جو رستو آهي. اهو ڳتيل برف گليشيئر جي ڏارن سان ڀريل آهي ۽ جهنڊين سان نشان لڳل آهن. اتي صرف خاص ٽريڪٽرن، ايندهن ۽ سپلائيز سان هولنگ سليڊز جي ذريعي سفر ڪري سگهجي ٿو. اهي وڌيڪ تيز نہ هوندا آهن تنهنڪري مٿانهن پٽ تي پهچڻ لاءِ ٽرانس انٽارڪٽڪ جبل جي چوڌاري ڊگهو گهمڻو پوندو.
mt: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km (1000 mi) route across the sea ice from McMurdo Station to the Pole. It is covered with thick glacial ice and marked with flags. Only specially equipped trucks, snowmobiles, and supply sleds can travel on it. They are not very fast, so getting to the top of the plateau takes a long time, going around the Transantarctic Mountains.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: ڪار ذريعي ڏکڻ آفريڪا ۾ داخل ٿيڻ خطي جي سڄي خوبصورتي ڏسڻ ۽ عام سياحتي رستن تان الڳ وڃڻ لاءِ هڪ حيرت انگيز طريقو آهي. اهو عام گاڏي سان احتياطي منصوبي سان ڪري سگهجي ٿو پر هڪ 4x4 جو مشورو ڏنو ويو آهي ۽ ڪيترن ئي جائين تي رسائي صرف هائي ويل بيس 4x4 سان ئي ممڪن آهي. رٿ جوڙڻ مهل اهو ڌيان ۾ رکو تہ جيتوڻڪ ڏکڻ آفريڪا مستحڪم آهي تہ سڄا پاڙيسري ملڪ نہ آهن. ويزا جون گهرجون ۽ قيمتون هڪ ملڪ جون ٻي ملڪ سان الڳ هونديون آهن ۽ توهان جنهن ملڪ سان توهان اچو ٿا ان کان متاثر ٿينديون آهن. هر ملڪ جا منفرد قانون آهن ته ڪار ۾ ڪهڙيون هنگامي شيون هجڻ لازمي آهن.
mt: 4x4s are a great way to see the whole of South Africa, from the main tourist routes to the back roads. It is recommended that you take a 4x4 and there are many places where you can only get to in a 4x4. Before you set off, remember that South Africa is stable, but not all its neighbours are. Visas, paperwork and prices vary from country to country and you will be affected by the country you are coming from. Each country has its own laws, so what is essential in one country may not be in another.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: ٻين لاءِ کڻڻ دوران - ڪڏهن به پنهنجا ٿيلها نظر کان ٻاهر نه ڇڏيون، خاص طور تي جڏهن توهان بين الاقوامي حدون پار ڪري رهيا هجو. توهان پنهنجي ڄاڻ کانسواءِ پنهنجو پاڻ کي ڪنهن ڊرگ جي ڪيريئر طور استعمال ٿيندي ڏسي سگهو ٿا، جيڪو توهان کي گهڻي مشڪل ۾ وجهي ڇڏيندو. اهو قطار ۾ انتظار ڪرڻ شامل ڪري ٿو، جيئن منشيان سنگهڻ وارن ڪتن کي بغير اطلاع استعمال ڪري سگهجي ٿو. ڪجهہ ملڪن ۾ ايتري قدر جو پهرين ڏوهہ تي بہ انتهائي سخت سزا ڏني ويئي آهي؛ اهي 10 سال قيد جي سزا يا موت جي سزا شامل ڪري سگهن ٿا. بنا مالڪي رکيل ٿيلها چوري جو نشانو ٿيندا آهن ۽ بم جي خطرن کان خبردار اختيارين جوڌيان پڻ ان طرف ٿي سگهي ٿو.
mt: For others - never leave your belongings out of sight, especially when you're crossing international borders. You can see your own luggage being used as a drug carrier, which puts you in a very difficult position, as you have to wait in line while the customs officials inspect the contents. In some countries, the first offense can be punished with a sentence of up to ten years in prison or death. Your stolen luggage becomes a target for thieves and a warning to those who choose to carry bombs.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: پنھنجي گهر کي صبح جو هڪ بهترين ڪافي ۽ رات جو ڪنهن سڪون ڏيندڙ بابونه چانهه سان ڀريو. جڏهن توهان موڪل تي آهيو، تہ توهان وٽ پنهنجو خيال رکڻ لاءِ وقت آهي ۽ ڪجهہ خاص شربت ٺاهڻ لاءِ ڪجهہ اضافي منٽ وٺو. جيڪڏهن توهان وڌيڪ مُهم جُو محسوس ڪري رهيا آهيو ته، موقعو وٺي ڪجهه فروٽ جو جوس يا بلينڊ ٺاهيو: ٿي سگهي ٿو تہ توهان هڪ شربت دريافت ڪندا جيڪو توهان پنهنجي نيرن ۾ ٺاهي سگهو ٿا جڏهن توهان پنهنجي روز واري روٽين کان موٽيندا آهيو. جيڪڏهن توهان مختلف ڊرنڪنگ واري ثقافت واري شهر ۾ رهو ٿا، ڀرپاسي وارن بارن يا پب ۾ وڃو جتي توهان اڪثر نٿا وڃو.

ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: هلدرسوڪ جو ڳوٺ ويهي واري ٻيٽ ايسٽورائي جو نظارو پيش ڪريو ٿو ۽ هن ۾ هڪ عجيب اٺ ڪنڊن وارو چرچ آهي. چرچ يارڊ ۾، ڪجهه مقبرن مٿان ڪبوتر جا دلچسپ سنگ مرمر جا مجسما ٺهيل آهن. دلچسپ ڳوٺن ۾ گهمڻ لاءِ اڌ ڪلاڪ لڳندو آهي.
mt: The village of Halderskov is situated on the island of Ærø and offers a view of the church, which has a strange octagonal shape. In the churchyard, some interesting stone sculptures of birds are placed on top of the tombs. Half an hour is enough to visit the interesting villages.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: جڏهن ته توهان کي خاص ملڪن ۾ سياح يا ڪاروبار جي لاءِ مختصر دورن جي لاءِ ويزا جي ٿي سگهي ٿو ضرورت نه پوي، هڪ بين القوامي اگرد جي طور تي اتي وڃڻ وارن کي عام طور تي ڪنهن عام سياح جي حيثيت سان اتي وڃڻ وارن کان وڌيڪ ڊگهو عرصو رهڻ جي ضرورت هوندي آهي. عام طور تي، وڌيڪ عرصي لاءِ ڪنهن به ٻاهرين ملڪ ۾ رهڻ لاءِ توهان کي اڳواٽ ويزا حاصل ڪرڻ جي ضرورت پوندي. عام طور تي شاگردن جي ويزا جا عام سياح يا ڪاروباري ويزا سان مختلف گهرجون ۽ درخواستن جي طريقا آهن. اڪثر ملڪن لاءِ، توهان کي انهي اداري کان آفر ليٽر گهربل هوندو جتي توهان تعليم حاصل ڪرڻ چاهيو ٿا، ۽ توهان جي نصاب جي گهٽ ۾ گهٽ پهريئن سال لاءِ توهانجي سپورٽ لاءِ رقم جو هجڻ پن لازمي آهي. اداري ۽ گڏوگڏ ملڪ لاءِ اميگريشن ڊپارٽمينٽ کان چيڪ ڪريو، جنهن جو توهان تفصيلي گهرجن جو مطالعو ڪرڻ چاهيو ٿا.
mt: While you may be able to get a visa for short visits to certain countries for tourism or business, a multinational corporation on the other hand may require you to stay for a longer period of time as a tourist. Generally, you will need to obtain a visa in advance to stay in any foreign country for a longer period of time. Generally, the visa for students is different from the visa for tourists or business. Generally, the requirements and applications for the two are different. Generally, you will need to obtain a letter of offer from the institution where you wish to study, and you will need to show proof of funds for at least the first year of your studies. Check with the institution and the country's immigration department for the details of the requirements and applications you will need to fill out.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: جڏهن ته توهان کي خاص ملڪن ۾ سياح يا ڪاروبار جي لاءِ مختصر دورن جي لاءِ ويزا جي ٿي سگهي ٿو ضرورت نه پوي، هڪ بين القوامي اگرد جي طور تي اتي وڃڻ وارن کي عام طور تي ڪنهن عام سياح جي حيثيت سان اتي وڃڻ وارن کان وڌيڪ ڊگهو عرصو رهڻ جي ضرورت هوندي آهي. عام طور تي، وڌيڪ عرصي لاءِ ڪنهن به ٻاهرين ملڪ ۾ رهڻ لاءِ توهان کي اڳواٽ ويزا حاصل ڪرڻ جي ضرورت پوندي. عام طور تي شاگردن جي ويزا جا عام سياح يا ڪاروباري ويزا سان مختلف گهرجون ۽ درخواستن جي طريقا آهن. اڪثر ملڪن لاءِ، توهان کي انهي اداري کان آفر ليٽر گهربل هوندو جتي توهان تعليم حاصل ڪرڻ چاهيو ٿا، ۽ توهان جي نصاب جي گهٽ ۾ گهٽ پهريئن سال لاءِ توهانجي سپورٽ لاءِ رقم جو هجڻ پن لازمي آهي. اداري ۽ گڏوگڏ ملڪ لاءِ اميگريشن ڊپارٽمينٽ کان چيڪ ڪريو، جنهن جو توهان تفصيلي گهرجن جو مطالعو ڪرڻ چاهيو ٿا.

Check with the institution and the country's immigration department for the details of the requirements and applications you will need to fill out.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: اونهاري ۾، خصوصي طور تي، جيڪڏهن توهان رين فوريسٽ ۾ هائيڪ ڪرڻ چاهيو ٿا ته توهان کي مچھرن کي محتاط رهڻ جي ضرورت پوندي. توڙي جو توهان سب ٽروپيڪل رين فوريسٽ وچان ڊرائيو ڪري رهيا هجو، جڏهن توهان گاڏي ۾ سوار ٿي رهيا آهيو ان وقت دروازن جو ڪجهه سيڪنڊن لاءِ کُلڻ توهان جي گاڏي ۾ مڇر گهڙڻ لاءِ ڪافي وقت آهي.
mt: In the summer, especially, if you're driving through a rain forest, you need to be careful of mosquitoes. Even though you're driving through the rain forest in your car, it takes a few seconds for the doors to close, and that's enough time for mosquitoes to get into your car.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: سندربينس سامونڊي ڪناري لڳل تِمر جي وڻن جو دنيا ۾ سڀني کان وڏو پٽو آهي جيڪو سامونڊي پٽي کان ٿيندو بنگلاديشي ۽ هندوستان سان لاڳاپيل 80 ڪلو ميٽر (50 ميل) تائين پکڙيل آهي. سندربينس کي UNESCO جو عالمي ثقافتي ورثو قرار ڏنو ويو آهي. هندوستان جي سر زمين جي اندر جهنگ جي حصي ان کي سندربينس نيشنل پارڪ سڏيو وڃي ٿو. جڏهن تہ جهنگون صرف منگرووي دلدل نہ آهن — اهي ان ۾ عظيم جهنگن جا رهيل ڪجهہ ٿُڙ شامل ڪن ٿا جنهن سان ڪڏهن گنگا جا ميدان ڍڪيل هئا. سندربينس 3,850 km² تي ڦهليل آهي، جنهن ۾ لڳ ڀڳ ٽي حصا پاڻي/ڌُٻڻ آهي. 1966 کان سندربن جهنگلي جانورن جي هڪ پناه گاه رهئي آهي، ۽ هڪ اندازي جي حساب سان ان علائقي ۾ هاڻي 400 رائل بنگال ٽائيگر ۽ اٽڪل 30000 هرڻ موجود آهن.
mt: The Sundarbans mangrove forest is the largest mangrove forest in the world, spreading across 10,000 km² (3,900 sq mi) in the Ganges and Brahmaputra delta on the Bay of Bengal, covering protected areas in both India and Bangladesh. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Sundarbans National Park is a Tiger Reserve. The Sundarbans is not just a mangrove forest — it also includes some of the largest tidal forests in the world, which were once the hunting grounds of the Bengal tigers. The Sundarbans covers 3,850 km² (1,490 sq mi), of which about 1,600 km² (620 sq mi) are forested. The Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary since 1966, and is estimated to have about 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: دنيا ۾ 5000 کان وڌيڪ مختلف ٻوليون آهن جنهن ۾ 20 ٻوليون 50 ملين يا ان کان وڌيڪ ڳالهائيندڙ آهن. لکيل لفظ اڪثر ڳالهائينجندڙ لفظن کان سمجهڻ ۾ آسان پڻ هوندا آهن. اهو خاص طور تي پتن بابت سچ آهي، جيڪي اڪثر صراحت سان اچارڻ ۾ مشڪل هونديون آهن. ڪيترين ئي قومن جا سمورا ماڻهو پوري طرح سان انگريزي تي عبور رکندڙ آهن، ۽ اڃا تائين وڌيڪ توهان هڪ محدود علم جي اميد ڪري سگهو ٿا - خاص ڪري نوجوان ماڻهن جي وچ ۾. تصور ڪريو ته، جيڪڏهن توهان چاهيندو ته، هڪ مينڪيونيائي، بوسٽونيائي، جمائيڪن ۽ سڊنيسائيڊر ٽورونٽو ۾ هڪ ريسٽورينٽ ۾ هڪ ٽيبل جي چوڌاري رات جي ماني کائي رهيا آهن. اهي پنهني اباڻي شهر جون ڪهاڻيون ٻڌائي هڪ ٻئي کي وندرائي رهيا آهن، پنهنجي لهجي ۽ مقامي محاورن ۾ چيو.
mt: 5000 or more languages are spoken in the world, of which 20 are spoken by 50 million or more people. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words. This is especially true of proper nouns, which are often difficult to pronounce. Many people from different nations are fluent in English, and you can still hope to learn a limited amount - especially among the young. Imagine that, a mankatoan, bostonian, jamaican, and sudanese are sitting around a table in a restaurant in Toronto eating a night meal. They are telling each other stories about their home towns, using their dialects and local idioms.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: بسون انٽر-ڊسٽرڪٽ بس اسٽيشن کان (دريا پار) روانو ٿينديون آهن، جيتوڻيڪ اڪثر، خاص طور تي جيڪي اوڀر جي طرف ۽ جڪار/ممٿانگ ڏانهن وڃي رهيون آهن اهي 06:30 کان 07:30 جي وچ ۾ نڪرن ٿيون. جيئن ته ضلعي-اندر هلڻ واريون بسون اڪثر ڪري ڀريل هونديون آهن، اها صلاح ڏني وڃي ٿي ته ڪجهه ڏينهن اڳ ٽڪيٽ خريد ڪريو. گهڻن ضلعن ۾ ننڍيون جاپاني ڪوسٽر بسون هلن ٿيون، جيڪي آرام ڏيندڙ ۽ مضبوط آهن. گڏيل ٽيڪسيون ويجهو واري جاين جهڙوڪ پارو (Nu 150) ۽ پُناخا (Nu 200) تائين سفر ڪرڻ لاءِ هڪ تڪڙو ۽ آرام ڏيندڙ ذريعو آهن.
mt: Buses from the city's inter-district bus station (across the river) are leaving, although most, especially those going east and to Jakkur/Malleswaram, are leaving between 6:30 and 7:30. Since most district buses are usually full, it is advised to buy tickets a few days in advance. Many districts have small Japanese coasters, which are comfortable and sturdy. Combined taxis are a convenient and comfortable way to travel to nearby places such as Parvathipuram (Nu 150) and Punganur (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "نسبتن ان جي ناقابل رسائي سان گڏو گڏ ، ""ٽمبڪٽ"" ايگزوٽڪ لاءِ ميٽافور، ڊسٽنڪٽ لينڊ طور استعمال ٿيڻ لاءِ آيو آهي. اڄ ٽمبڪتو هڪ غريب شهر آهي پر ان جي باوجود هن جي شهرت هن کي سياحت لاءِ پسنديده بڻائي رکيو آهي ۽ کيس هڪ هوائي اڏو پڻ آهي. 1990 ۾، ريگستاني واري جي خطري سبب، انکي خطري ۾ دنيا جا وراثتي ماڳ واري فهرست ۾ شامل ڪيو ويو. آفريقي دنيا جي خاص عجوبن جي هينري لوئيس گيٽس جي PBS دوران اهو هڪ وڏين رڪاوٽن مان هڪ هئي. اهو شهر ملڪ جي ٻين شهرن کان بلڪل مختلف آهي، ڇاڪاڻ تہ ان جو انداز آفريقي جي مقابلي ۾ عربي گهڻو آهي."
mt: "In comparison to its inaccessibility, "Timbuktu" is an exotic destination for an exotic destination. Today it is a poor town, but despite this, its reputation has made it a tourist destination and it has an airport. In 1990, it was listed as a World Heritage Site in Danger due to its desert location. It was one of the great wonders of Africa in Henry Louis Gates' PBS series on African wonders. The town is very different from the country's other towns, because its style is very Arab in comparison to the rest of Africa."
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: پيرا اولمپڪس 14 آگسٽ کان 5 سيپٽمبر 2021 تائين ٿيندو. ڪجهہ تقريبون جاپان ۾ مختلف هنڌن تي ٿينديون. ٽوڪيو واحد ايشيائي شهر هوندو جنهن ٻہ گرما اولمپڪس جي ميزباني ڪئي آهي، انهن 1964 ۾ راندين جي ميزباني ڪئي هئي. جيڪڏهن توهان ملتوي ٿيڻ جي اعلان کان پهريان 2020 لاءِ پنهنجيون فلائيٽون ۽ رهائش جي بُڪ ڪئي آهي ته، توهان جي صورتحال مشڪل ٿي سگهي ٿي. رد ڪرڻ واريون پاليسيون مختلف ٿين ٿيون، پر مارچ جي آخر تائين اڪثر ڪورونا وائرس جي بنياد تي منسوخ ٿيل واريون پاليسيون جولاءِ 2020 تائين اڳتي نه ٿينديون آهن، جڏهن اولمپڪس شيڊيول ٿي ويو هجي. اهو اميد ڪئي ويندي آهي تہ گهڻن ٽڪيٽن جي قيمت ¥2,500 ۽ ¥130,000 جي وچ م هوندي، جنهن ۾ عام ٽڪيٽن جي قيمت ¥7,000 آهي.
mt: 2020 Summer Olympics will be held from 14 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in different locations in Japan. Tokyo is the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympics, having hosted the 1964 Summer Olympics. If you have booked your flights and accommodations before the announcement of the postponement, you may be in trouble. Cancellation policies vary, but most policies that are based on the coronavirus will not be cancelled until the end of March, when the Olympics schedule is set. It is hoped that the price of most tickets will be between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with the price of general tickets being ¥7,000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: "هڪ ٽورناڊو هوا جي تمام گهٽ-پريشر جو هڪ اسپننگ ڪالم آهي، جيڪو ڀرپاسي واري هوا اندر ۽ مٿي ڇڪيندو آهي. اهي تيز هوائون (اڪثر 100-200 ميل في ڪلاڪ) پيدا ڪن ٿا ۽ وزني شين کي هوا ۾ اڏائي سگهن ٿا، انهن کي کڻندو آهي جيئن واچوڙو هلندو آهي. جڏهن اهي طوفاني بادلن کان چمني جي دونهي وانگر هيٺ لهندي شروع ٿيندا آهن، ۽ جڏهن اهي زمين کي ڇهندا آهن تہ اهي ""واچوڙا"" ٿي ويندا آهن."
mt: "A tornado is a spinning column of air in the lower atmosphere, usually accompanied by a funnel-shaped cloud. They can reach speeds of 100-200 mph and can pick up and carry heavy objects, like a vacuum cleaner. When they descend from the clouds and touch the ground, they become ""funnels"".
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: جيڪڏهن اهو ملڪ جنهن جو توهان دورو ڪندا، ٽريول ايڊوائزري جو مشروط ٿي وڃي ٿو ته، توهان جي ٽريول هيلٿ انشورنس يا توهان جي ٽرپ ڪينسيليشن انشورنس متاثر ٿي سگهي ٿي. توهان شايد پنهنجو پاڻ کان علاوه پنهنجي حڪومتن سان صلاح مشورو وٺڻ چاهيندا، پر انهن جي صلاح پنهنجي شهرين لاءِ ڊزائن ٿيل آهي. هڪ مثال جي طور تي، مڊل ايسٽ ۾ آمريڪي شهرين کي يورپين يا عربن کان مختلف حالتون پيش اچي سگهن ٿيون. ايڊوائيزريون صرف هڪ ملڪ جي سياسي صورتحال جو مختصر خلاصو آهن. جيڪي خيال پيش ڪيا ويا آهن اهي ٻي ڪنهن هنڌ موجود گهڻي تفصيلي معلومات جي مقابلي ۾ اڪثر مختصر، عام ۽ سادي هوندي آهي.
mt: If the country you are visiting has a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may want to consult with your government, but their advice is designed for their citizens. For example, American citizens in the Middle East may have different situations than Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are only a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The thoughts presented here are generally short, general and simple compared to the extensive detailed information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: 19 صدي کان ٽريول ايجنسيون آهن. هڪ ٽريول ايجنٽ سفر جي لاءِ هڪ سٺو اختيار هوندو آهي جيڪو سفر جي فطرت، ثقافت، ٻولي يا گهٽ آمدني واري ملڪن جي پوئين تجربي کان اڳتي وڌي ٿو. جيتوڻيڪ اڪثر ايجنسيون گهڻو عام بڪنگون وٺڻ جون خواهشمند آهن، ڪيترائي ايجنٽ خاص قسم جي سفر، بجٽ رينجز يا منزلن ۾ مهارت رکن ٿا. اهو بهتر ٿي سگهي ٿو ته هڪ ايجنٽ استعمال ڪجي جيڪو اڪثر توهان جي ٽرپس جي بڪنگ ڪري ٿو. هڪ نظر هڻو تہ ايجنٽ ويب سائيٽ يا دڪان تي ڪهڙي تفريحي سفر کي فروغ ڏيئي رهيو آهي.
mt: 19th century travel agencies. A good travel agent is one who has traveled the nature, culture, language or low-income countries of the world. While most agencies are happy to book the most common bookings, many agents have expertise in specific types of travel, budget restrictions or destinations. It is better to use an agent who usually books your trips. Note that an agent is promoting a vacation on their website or store.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: "جڏهن توهان ڪٿي سفر ڪريو ٿا ۽ ان کان پهرين توهان کي گهڻيون شيون ڌيان کي ۾ رکڻيون هونديون آهن. جڏهن توهان سفر ڪريو ٿا، تہ اميد ڪريو ٿا اهي ""پويان گهر"" وانگر شيون نہ هجن. ڍنگ، قانون، کاڌو، ٽرئفڪ، رهائش، معيار، زبان ۽ ان جهڙيون شيون جتي توهان رهو ٿا ان کان ڪجهہ قدر مختلف آهن. مايوسي کان بچڻ لاءِ يا ڪجهہ ڪرڻ لاءِ شايد مقامي طريقن سان بہ نا پسندي جي لاءِ اهو توهان کي هميشہ ذهن ۾ رکڻو آهي."
mt: "When you travel, you expect things to be different from what you are used to. When you travel, you hope things are not like the ""home"" you left behind. Traffic, law, food, traffic, accommodation, standards, language, and other things where you live are different. To avoid disappointment or to do something, you may always keep in mind that it is not your place."
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: جيڪڏهن پهريون ڀيرو ڪنهن ترقي پذير ملڪ ۾ سفر ڪري رهيا آهيو – يا دنيا جي ڪنهن نئين حصي ۾ – امڪاني ڪلچر صدمي جو اندازو گهٽ نه ڪريو. ڪيترائي مستحڪم، لائق مسافر ترقي ڪندڙ دنيا جي سفر جي نواڻ کي قابو ڪري چڪا آهن جتي ٿوري ثقافتي سنوتون جلدي سان شامل ٿي سگهن ٿيون. پنهنجي شروعاتي ڏينهن ۾ خاص طور تي، مغربي-طرز اپنائڻ ۽ معياري هوٽل، کاڌن ۽ خدمتن جي عادت وجهڻ لاءِ ڌيان ڏيڻ تي غور ڪريو. انهن علائقن ۾ هڪ ميٽريس يا زمين تي پيڊ تي نه سمهو جتي توهان مقامي حيوانات کي نٿا ڄاڻو. جيڪڏهن توهان ڪيمپ آئوٽ ڪرڻ وارا آهيو ته، پنهنجو پاڻ کي نانگن، بڇوئن ۽ ٻين کان پري رکڻ لاءِ هڪ ڪيمپ واري کٽ يا هيموڪ گڏ آڻيو.
mt: If you're traveling to a developing country for the first time – or to a new part of the world – don't underestimate culture shock. Many seasoned, savvy travelers have mastered the art of traveling to the developing world without letting cultural differences get in the way. In the early days of your trip, especially, pay attention to adapting to Western ways and getting used to standard hotels, food, and services. In those areas, don't expect to sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground where you don't know what animals are. If you're camping out, bring a tent or hammock to keep snakes, mosquitoes, and other critters away.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: "پنهنجي پاليس ۽ ويمو ڪندڙ جي رابطي جو تفصيلون نقل ڪريو ۽ گڏ کڻو. انهن کي مشوري/اختيارن ۽ دعويٰ ڪرڻ لاءِ انشورر جو اي ميل پتو ۽ بين الاقوامي فون نمبرن ڏيکارڻ جي ضرورت آهي. پنهنجي لگيج ۾ يا آن لائن ٻي نقل حاصل ڪريو (منسلڪ سان گڏ پاڻ کي اي ميل ڪريو ، يا ""ڪلائوڊ"" ۾ محفوظ ڪريو.) جيڪڏهن هڪ ليپ ٽاپ يا ٽيبليٽ سان گڏ سفر ڪري رهيا آهيو ته، هڪ ميموري يا ڊسڪ (انٽرنيٽ کان بغير رسائي جي قابل) ۾ ان جي هڪ نقل محفوظ ڪريو. مدد لاءِ راضامند ٿيل گهر ڏانهن واپس ايندڙ ساٿين ۽ مائٽن يا دوستن کي پاليسي/رابطن جون ڪاپيون پڻ ڏيو."
mt: "Contact your insurance company and inform them of the loss. Provide them with your policy number and international phone numbers. Save a copy in your computer or online (with a password), or on a memory stick or tablet (with a password). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, also save a copy on a memory or disk (without internet access). Provide copies of your policies to trusted friends, family members, or companions who will be returning home."
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: "پنهنجي پاليس ۽ ويمو ڪندڙ جي رابطي جو تفصيلون نقل ڪريو ۽ گڏ کڻو. انهن کي مشوري/اختيارن ۽ دعويٰ ڪرڻ لاءِ انشورر جو اي ميل پتو ۽ بين الاقوامي فون نمبرن ڏيکارڻ جي ضرورت آهي. پنهنجي لگيج ۾ يا آن لائن ٻي نقل حاصل ڪريو (منسلڪ سان گڏ پاڻ کي اي ميل ڪريو ، يا ""ڪلائوڊ"" ۾ محفوظ ڪريو.) جيڪڏهن هڪ ليپ ٽاپ يا ٽيبليٽ سان گڏ سفر ڪري رهيا آهيو ته، هڪ ميموري يا ڊسڪ (انٽرنيٽ کان بغير رسائي جي قابل) ۾ ان جي هڪ نقل محفوظ ڪريو. مدد لاءِ راضامند ٿيل گهر ڏانهن واپس ايندڙ ساٿين ۽ مائٽن يا دوستن کي پاليسي/رابطن جون ڪاپيون پڻ ڏيو."

If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: ڪيتريون ئي فلم فارميٽس آهن جيڪو سالن کان استعمال ٿينديون رهيون آهن. معياري 35 ملي ميٽر فلم (منفي 36 ملي ميٽر ڊگهو ۽ 24 ملي ميٽر ويڪرو) گهڻو عام آهي. اهو عام طور تي آساني سان مٽائي سگهجي ٿو جيڪڏهن توهان ڀڄو ٿا ۽ هڪ موجوده DSLR سان ويجهڙائي وارو ريزوليوشن ڏيو ٿا. ڪجهہ وچولي فارميٽ واريون فلم ڪئميرائون 6 بائي 6 سينٽي ميٽر جو فارميٽ استعمال ڪن ٿيون، ٺيڪ 56 بائي 56 ملي ميٽر نيگيٽو. اهو 35 ملي ميٽر (864 جي مقابلي ۾ 3136 ملي ميٽر 2) جي نسبتاً 4 ڀيرا وڌيڪ ريزوليشن ڏي ٿو.
mt: There are many film formats that have been used for years. Standard 35mm film (negative 36mm long and 24mm wide) is common. It can be easily processed if you shoot and give a similar resolution with a current DSLR. Some intermediate format cameras use a 6 by 6 centimeter format, that is 56 by 56 millimeters negative. It gives you about 4 times the resolution of 35mm film (864 to 3136 millimeters squared).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: سفر بابت لکڻ جي ڪاروبار کي شروعات ڪرڻ جو سڀني کان آسان طريقو اهو آهي تہ توهان پنهنجي هنر کي ڪنهن ٽريول بلاگ جي ويب سائيٽ تي هٿي ڏيو. توهان ويب تي فارميٽنگ ۽ ايڊيٽنگ تي  هٿ سڌو ڪري وٺو ته ان کانپوءِ بعد ۾ توهان پنهنجي ذاتي ويب سائيٽ ٺاهي سگهو ٿا.
mt: The easiest way to start a travel writing business is to submit your work to a travel blog website. Once you have mastered formatting and editing on the web, you can then start your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: گهر ۾، مقامي جراثيمن ڏانهن هڪ مسلسل نمائش جي ڪري، فوقيت ايتري ته وڌيڪ آهي جو توهان اڳ ۾ ئي انهن کان محفوظ آهيو. پر دنيا جي ٻين حصن ۾، جتي بيڪٽيريو لاجيڪل فائونا توهان لاءِ نوان آهن، توهان کي مسئلا پيش اچڻ جو تمام گهڻو امڪان آهي. پڻ، گرم موسم ۾ بيڪٽيريا ٻئي وڌيڪ تيزي سان وڌي ويندا آهن ۽ جسم کان ٻاهر ڊگهي عرصي تائين زنده رهن ٿا. اهڙيءَ طرح دهلي بيلي جا ڦٽڪا، فرعون جي لعنت، مونٽيزوما جو بدلو، ۽ انهن جا ڪيترائي دوست. جئين ٿڌڙي آبهوائن ۾ ساهه ۾ تڪليف جي مسئلن سان، گرم آبهوائن ۾ آنڊن جا مسئلا ڪافي عام آهن ۽ اڪثر صورتن ۾ واضح طور تمام گهڻا تڪليف ڏيندڙ هوندا آهن پر حقيقت ۾ خطرناڪ ناهن هوندا.
mt: At home, a constant exposure to household germs is so much that you are already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where you are new to these bacteria, you are at risk. Also, bacteria grow faster in warm weather and can live outside the body for long periods. Thus, Delhi belly, the curse of the pharaohs, Montezuma's revenge, and their many friends. In cold weather, breathing problems are common, and in hot weather, problems with the heart are common and are often very painful but are not dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: يورپ هڪ کنڍ آهي جيڪو نسبتا ننڍڙو آهي پر ان ۾ ڪيترائي آزاد ملڪ اچن ٿا. عام حالاتن ۾، هڪ کان وڌيڪ ملڪن جي سفر ڪرڻ جو مطلب ڪيترائي ڀيرا ويزا جي درخواستن ۽ پاسپورٽ ڪنٽرول مان گذرڻو پوندو. شينگن زون، هن هوندي بہ ان سلسي ۾ ڪنهن ملڪ جي طور تي ڪم ڪري ٿو. جيستائين توهان هن زون ۾ رهو ٿا، توهان پاسپورٽ ڪنٽرول چوڪين تي ٻيهر وڃڻ کانسواءِ عام طور تي سرحدون پار ڪري سگهو ٿا. ساڳئي طرح، شينگن ويزا حاصل ڪرڻ کانپوءِ، توهان کي شينگن جي هر ميمبر ملڪ جي لاءِ ڌار ڌار ويزا جي درخواست ڏيڻ جي ضرورت ناهي، تنهنڪري وقت، پئسا ۽ ڪاغذي ڪاروائي بچايو.
mt: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but has many independent countries. In normal circumstances, traveling to more than one country means going through many visa applications and passport controls. The Schengen Zone, however, works as a country in this regard. As long as you are in this zone, you can pass through border controls without going through passport controls. Similarly, after obtaining a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for a separate visa for each member country of Schengen, so time, money and paperwork are saved.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: توتنخامن جو مقبرو (KV62). ٿي سگهي ٿو KV62 وادي ۾ مقبرن ۾ سڀني کان مشهور آهي. نوجوان بادشاه جي شاهي تدفين جي هاورڊ ڪارٽر 1922 جي دريافت. اڪثر ٻين شاهي مقبرن جي ڀيٽ ۾ تمام ننڍڙو ۽ گهٽ سجاوٽ وارو هجڻ ڪري ٽوٽان خامون جو مقبرو مشڪل سان ئي گهمڻ لائق آهي. ڪو به شخص جنهن کي تابوت مان ممي کي ڪڍڻ جي ڪوشش دوران ڪيل نقصان جو ثبوت ڏسڻ ۾ دلچسپي رکي ٿو ته مايوس ٿي ويندو. جيئن صرف منهن ۽ ڪلها ظاهر آهن. هن مقبري ۾ حيرت انگيز قيمتي شيون هاڻ نہ آهن، پر اهي قاهره جي مصري عجائب گهر ۾ منتقل ڪيون ويون آهن. محدود وقت وارا سياح پنهنجو وقت ڪنهن ٻي جاءِ تي گذارين تہ بهتر هوندو.
mt: The tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). It is probably the most famous of the tombs in the Valley of the Kings. The young king's royal burial chamber was discovered in 1922. In comparison with most other royal tombs, the tomb of Tutankhamun is small and relatively plain. Anyone who has seen the damage caused by the attempt to remove the mummy from the coffin will be intrigued. Only the face and hands are visible. There are no longer any remarkable objects in this tomb, but they have been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be better off spending it elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: بوون ٻيٽ هڪ ڏينهن جي دوري يا هفتي جي آخر ۾ گهمڻ لاءِ مشهورآهي، جيڪو ڪيڪنگ، هائيڪنگ، دڪانون، هوٽلون ۽ گهڻو ڪجهه پيش ڪري ٿو. هي معتبر ڪميونٽي وينڪوور جي ٿوري پنڌ تي هائوو ۾ آباد آهي، ۽ وينڪوور شهر جي وچ ۾ گرانولي ٻيٽ کان ويندڙ شيڊول ٿيل پاڻي واري ٽيڪسي جي ذريعي آساني سان رسائي ٿي ويندي آهي. انهن ماڻهن لاءِ جيڪي ٻاهرين سرگرمين مان لطف اندوز ٿيندا آهن، سمنڊ کان وٺي آسمان تائين جو پيچرو لازمي آهي. وسٽلر (وينڪوور کان 1.5 ڪلاڪ جي پنڌ تي) مهانگي آهي پر 2010 ونٽر اولمپڪس جي ڪري مشهور آهي. سياري ۾، اتر آمريڪا ۾ ڪجهه بهترين اسڪيئنگ جو مزو وٺو، ۽ اونهاري ۾ ڪجھ مستند مائونٽين بائيڪنگ آزمايو.
mt: ڏينهن جي دوري يا هفتي جي آخر ۾ گهمڻ لاءِ بوون ٻيٽ مشهور آهي، جيڪو ڪيڪنگ، هائيڪنگ، دڪانون، هوٽلون ۽ گهڻو ڪجهه پيش ڪري ٿو. هي معتبر ڪميونٽي وينڪوور جي ٿوري پنڌ تي هائوو ۾ آباد آهي، ۽ وينڪوور شهر جي وچ ۾ گرانولي ٻيٽ کان ويندڙ شيڊول ٿيل پاڻي واري ٽيڪسي جي ذريعي آساني سان رسائي ٿي ويندي آهي. انهن ماڻهن لاءِ جيڪي ٻاهرين سرگرمين مان لطف اندوز ٿيندا آهن، سمنڊ کان وٺي آسمان تائين جو پيچرو لازمي آهي. وسٽلر (وينڪوور کان 1.5 ڪلاڪ جي پنڌ تي) مهانگي آهي پر 2010 ونٽر اولمپڪس جي ڪري مشهور آهي. سياري ۾، اتر آمريڪا ۾ ڪجهه بهترين اسڪيئنگ جو مزو وٺو، ۽ اونهاري ۾ ڪجھ مستند مائونٽين بائيڪنگ آزمايو.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.
