src: وڪٽوريا آبشار زمباوي جي الهندي حصي جو هڪ شهر آهي جيڪو لونگ اسٽون، زيمبيا، ۽ بوٽسوانا جي ويجهو سرحد جي ٻي پاسي آهي. اهو شهر آبشارن جي بلڪل ويجهو آهي، ۽ اهي سڀ کان وڌيڪ توجا جو مرڪز آهن، پر اهو مشهور سياح جو ٺڪاڻو ٻئي مهم جو ڳوليندڙ ۽ نظارو ڏسندڙن لاءِ گهڻا موقعا مهيا ڪري ٿو. برسات جي موسم (نومبر کان مارچ) ۾، پاڻيءَ جو مقدار وڌيڪ هوندو ۽ آبشار وڌيڪ ڊرامائي ٿيندا. جيڪڏهن توهان پل کي پار ڪريو يا فالس جي ويجهو مڙندڙ رستي تي هلو ٿا ته توهانجي پسڻ جي گارنٽي آهي. ٻي طرف، اهو بلڪل ظاهري آهي ڇاڪاڻ تہ پاڻي جو مقدار تمام گهڻو آهي جيڪو توهان کي ظاهر آبشار ڏسڻ کي لڪائيندو—گهڻي پاڻي جي ڪري.
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in the southwestern corner of Zimbabwe, near the Victoria Falls, the world's largest waterfall. It is a popular tourist destination, and is home to the Victoria Falls National Park, which is administered by Zimbabwe's National Parks authority. The town is located in the Matabeleland North province, 60 kilometres (37 mi) from the tourist town of Hwange and 70 kilometres (43 mi) from the border with Botswana. The town is located on the Zambezi River, and is a gateway to the Falls. During the rainy season (November to March), the water level is higher and the Falls are more dramatic. If you walk the bridge or the path near the falls, you are guaranteed to get wet. On the other hand, it is very obvious why you would not want to get wet, since the water level is so high that you cannot see the falls at all—because of the water.
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: وڪٽوريا آبشار زمباوي جي الهندي حصي جو هڪ شهر آهي جيڪو لونگ اسٽون، زيمبيا، ۽ بوٽسوانا جي ويجهو سرحد جي ٻي پاسي آهي. اهو شهر آبشارن جي بلڪل ويجهو آهي، ۽ اهي سڀ کان وڌيڪ توجا جو مرڪز آهن، پر اهو مشهور سياح جو ٺڪاڻو ٻئي مهم جو ڳوليندڙ ۽ نظارو ڏسندڙن لاءِ گهڻا موقعا مهيا ڪري ٿو. برسات جي موسم (نومبر کان مارچ) ۾، پاڻيءَ جو مقدار وڌيڪ هوندو ۽ آبشار وڌيڪ ڊرامائي ٿيندا. جيڪڏهن توهان پل کي پار ڪريو يا فالس جي ويجهو مڙندڙ رستي تي هلو ٿا ته توهانجي پسڻ جي گارنٽي آهي. ٻي طرف، اهو بلڪل ظاهري آهي ڇاڪاڻ تہ پاڻي جو مقدار تمام گهڻو آهي جيڪو توهان کي ظاهر آبشار ڏسڻ کي لڪائيندو—گهڻي پاڻي جي ڪري.
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in the southwestern corner of Zimbabwe, near the Victoria Falls, the world's largest waterfall. It is a popular tourist destination, and is home to the Victoria Falls National Park, which is administered by Zimbabwe's National Parks authority. The town is located in the Matabeleland North province, 60 kilometres (37 mi) from the tourist town of Hwange and 70 kilometres (43 mi) from the border with Botswana. The town is located on the Zambezi River, and is a gateway to the Falls. During the rainy season (November to March), the water level is higher and the Falls are more dramatic. If you walk the bridge or the path near the falls, you are guaranteed to get wet. On the other hand, it is very obvious why you would not want to get wet, since the water level is so high that you cannot see the falls at all—because of the water.
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: عام رواجي فوٽوگرافي بابت قاعدا وڊيو رڪارڊنگ تي پڻ لاڳو ٿين ٿا، شايد ان کان بہ وڌيڪ. جيڪڏهن ڪنهن شئي جي رڳو تصوير ڪڍڻ جي اجازت ناهي ته، توهانکي ان جي وڊيو ڪڍڻ جو سوچڻ به نه گهرجي. جيڪڏهن هڪ ڊرون استعمال ڪري رهيا آهيو ته، اڳ ۾ جاچ پڙتال ڪريو ته توهان کي فلمائڻ جي اجازت آهي يا نه ۽ ڪهڙيون اجازتون يا اضافي لائسنس گهربل آهي. هوائي اڏي جي ويجهو يا هڪ هجوم مٿان ڊِرون اڏئڻ هميشه بيڪار خيال هوندو آهي، جيتوڻيڪ اِهو توهان جي عِلائقي ۾ غير قانوني ناهي.
mt: Standard photography rules also apply to video recording, perhaps even more so. If you are not allowed to take a picture, you should not be filming either. If you are using a drone, check first that you are allowed to film and what permissions or additional licenses are required. Flying a drone over an airport or a bombing range is always a bad idea, even if it is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: ويزا ڪاروائي جي لاءِ رجسٽريشن هڪ وڌيڪ گهرج آهي. ڪجهہ ملڪن ۾، توهان کي پنهنجي موجودگي ۽ پتو رجسٽر ڪرڻو پوندي جتي توهان مقامي اختيارن سان رهندا آهيو. ان لاءِ مقامي پوليس وٽ فارم ڀرڻو يا اميگريشن آفيس جو دورو ڪرڻو پئجي سگهي ٿو. اهڙي قانون سان ڪيترن ئي ملڪن ۾، مقامي هوٽلون رجسٽريشن کي سنڀالينديون (پڇڻ يقيني بڻايو). ٻين صورتن ۾، صرف اهي جيڪي سياحتي رهائش کان ٻاهر رهندڙن کي رجسٽر ڪرڻ جي ضرورت آهي. تنهن هوندي، هي قانون کي گهڻو وڌيڪ غير واضح بڻائي ٿو، تنهنڪري سڀاڻي اڳ ۾ ڳوليو.
mt: Registration for a visa is a more involved process. In some countries, you must register your presence and whereabouts with local authorities where you are staying. This may involve filling out a form with local police or visiting an immigration office. Such laws are in many countries, local hotels often handle registration (make sure you check in). In other cases, only those who are staying in tourist accommodations are required to register. However, this law is often more vague, so be careful.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: سفر جي دوران رضاڪار خدمتون مهيا ڪرڻ هڪ بهترين طريقو آهي پر اهو صرف ڏيڻ جي بابت ناهي. ٻاهرين ملڪن ۾ رهڻ ۽ رضاڪاري خدمتون ڪرڻ هڪ مختلف ثقافت، نون ماڻهن سان ملڻ، پنهنجي بابت ڄاڻڻ، پس منظرن جو احساس حاصل ڪرڻ ۽ ايتري قدر جو نيا هنر سکڻ جو هڪ بهترين طريقو آهي. ڪنهن جاءِ تي ڊگهي عرصي تائين رهن جي اجازت لاءِ هڪ بجيٽ کي وڌائن بھترين طريقو ٿي سگھي ٿو ڇو ته گهڻيون رضاڪاراڻيون نوڪريون ڪمرو ۽ بورڊ فراهم ڪن ٿيون ۽ ڪجھ تمام ٿوڙي پگهار ڏينديون آهن.
mt: Volunteering abroad is a great way to give back, but it's also a great way to experience a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, and gain new skills. Staying in one place for a long time is a great way to get a budget-friendly job, as many volunteer organizations provide room and board and offer some pretty sweet stipends.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "والٽ ڊزني ورلڊ جو سفر ڪرڻ ڪيترن ئي آمريڪي خاندانن لاءِ هڪ اهم زيارت جي نمائندگي ڪري ٿو. هڪ ""عام راوجي"" دوري ۾ اورلينڊو بين الاقوامي هوائي اڏي تائين پروازي، ڊزني هوٽل تائين بس ۾ وڃڻ، ڊزني پراپرٽي کي ڇڏڻ بغير هڪ هفتو گذارڻ، ۽ گهر واپس اچڻ شامل آهي. ان ڳالهه جا لامحدود مطلب نڪري سگهن ٿا پر جڏهن ماڻهو عام طور تي ”ڊزني ورلڊ وڃڻ“ جي ڳالهه ڪندا آهن ته انهن جو مطلب اهو هوندو آهي. نيلامي جي ويب سائيٽن جهڙوڪ eBay يا Craigslist جي ذريعي آن لائن وڪرو ٿيندڙ گهڻا ٽڪيٽ ڪجهہ قدر ملٽي-ڊي پارڪ-هوپر ٽڪيٽن جي لاءِ استعمال ڪيا ويندا آهن. جڏهن ته اهو هڪ تمام عام سرگرمي آهي، اهو ڊزني پاران منع ٿيل آهي: ٽڪيٽون منتقلي جي قابل ناهن."
mt: "A Walt Disney World vacation is a must for many American families. A typical itinerary includes flying to Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to Disney Hotel, checking in without checking out, spending a week, and returning home. The phrase "going to Disney World" has many implications, but when people say it, they mean it. Many online sales are made through sites such as eBay or Craigslist, which are used to sell multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: tickets are not transferable."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: ڪو به شخص جيڪو ڪنهن ملڪ جو دورو ڪرڻ جي منصوبابندي ڪري رهيو آهي جيڪو جنگ جي ميدان سمجهيو وڃي ٿو ته پيشه ورانه تربيت وٺڻ گهرجي. 'هوسٽائل ماحول واري ڪورس' لاءِ انٽرنيٽ جي هڪ ڳولا ممڪن طور تي ڪنهن مقامي ڪمپني جو پتو مهيا ڪندي. هڪ ڪورس عام طور تي بحث ٿيندڙ مسئلن کي وڌيڪ تفصيل سان پورو ڪندو، عام طور تي عملي تجربي سان. هڪ ڪورس عام طور تي 2-5 ڏينهن جو ٿيندو آهي ۽ ان ۾ رول پلي شامل هوندو آهي، تمام گهڻي هنگامي امداد ۽ ڪڏهن ڪڏهن هٿيارن جي تربيت شامل هوندي آهي. جنگل جي بقا بابت ڪتاب ۽ رسالا عام آهن ، پر وار زونن سان ڪم ڪندڙ پبليڪيشنون تمام گهٽ آهن.
mt: Any person planning a trip to a country that is considered a war zone should receive some sort of training. An internet search for "hostile environment course" may lead to a local company's website. A course typically covers the issues in more detail, and often includes practical exercises. A course typically lasts 2-5 days and may include role play, extensive first aid and occasionally weapons training. There are many books and magazines on survival in the wild, but there are few publications on survival in war zones.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: پاڻي کي صاف ڪرڻ لاءِ مختلف طريقا آهن، مخصوص خطرن جي مقابلي ۾ ڪجهہ وڌيڪ اثردار. ڪجھ علائقن ۾ هڪ منٽ لاءِ اُٻرندڙ پاڻي ڪافي آهي، ٻين علائقن ۾ ڪيترائي منٽ گهربل آهن. فلٽر اثرائتي حساب سان مختلف هوندا آهن، ۽ توهان کي هڪ فڪر هجڻ گهري، پوءِ توهان کي هڪ نامور ڪمپني کان هڪ سيل واري بوتل ۾ پنهنجو پاڻي خريد تي غور ڪرڻ گهرجي.
mt: There are various ways to purify water, some more effective against certain threats than others. In some areas, water is abundant for a minute, in others, it takes several minutes to collect. The effectiveness of filters varies, and you should consider a reputable company when buying your water in a bottle.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: رپ ڪرنٽ ساحل کي ٽوڙڻ وارين لهرن سان موٽي ايندڙ وهڪرو آهي، گهڻو ڪري هڪ سامونڊي ٽڪري سان يا جهڙن جاين تي. پاڻي هيٺ ٽوپولاجي جي ڪري، واپسيءَ جو وهڪرو ڪجهه گهرن حصن تي رڪيل آهي، ۽ اتان کان تڪڙو موجوده کان گهرو پاڻي جمع ٿي سگهي ٿو. گهڻا موت ٿڪ جي ڪري ٿين ٿا جيڪو ڪرنٽ جي سامهون ترڻ جي ڪوشش ڪن ٿا، اهو ٿي نٿو سگهي. جيئن توهان موجوده حالت کان ٻاهر نڪرو، پٺتي ترڻ معمول کان وڌيڪ ڏکيو ناهي. ڪنهن اهڙي هنڌ تي هجڻ جي ڪوشش ڪريو جتي توهان کي ٻيهر پڪڙيو نہ وڃي يا، توهان جي هنر تي ڀاڙيل آهي ۽ يا توهان کي نوٽس ڪيو ويو آهي، شايد توهان بچاءُ جو انتظار ڪرڻ چاهيو ٿا.
mt: A rip current is a strong, localized current of water that flows away from the beach, parallel to the shore. It is caused by waves striking the beach at an angle and then being reflected back. The waves move material up the beach, where it is trapped by the incoming waves. The incoming waves then break and form a standing wave. The standing wave is a series of waves that break in a line perpendicular to the beach. The rip current is the area of water between the breaking waves. The rip current is strongest at the breaking waves and weakens as it moves away from the beach. Many deaths occur when people try to swim against the rip current. This is not necessary. If you are caught in a rip current, swim sideways out of it. If you are unable to swim out of the rip current, do not fight against it. Instead, float and call for help. If you are a strong swimmer, you can swim out of the rip current. If you are a weak swimmer, you can float out of the rip current. If you are a strong swimmer, you can swim out of the rip current. If you are a weak swimer, you can float out of the rip current. If you are a strong swimmer, you can swim out of the rip current. If you are a weak swimmer, you can float out of the rip current. If you are a strong swimmer, you can swim out of the rip current. If you are a weak swimmer, you can float out of the rip current. If you are a strong swimmer, you can swim out of the rip current. If you are a weak swimmer, you can float out of the rip current. If you are a strong swimmer, you can swim out of the rip current. If you are a weak swimmer, you can float out of the rip current. If you are a strong swimmer, you can swim out of the rip current. If you are a weak swimmer, you can float out of the rip current. If you are a strong swimmer, you can swim out of the rip current. If you are a weak swimmer, you can float out of the rip current. If you are a strong swimmer, you can swim out of the rip current. If you are a weak swimmer, you can float out of the rip current. If you are a strong swimmer, you can swim out of the rip current. If you are a weak swimmer, you can float
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: انلينڊ واٽر ويز هڪ جي ارد گرد هڪ موڪل جو بيس ٺاهڻ لاءِ بهترين ٿيم آهي. مثال جي طور تي، لوئر ويلي، رهائن ويلي ۾ قلعن جو دورو ڪرڻ يا ڊينيوب تي دلچسپ شهرن ڏانهن سفر ڪرڻ يا اري ڪينال ۾ بوٽنگ ڪرڻ. اهي مشهور هائيڪنگ ۽ سائيڪلنگ ٽرائلز جي لاءِ رستا بہ واضع ڪن ٿا.
mt: Online Waterways is a great theme for a round-the-world cruise. For example, Lower Willamette, stay in the city, or cruise to interesting towns on the Danube or the Erie Canal. They also make clear routes for famous hiking and cycling trails.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: اتر ۾ انهي علائقي جي سرحد ۾ سهيل آهي ۽ ڏکڻ ۽ اولهه ۾ ايٽلانٽڪ سمنڊ آهي. عورتن: اها سفارش ٿي ڪجي ته ڪنهن به عورت کي ان جي شادي جي اصل حيثيت کي ڇڏي، چوڻ گهرجي ته هو شادي شده آهي. هڪ مُنڊي پائڻ پڻ مددگار آهي (رڳو اهو نه جيڪو تمام قيمتي لڳي ٿي. عورتن کي اهو سمجهڻ گهرجي ته ثقافتي فرق جي نتيي ۾ اهو ٿي سگهي جن کي اهي بدسلوڪي سمجهن ٿيون ۽ انهي جي پيروي ڪرڻ، هٿ کان ڦري وٺڻ، وغيره غير معمولي ناهي. ماڻهن کي منهن ڏيڻ ۾ مضبوط رهو، ۽ پنهنجي ڳالهه تي ٽڪي رهڻ کان نه ڊڄو (ثقافتي فرق هجي يا نه، اهو ان کي ٺيڪ ناهي ڪندو!).

ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: جهنگ جي دنيا هڪ فوٽو گرافر لاءِ سڀ کان وڌيڪ مشڪل شڪلن ۾ آهي ۽ خوش قسمتي، صبر، تجربي ۽ سٺي اوزارن جو ميلاپ گهربل آهي. وائيلڊ لائف فوٽوگرافي يقيني طور تي کنئي ويندي آهي، پر عام طور تي فوٽوگرافي وانگر، هڪ تصوير هزار لفظن جي هوندي آهي. وائيلڊ لائف فوٽوگرافي کي گهڻو ڪري هڪ ڊگهي ٽيليفوٽو لينس جي ضرورت هوندي آهي، جڏهن ته شين جهڙوڪ پکين جي ولر يا هڪ ننڍڙي مخلوق جهڙين شين کي ٻئي لينس جي ضرورت هوندي آهي. گهڻا ٻاهريان جانور ڳولڻ مشڪل آهن، ۽ ڪڏهن ڪڏهن پارڪ ۾ ڪمرشل مقصد جي لاءِ تصوير ڪڍڻ بابت قاعدا آهن. جهنگلي جانور يا ته شرمیلا يا جارحيت پسند ٿي سگهن ٿا. ماحول شايد ٿڌو، گرم، يا ٻي صورت ۾ مختلف ٿي سگهي ٿو.
mt: The world of wildlife is the most challenging subject for a photographer to capture and the most rewarding, with patience, perseverance and good equipment. Wildlife photography is a sure bet, but like photography in general, a single image is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, while subjects such as birds or small creatures require two lenses. Many wild animals are shy, and sometimes there are rules against taking pictures in a park for commercial purposes. Wild animals are either shy or aggressive. The environment may be cold, hot, or otherwise different.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: ڪو به ماڻهو جيڪو بلند عرض تي يا جبل جي پاسز تي ڊرائيو ڪرڻ وڃي رهيو آهي، ان کي برف باري، برف باري يا برف، يا منجمد گرمي پد تي غور ڪرڻ گهرجي. برف سان ڀريل ۽ برف جهڙي رستي تي گاٺ گهٽ هوندي آهي ۽ توهان گاڏي نٿا هلائي سگهو جيئن توهان کليل ڏامر تي هلائيندا هجو. برفاني طوفان دوران، تمام ٿوري وقت ۾ توهانکي رستي ۾ ڦاسائڻ جيتري برف پئجي سگهي ٿي. برف ڪيرائڻ يا اڏائڻ يا گاڏي جي درين تي گهم ٿيڻ جي ذريعي نموداري تي پابندي لڳائي سگهجي ٿي. ٻي طرف، ڪيترن ئي ملڪن ۾ برف سان ڀريل ۽ برفباري جهڙيون حالتون عام آهن، ٽرئفڪ گهڻو ڪري سڄو سال بغير خلل جي هلندي رهي ٿي.
mt: If you are driving on a high mountain pass or through a mountain pass, you should be aware of snow, snow, or snow and ice. Snow and snow-covered roads are slippery and you cannot drive on them as you would on a clear road. During a snowstorm, you can get more snow on the road in a short time. You can be fined for driving on a snow-covered road or on a road that is slippery due to snow or ice. On the other hand, many countries have snow-covered and snow-covered conditions, traffic is running smoothly throughout the year without interruption.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: جيستائين توهان سياستدان نہ آهيو، پرڏيهي ملڪ ۾ ڪم ڪرڻ جو مطلب تہ جنهن ملڪ ۾ توهان رهو ٿا اتي توهان کي انڪم ٽيڪس ڀرڻو پوندو. انڪم ٽيڪس مختلف ملڪن ۾ مختلف طور ترتيب ڏنل آهي، ۽ ٽيڪس ريٽ ۽ بريڪيٽس هڪ ملڪ کان ٻئي ملڪ تائين تمام گهڻا مختلف ٿيندا آهن. ڪجهه وفاقي ملڪن ۾، جهڙوڪ آمريڪا ۽ ڪئناڊا، انڪم ٽيڪس وفاقي سطح ۽ مقامي سطح ٻنهي تي لڳائي ويندي آهي، جيئن قيمتون ۽ بريڪيٽس هڪ علائقي کان ٻئي علائي ۾ مختلف ٿي سگهن.
mt: As long as you are not a politician, working abroad means you have to pay income tax in the country where you live. Income tax is arranged differently in different countries, and tax rates and breaks vary greatly from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied at both federal and local levels, as rates and breaks may vary from one region to another.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: دنيا جو ميلو (عام طور تي عالمي نمائش، يا صرف ايڪسپو سڏيو ويندو آهي) آرٽس ۽ سائنس جو هڪ وڏو بين الاقوامي ميلو آهي. حصو وٺندڙ ملڪ عالمي مسئلا يا پنهنجي ملڪ جي ثقافت يا تاريخ جي نمائش ڪرڻ جي لاءِ قومي پويلين ۾ هنري ۽ تعليمي ڊسپلي پيش ڪن ٿا. بين الاقوامي باغباني نمائشون خاص تقريبون آهن جيڪي گلن وارين نمائشن، نباتاتي باغن ۽ ٻوٽن سان گڏ سڀ ڪجهه ڪرڻ جي نمائش ڪن ٿيون. جيتوڻيڪ لکت ۾ اهي هر سال ٿي سگهن ٿا (جيستائين اهي مختلف ملڪن ۾ آهن)، عملي طور تي اهي نٿا ٿي سگهن. اهي تقريبون عام طور تي ڪٿي بہ ٽي کان ڇهہ مهينن جي وچ ۾ ٿينديون آهن، ۽ اهي 50 هيڪٽرن کان گهٽ علائقن ۾ نہ ٿينديون آهن.
mt: ڊي ڪي ڪارڪيٽ (ڪارڪيٽ) ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪيٽ جي ڪارڪ
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: جيتوڻڪ پارڪ ۾ ڪيترائي جانور انسانن کي ڏسڻ جا عادي آهن، پر جهنگلي جانور آخرڪار جهنگلي آهن ۽ انهن کي کارائڻ ۽ پريشان نہ ڪرڻ گهرجي. پارڪ جي اختيارين موجب، رڇن ۽ گدڙن کان گهٽ ۾ گهٽ 100 گز/ميٽر پري ۽ ٻين سڀني جهنگلي جانورن کان 25 گز/ميٽر پري رهو! ان سان ڪو فرق نٿو پوي تي اهي ڪيترائي دوستاڻا نظر اچي سگهن ٿا، جابلو ڍڳو, ٻارانهن سڱو، آمريڪي ٻارانهن سڱو، رڇ ۽ لڳ ڀڳ سڀئي وڏا جانور حملو ڪري سگهن ٿا. هر سال، ڪيرائي سياح زخمي ٿيندا آهن ڇاڪاڻ ته اهي صحيح فاصلو نٿا رکن. اهي جانور وڏا، وحشي، ۽ ممڪن طور خطرناڪ آهن، تنهنڪري انهن کي وٿي ڏيو. اضافي طور، خبردار رھو ته خشبوءِ هرڻين ۽ ٻين جهنگلي جانورن کي راغب ڪندي آهي ، تنھنڪري خوشبودار کاڌ خوراڪ کڻڻ يا پچائڻ کان پاسو ڪريو ۽ صاف ڪئمپ رکو.
mt: While many animals in the park are used to being seen by humans, wild animals are still wild and should not be provoked or disturbed. Park officials advise staying at least 100 yards from bears and cougars and 25 yards from all other wild animals. You will see many friendly animals, such as mountain goats, bighorn sheep, American bighorn sheep, bears and other large animals. Every year, tourists are injured because they do not follow proper distances. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them space. Additionally, beware that the scent of humans and other wild animals attracts them, so avoid eating or cooking food with strong odors and keep your campsite clean. Be aware that the scent of humans and other wild animals attracts them, so avoid eating or cooking food with strong odors and keep your campsite clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
